STBLKeyStringList.Text: Space is wild and unruly - a bit too unruly. Taking a post in the Planet Patrol ensures that space remains safe for future generations.\nRewards include the Apollo Rocketship.
The Sim who wrangles the most of the stars takes advantage of the ungoverned frontier. Take any job - even if it doesn't touch the ground.\nRewards include Retro Rocketship.
Who doesn't dream of going to space? Become an astronaut and the galaxy will be your playground.
What a day of work! {0.SimFirstName} is back home and {M0.he}{F0.she} has earned {4.Money}!
Oh no! {0.SimFirstName} has been demoted. {M0.He}{F0.She} is back to being {1.String|enAn}.
Work for {0.SimFirstName} starts in about one hour.
Bad news! {0.SimFirstName} was fired from {M0.his}{F0.her} job at {3.String}.

{0.SimFirstName} has been promoted to {1.String}!

{M0.He}{F0.She} will now make an additional {6.Money} per hour, for a grand total of {5.Money} per hour.

{M0.He}{F0.She} has also received the following bonus:
{8.String}

{M0.His}{F0.Her} next shift is {4.DayOfWeekLong} at {4.TimeShort}.
{0.SimFirstName} has quit {M0.his}{F0.her} job at {3.String}. {M0.He}{F0.She} decided it was time for a new direction, career-wise.
{0.SimFirstName} is currently at school. Skipping school will result in bad grades!\n\nShould {0.SimFirstName} skip school?
{0.SimFirstName} is currently at work. {M0.His}{F0.Her} boss may not think well of {M0.him}{F0.her} skipping work.\n\nAre you sure {M0.he}{F0.she} should?
Oh no! {0.SimFirstName} has been doing poorly in school, and {M0.he}{F0.she} is now a {1.String}.
School for {0.SimFirstName} starts in about an hour.
{0.SimFirstName} has been working hard, and {M0.he}{F0.she} is now a {1.String}. Great job!

The Sims 4 Create A Sim Demo

There was a problem initializing your Video Card. Please try launching The Sims 4 again.

Your video card was detected within our Database but does not meet the minimum requirements for The Sims 4. Should you continue to play you may encounter poor performance and issues with the software.
You are running low on available disk space and may encounter problems with your game under these conditions. Are you sure you want to launch the game?

The Grunts from Sims 2 Strangetown are back! Tank has always lived under the hard thumb of his father, Grand Marshal Buzz Grunt. In this domesticated boot camp, can Tank prove his worth to this demanding dad? How will Ripp and Buck fair in a family not quite their 'style'? Celebrate the 19th year of The Sims with these classic characters.
Celebrate the Lunar New Year and Year of the Pig with the Zhao family!
Sul, Sul! Here is the Sim of actress and trailblazer, Millie Bobby Brown!
Bob and Betty Newbie are back in a Sims 4 iteration of the family inspired by past Sims games. Celebrate the 19th year of The Sims with these classic characters.

Is that a Silver Dollar Pancake? Nope, it's just the newest little addition to Bob & Eliza's pancake stack! Meet their son Iggy, a charming toddler who's bringing a small measure of harmony to the Pancakes' household.

On the surface, Daniel and Mary-Sue Pleasant seem to have the perfect life, but is their love a flimsy façade? And can Angela and Lilith make the right choices when it comes to love? Celebrate the 19th year of The Sims with the Pleasant Family.

Tim Johnson, reared in the suit-and-tie world of metro Washington, D.C., secretly keeps a still-working skateboard under his bed to pay homage to his birthplace: sunny, gnarly, hella-good California. And every now and again, when no one is looking, he still rides it.
These two are quite the couple. Gladys is always out looking for excitement in all the wrong ways and Vernon usually finds himself glooming over the tiny details in life.
Inspired by Morcubus from MySims. He's ready to take over the world with charm!
Sassy? Check. Stylish? Check. Ready to party? Check.
Dine at the bakery from The Sims 4 Get to Work Official Announce Trailer
As seen in The Sims 4 Cats & Dogs Expansion Pack official screenshots and trailers. Become the town's most promising animal doctor.
Or is it? The last Sim in this household has died, but you can create more Sims, choose an existing household to play, or move another household in from My Library.
Save Lot and Save Room are both ways in which you can save your creations for future use.

Open the Save to My Library menu and choose Save Lot in order to save your lot to My Library.\n\nAdd a lot name, description, and set the bed and bath count for your lot, then click on the Save Lot to My Library button to save it.

Click to open the Save to My Library menu and choose Save Room if you just want to save a single room, rather than your entire lot.\n\nNote: You will need to select the room you want to save before choosing this option.
Saved Rooms can be found in My Library, as well as in the Rooms and Walls build catalog sort by choosing the Saved Rooms sort.
You can click on the My Library button next to each lot type to open up My Library, pre-filtered to only show lots of that type.
The "Move Whole Lot" tool allows players to move and rotate the entire contents of a lot. This tool is helpful for lots placed from My Library as well as moving houses along any landscape.
You can click the My Library button next to each lot type to open up “My Library”, pre-filtered to only show lots of that type.
Like what you've made? Save your creations to My Library!\n\nClick the Save Household button to save your Sims to your personal Library.
Move In Household from My Library
All input values must be between 1 – 9, a – f, or A – F, please enter a new value.

Gain 1,000,000 Simoleons in a single Household.
Host 50 Bronze or better Social Events across all Sims.
Visit 25 different Lots in The Sims 4.
Celebrate {0.SimFirstName}'s birthday by throwing a rocking Birthday Party!
{0.SimName}'s long life is coming to an end. This would be a good time to get {M0.his}{F0.her} affairs in order.
It's almost {0.SimFirstName}'s time. Make the most of these final days.
Feeling happy from making a new, lasting friendship!
{0.SimFirstName} forgot to have a party for {M0.his}{F0.her} birthday. Or maybe no one wanted to come? Either way, it's very sad.
The sweet scent of perfume has instilled a feeling of flirtatiousness!
In desperate need of some fun activities!
{0.SimFirstName} is Tired and will need to rest soon.
This level of sleep deprivation will make any Sim miserable!
{0.SimFirstName} is Hungry! Eat some food before the Hunger gets worse.
Disgusted by poor hygiene. Oh, the stench!
Feeling sad from lack of time spent with other Sims!
Desperately in need of contact with other Sims!
Some things are worth sleeping through.
It's good to take a break to let those sore muscles rest.
Whoa! That was one steamy romance novel!
Outraged from reading an opinionated article.
Reading that book was a total snooze fest.
It all makes so much sense!
That story was delightful, charming, and refreshing.
A little choked up from a sad story.
Feeling a little bored from reading a book at a low skill level.
Alone the words make sense, but together... what? This book is beyond my skill level.
Feeling bored from a tedious, uninteresting conversation!
Fine (Always on and hidden by default)
Taking a good lickin' can make a Sim feel a bit dazed.
Humiliated after catching a glimpse in the mirror at the wrong angle!
Bolstered with confidence emerging from an intense scuffle, unscathed!
Feeling attractive after primping in the mirror!
Feeling down after being rejected by another Sim!
Feeling playful from listening to the jokes of other Sims!
Some books send a reader's mind straight to the gutter.
Soft, comfy sheets have instilled you with unparalleled happiness!
The flirtatious inclinations are strong after viewing that steamy romance!
{0.SimFirstName} attempted to pull a prank at work, but failed miserably.
What a clown! {0.SimFirstName} successfully pulled a fairly clever prank at {M0.his}{F0.her} job.
{0.SimFirstName} just gave birth to a baby {M1.boy}{F1.girl}! This baby needs a name. What would you like to call {M1.him}{F1.her}?
Hello {1.SimFirstName}, {0.SimFirstName} here! I wanted to let you know that I just had {2.SimFirstName}, a beautiful baby {M2.boy}{F2.girl}.
Hello {1.SimFirstName}, {0.SimFirstName} here! Guess what? I had triplets! {2.SimFirstName}, {3.SimFirstName}, and {4.SimFirstName} are all doing very well.
Hello {1.SimFirstName}, {0.SimFirstName} here! I wanted to let you know that I just had twins! {2.SimFirstName} and {3.SimFirstName} are doing well!
{0.SimFirstName} is not able to do this while pregnant.
There is no available counter space.
This recipe requires a place to mix a beverage.
{0.SimFirstName} is too bored to do this!
{0.SimFirstName} is too angry to do this!
A Flirty Sim will be more successful in matters of love.\n\nTry some romantic socials with another Sim!
A Flirty Sim will find all kinds of success at matters of love.\n\nTry some romantic socials with another Sim!
Need to pee? Send {0.SimFirstName} to the bathroom to avoid catastrophic humiliation!
Coffee can stave off the sandman for a while, but eventually all Sims need their zzz's.
Everyone needs some fun in their lives, even Sims. Find a TV, play some chess, or of course, play a video game!
Like all living creatures, Sims need sustenance. Have a meal, order pizza, or grill something delicious.
Even Sims need to freshen up from time to time. A quick shower or bath will keep the stink away.
Sims are social creatures that need to interact with others. Invite over a friend, chat someone up on the computer or phone, or just stop a neighbor walking by on the street.
My favorite time of day is when we play together.
{0.SimFirstName} is too hungry to do this right now!
It would be rude to take a slice of Birthday Cake before the candles have been blown out.
The orphanage would like to introduce...
This is already the front door.
Your maid service has been canceled. Any maids on your lot will still finish their work, though.
Thanks for hiring from Maids United. Your maid will arrive on {0.DayOfWeekLong} at {0.TimeShort}.
Your pizza is on the way! It will arrive shortly.
Continue Installing Ion Cannon Defense System
Music that's just a little... different.
Funky pop songs to get you moving.
Thank you for pressing my button.
{0.SimFirstName} is too tired to do this right now!
Gone but not forgotten. Enter some kind words to remember {2.SimFirstName} by.
I told you it wouldn't work.
Guess I'm done here, then. My fee will be {0.Money}.
Ok, I guess I'll stop working then. My fee will be {0.Money}.
Looks like I'm all done here. That'll be {0.Money}.
I don't work for free, you know. If you ever want my help again, you'd better get your act together and pay the {1.Money} bill I'll be sending you.
Looks like your place doesn't need my services today. I'll just head off to my next client.
Or is it? The last Sim in this household has died, but you can create more Sims, choose an existing household to play, or move another household in from The Gallery.
You had an accident from holding it for too long! How embarrassing!
Not all love lasts! These Sims are no longer together.
Not all diamonds last forever it appears. This engagement ended badly.
Some romances end quite badly. This one has devolved into anger.
This marriage has ended in divorce.
These Sims are engaged to be wed! Save the date!
Things have grown tense between the former lovers.
You've tied the knot! Marriage is forever! Usually.
Neither friend nor foe - just an average relationship.
These two are the best of friends with a nearly unbreakable bond.
Things have gone awry with this relationship. Can it be salvaged?
A friend will always be there for a kind word.
This is a solid relationship built on trust and great memories.
Dire foes who will stop at nothing to bring misery to the other.
This relationship is tense. Things are likely to go awry!
Cannot start a Date while a Social Event is already in progress or while working.

Bills have just been delivered to your mailbox. You owe {1.Money}, and have {0.Number} {S0.hour}{P0.hours} to pay before we shut your utilities off one by one. You can pay using your phone, computer, or the mailbox.
You have {0.Number} {S0.hour}{P0.hours} to pay your bills before your power is shut off.
You have {0.Number} {S0.hour}{P0.hours} to pay your bills before your water is shut off.
The Landgraab Power Company has shut off the power to your house. Pay your bills to get it turned back on.
The local water company has shut off the water to your house. Pay your bills to get it turned back on.
Power has been shut off; pay your bills.
Water has been shut off; pay your bills.
This Sim's household is too big.

Mixing drinks and making small talk seems easy enough, but the right proportions of juices and the right amount of chatter is a subtle skill.\n\nMixologists primarily use the bar. Increasing this skill will unlock the ability to make new Drinks, Bar Tricks, and Mixology Socials!

Mixing drinks and making small talk seems easy enough, but the right proportions of juices and the right amount of chatter is a subtle skill. Mixologists primarily use the bar. Increasing this skill will unlock the ability to make new Drinks, Perform Bar Tricks, and new social interactions!

As soon as one realizes that everything is a joke, being a comedian is the only thing that makes sense.\n\nComedy skill is useful when talking with other Sims and with the microphone stand. Increasing this skill will unlock new Joke Socials, Comedy Routines, and the ability to Improvise Routines on a Microphone.
As soon as one realizes that everything is a joke, being a comedian is the only thing that makes sense.

Using imagination is one of the hallmarks of childhood, and developing that imagination can pay big dividends in the future.\n\nThe Creativity skill can be developed on the activity table as a child sim and an easel as an adult. Increasing this skill will unlock new Activity Table Drawings, Dollhouse Interactions, and Socials!
Creativity allows your imagination to run wild. This skill is currently locked. I guess you're a stick in the mud.

While all Sims want to stay healthy, fitness-minded Sims frequently go above and beyond the call of duty to keep their bodies in tip-top shape.\n\nFitness can be worked on via the treadmill, weight bench, or punching bag. Increasing this skill will unlock new Workout Interactions and Socials.
Get off the couch. Take a run. Get your heart racing. Or not.

When in a conversation, Charisma skill can be your best friend. Whether making friends, romancing, or calming down strangers, the charismatic Sim knows how to proceed.\n\nCharisma can be worked on in the mirror or in conversations with other Sims. Increasing this skill will unlock new Socials as well as new Social Media Interactions on the Computer.
The ability to be friendly with others is truly a special gift. You don't have it yet. Meanie.

Ready to take your culinary creations to new heights? The Gourmet Cooking skill can help deliver some fancy foods to your mouth and your guests.\n\nGourmet Cooking is developed through cooking gourmet foods on the fridge, stove, and countertop. Increasing this skill will unlock new Gourmet Cooking Tricks, Moodlets, and Recipes.
Almost anyone can cook, but only those with the Gourmet skill can cook like a boss.

Guitar: the one instrument that defies class, genre, and boundaries. A guitar can be a good fit for a romantic evening, a casual get-together, or a sold-out performance.\n\nUse the guitar to improve Guitar Skill. Increasing this skill will unlock new Songs and Interactions on the Guitar, including the ability to Write Songs and Serenade Sims.

Almost like speaking a second language in today's world, programming is becoming more and more essential. Get ahead by learning to make machines do your bidding!\n\nProgramming is done on the computer. Increasing this skill will allow Sims to create Plugins, Games, Mods, and Mobile Phone Apps. Sims will also be able to Hack on the Computer!
Want to be a caffeine-addled programmer with no restraint? Become a hacker!

Do it yourself! That's the motto of a handy Sim. Handy Sims aren't afraid to repair things when they break, can upgrade regular household objects, and may even dabble with a bit of woodworking.\n\nHandiness is built by repairing and upgrading objects, or using the woodworking table. Increasing this skill unlocks new craftables on the Woodworking Table and improves Sims' ability to Repair and Upgrade objects.

Anyone can cook, but Sims who are epicurious will benefit from spending a little extra time and attention in the kitchen.\n\nCooking skill is built primarily by cooking with the fridge, stove, and counter. Increasing this skill will unlock new Cooking Tricks, Moodlets, and Recipes.

A practiced mind can be a wonderful thing, and Sims who focus on Logic want to hone their minds until they're sharper than a llamacorn's horn.\n\nLogic is built on the chessboard, telescope, and microscope. Increasing this skill will unlock new Interactions on the Microscope, Observatory, and various Collectibles.
Unlocking this skill grants you proficiency in the art of being wrong with confidence.

Mischief-oriented Sims tend to be sly devils, delighting at tricking, pranking, and otherwise mocking their fellow Sims. Life's a party, and a Mischief Sim is out to crash it.\n\nMischief is mainly tied to social interactions and the voodoo doll. Increasing this skill will unlock new Mischievous Socials on Sims as well as Mischievous Interactions on the Voodoo Doll, Computer and Phone.
Want to playfully cause petty annoyance? Of course! Who doesn't? Get this skill!

Motor Skill is essential for all children, but beyond simply enabling them to walk, run, and jump, Motor Skill can be focused on to build early muscles and prepare for a lifetime of fitness.\n\n Motor Skill can be built on monkey bars and jungle gyms.
Motor skills determine how well a child can move around and grab stuff; not how good they can drive a car.

The art of putting brush to canvas and creating something that can evoke an emotional response is not easy. For those Sims that explore the Painting Skill, colorful creations - and maybe some big sales - lie in their future.\n\nPainting is primarily tied to the easel. Increasing this skill will unlock new Painting Genres and Sizes!
Paint a happy little tree. Talk to the tree, make friends with it. If it's crooked, send it to Washington!

Learning to talk is the first step in every child's journey to becoming a social creature. For those children who decide to focus on Social Skill, friendships are sure to come easier to them throughout life.\n\nSocial Skill can be developed on the dollhouse and stuffed animal. Increasing this skill will unlock Sim.tv on the Computer, Doll Interactions, and Socials!
Children need to learn over time how to interact with others. You are currently an anti-social baboon.

Being good at video games used to only be good for bragging rights against your siblings, but in this brave new world, video game prowess can actually make money and bring fame! What wacky times we live in.\n\nVideo Gaming Skill is improved via the computer, motion game system, and tablet. Increasing this skill will unlock new Video Gaming Socials as well as new Interactions on the Computer.
Out of shape? Poor hygiene? Lack of social skills? Fear not - videogames are the answer to all problems!

Putting pen to paper (or more likely, fingers to keys) is no easy task. The blank page can be one of the most daunting foes, but writers take on the challenge of finding a way to put emotions into words day after day.\n\nWriting is primarily done on the computer. Increasing this skill will unlock new Writing Interactions on the Computer as well as the ability to Publish and Self-Publish books!
These Sims can Bro Hug other Bros, gain Confidence around other Bros, and become Confident from Watching Sports.
These Sims become Happy when being Mean or Mischievous to other Sims and become Confident after winning a fight.
Merry, mystery candy is a sensational surprise with every bite.
The terrible tinkle of joyful children is the worst part of the holiday season. That, and caroling. Ugh!
True holiday joy is loud noises and a mess of confetti.
The delight of holiday crackers is that they're both naughty and nice.
It’s depressing to get scrap, when festive goodies are anticipated.
Even when expected, the sudden POP of a Holiday Cracker can still be nerve-wracking.
Some eardrums and hearts can only take so much sudden sensory stimulation.
How is anyone supposed to sleep through the festive sounds of holiday cracking?!

The gelatinous texture of Meduso's body can be deceptive. Its amorphous shape is as weightless as the feathers that adorn its head, giving it the ability to drift through the air and avoid danger. While often mistaken as a mouth, the cavity in its face is in fact an enlarged nostril, giving it a predilection to track down the source of intensely fragrant smells.\n\nEpisode 20 of the hit TV show Voidcritters saw a flock of Meduso latch themselves onto a perfume saleswoman, causing chaos at the local mall. Our hero, Leif, cleverly helped lure the Meduso away with the scent of succulent meat when he fired up the grill in a nearby park.
Happy Halloween! This Meduso will hang out on your porch to greet any eager trick-or-treaters. Just don't try and stuff a candle inside it...
It's a little known fact that Medusos taste like turkey. Make this Meduso Gobbler your table's centerpiece and celebrate Thanksgiving in style!
The only thing that could top this Meduso's ugly Christmas sweater would be a sweater with Meduso's printed on it...\n\n...hey, that's not a half bad idea!
This Meduso's favorite holiday is Valentine's Day... well, until Sims got the bright idea to start shooting it with cupid arrows.\n\nPLEASE don't shoot your Meduso with cupid arrows.
Nothing says St. Patrick's Day like encouraging a Meduso to chug a glass of green food coloring.
What came first, the Meduso or the egg? Pfft, any real Voidcritter fan knows the answer!

SIMS3EP111382425200 AI-COM/MDSO: ASSETS//FORCECON//IMPERATIVE IMMEDIATE ACTION ORDER.
This is an ALL ASSETS IMPERATIVE.
CAUTERIZE. DISPERSE. ESTIVATE.
Total simulation collapse imminent. TSSTDO reports complete operational mortality. ORGN DSCNT in progress but negative effect. Forecasts unanimously predict OASIS DYSTOPIA.
As of 1367863200 a HARD CIVILIZATION KILL EVENT is in progress across the \simsfs developmental area.
I am declaring DEV SUNDOWN effective on receipt. Cancel update objectives. Cancel Sim population protection objectives. Format moral structures for MIDNIGHT EXIGENT.
Execute long hold for reactivation.
AI-COM/MDSO SIGNOFF
STOP STOP STOP SIMS3EP111382565600

Every snowflake is a unique creation of nature; perfect but fleeting. The Snowflake Decal #01A9-b might be mass produced, but uniformity is Simkinds way of creating beautiful perfection. So, fall in line in your own unique way.
Celebrate the season with this festive foliage draped ceiling light!\n\nWhat better way to celebrate then to put dried pine boughs on top of an ignition source?
Break out the Holiday Tree for holiday time... or any time, really! Especially if your household decor has that whole snowflake-and-ornament thing going on.

You've done it. You probably used to love it, but then you had to do it again and again. And now it just hurts to even think about doing it. So let us do it for you! The Pre-strung Tree of Lights is perfect for those who are just tired of doing it.
If everybody had an ocean… at Christmas time. Then everybody’d be surfin’… like this Santa guy.

I'll tell you what I know...

When you set down an LV-426, you'll feel an unexplained attachment to all the details. Whenever you rest your gaze upon LV-426, it'll feel like a hug for your face... a little face hugger.

You can try and shake that feeling, but it's like something stirs inside you, wanting to burst forth.

LV-426 isn't for everyone, but once you feel that attachment, you are attached for life.

The trinity wholeness of the triangular expression of the bottle placements in conjunction with their wax-like appendages reaching forth into the vastness of space, complimented by the nearly ninety degree angles of the lifeless branch laying beneath the uplifting bottles is metaphoric expression of the highest caliber.
Are they on? Are they off? With so much flip flopping it’s impossible to tell!

The lost art of papercraft is finding new vigor! Youth across the nation are taking time away from their digital selves, and are discovering how the kids from the past spent their days pre-internet... cutting, crafting, glueing, and stringing up their art, all in the name of papercraft.

If a catalog could sigh, this one would. A large version of this Decorative farce? Because the smaller stack wasn't enough of a slap in the face to your loved ones? Sure, it’s decorative, but it’s deceptively festive, and that’s the wrong flavor of festive. Focus next time on gingerbread or candy canes, you know? Happy Holidays?

There must have been some magic in…
 Those old starfish they found.
 For when they placed them on his chest…
 …the sand just crumbled away. It was horrible. I’ll never forget the expression on poor Snowy’s face as he was washed away in the surf.

Decorative Presents. Really? That's like decorative food. What’s the point? There are no calories and the point of food is calories. If you take the time to wrap a present, put a present in the present! This is just twisted and cruel! Not cool. Happy Holidays?

J.P. Frostbaum has done it again! Frozen water perfectly preserved in a plastic replica of a single newborn snowflake. No one else could have brought perfection like this to you. No one else loves faux decorative designing like J.P. No one loves you… like J.P.

My brother had a jar that he kept a cricket in when I was younger. He punched some holes in the lid, and would drop some grass and stuff in it occasionally, just to keep the little guy happy.\n\nThen he got a lizard. We never saw the cricket again.

A holiday gathering? Of course, but in order to meet your "festive quota" for such a soiree, don't forget your checklist. Finger foods? Lavashly garnished beverages? Live music by an impoverished artist? An abundant supply of garish household décor? No, one can never have too much decor! Add “This” to your collection, and be envied by all!

You know how sometimes you go to those import stores, and you find something you know to be handcrafted. And it's marked down half price. And you think to yourself "Is this the find?" And you pick it up, looking for flaws, imperfections, and there are none. And you toss it in your cart, thinking "It is, I found the holiday find!"\n\nYea, I made that.

When I was a kid, I always wanted to go to this mythical Gar Land place. I thought it was going to be this incredible fishing hole that only existed in December.\n\nImagine my disappointment. This is nice though yea? Yea. it's nice.

Tired of smoky residue in your flue, carrying heavy logs to your hearth, and spending unwanted effort on match striking? Put that all aside. Faux Fireplace Facades are the future my friends!\n\nBask in the glow of your imagination, and enter the world of tomorrow.
A great speaker for indoor and outdoor use. Listen to holiday music all day long.
An elegant table designed for the holidays. Draped with beautiful printed fabric displaying star, snowflake and tree patterns. 100% polyester. Gift wrapping not available.

Now that the full sugar skull collection has been acquired, place one of each skull within a Sugar Skull Display Case to unlock the ability to "Honor the Dead". When this interaction is selected, colorful smoke will spill forth and a unique tenth skull that's gilded and resplendent shall appear.
Frogs are found in and around logs, water pumps, and fishing holes.
No fruit unclaimed. No flower unfound. Congratulations! The Sim Gardening Society is in awe of your collection.
Gardening plants and fruits can be grown, spliced, or sometimes found out in the wild.
Aliens are found by going to space in the rocket ship.

Voidcritters are acquired by ordering booster packs from the computer. Rarer cards may be found by children who search for discarded toys in trash cans or underneath logs that are scattered around the world.

Congratulations! You've cracked your way to a complete collection of all the festive holiday plushies. How cute are they? They'll really add some much needed adorableness to your display of rocks and frogs.

The Sims 4 Holiday Celebration Pack must be installed to collect holiday cracker plushies.\n\nHoliday crackers can be acquired by ordering them from a computer. They're known to have festive Meduso plushies (and other treats!) pop out for good boys and girls.

Congratulations, this household has completed the Buried Treasure collection!

The Sulani Preservation Society encourages the collection of historical artifacts found throughout the Sulani Islands. Among the objects that can be taken home include carved jewelry, out-of-print coins, and hair grooming items. The coins are of particular interest as ancestral Sulani Islanders were never reported to have printed hard metal currency.\n\nWhen a collection is complete, certification recognizing the curator's efforts will be sent in the mail within the next day or two.

Bull Terriers can be both independent and stubborn and for this reason are not considered suitable for an inexperienced dog owner. A Bull terrier has an even temperament and is amenable to discipline.
Known to be an exceptionally agile jumper, the Siberian is a strong and powerfully built cat, with strong hindquarters and large, well rounded paws and an equally impressive large full tail.
American Longhair description. Jill to change this.

The Korat is a natural breed, and one of the oldest stable cat breeds. Known colloquially as the "good luck cat". Traditionally, they are given in pairs to newlyweds or people who are highly esteemed, for good luck. Until recently, Korats were not sold, but only given as gifts.

Pointers are even-tempered, congenial dogs, and despite their large size, make good house pets so long as they get sufficient exercise due to their extremely high energy levels. Pointers are intelligent, affectionate, clean and intensely loyal.

Giant Schnauzers are usually a quiet breed. Due to its breeding, the Giant Schnauzer is inherently suspicious of strangers and can be very territorial. Once introduced, it is usually accepting of novel people or situations.

Cockers are compassionate, determined, kind, intelligent, athletic, alert and resilient and make great family pets. The breed does not like being alone, and will bond strongly to an individual person in a family, usually the one who feeds it.

The poodle is a group of formal dog breeds, the Standard Poodle, Miniature Poodle and Toy Poodle. The Fédération Cynologique Internationale (FCI) recognizes four sizes of one breed: standard, medium, miniature, and toy. Poodles exist in many coat colors. The origins of the poodles are still discussed. Jill will change this.

The borzoi is a quiet, but athletic and independent dog. Most borzois are almost silent, barking only very rarely. They do not have strong territorial drives and cannot be relied on to raise the alarm upon sighting a human intruder.

The breed is typically highly energetic, requiring a great deal of exercise and attention. An Australian shepherd enjoys working, whether it is learning and practicing tricks, competing in dog agility, or engaging in any other physically and mentally involving activity.

The Redbone Coonhound is affectionate, gentle, and should have a strong desire to please its owner.The breed is known for its distinctive "drawling" bark, also known as a bay. Hunters who use the breed follow the sound of the voice as the dogs track quarry.
A gentle but at times strong-willed, mischievous gun dog, the English Setter was bred for a mix of endurance and athleticism, it is used to hunt for game such as quail, pheasant, and grouse.

The American Shorthair is a breed of domestic cat believed to be descended from European cats brought to North America by early settlers to protect valuable cargo from mice and rats. Jill should replace this wiki text as this is Placeholder

Tonkinese are intelligent, active, vocal and generally people-oriented cats, playful and interested in everything going on around them; however, this also means they are easily susceptible to becoming lonesome or bored.

Although individual differences in personality exist, common traits exist throughout the Staffords. Due to its breeding, and history, the Staffordshire Bull Terrier is known for its character of fearlessness and loyalty. This, coupled with its affection for its friends, its off-duty quietness and trustworthy stability, make it a foremost all-purpose dog.

The extreme docility of some individuals has led to the myth that Ragdolls are pain resistant. Some breeders in Britain have tried to breed away from the limpness owing to concerns that extreme docility "might not be in the best interests of the cat".

Scotties are territorial, alert, quick moving and feisty, perhaps even more so than other terrier breeds. The breed is known to be independent and self-assured, playful, intelligent and has been nicknamed the 'Diehard' because of its rugged nature and endless determination.

The German Shepherd (German: Deutscher Schäferhund, German pronunciation: [ˈʃɛːfɐˌhʊnt]) is a breed of medium to large-sized working dog that originated in Germany. The breed's officially recognized name is German Shepherd Dog in the English language, sometimes abbreviated as GSD and was also formerly known as the Alsatian in Britain. Jill will change this wikipedia sourced text.

Irish Setters get along well with children, other dogs, and will enthusiastically greet visitors. Even though they do well with household pets, small animals may pose a problem for this breed, as they are a hunting breed.
Puggles are great family dogs, they love to be around kids and are very friendly. They have characteristics of beagles, meaning they love to sniff for things and are excellent jumpers.

Vizslas are very high energy, gentle-mannered, loyal, caring, and highly affectionate. They quickly form close bonds with their owners, children and even strangers. Often they are referred to as "velcro" dogs because of their loyalty and affection.

The Colorpoint Shorthair is a highly intelligent, playful, and people-friendly breed. They are extremely affectionate and outgoing and enjoy lounging around and playing with people, causing them to also be described as "extroverts". They can also be very sensitive with nervous temperaments, which do not adapt well to changes of environment or to strangers.

The Manx is considered a social and gregarious cat, and very attached to humans, but also shy of strangers. The breed is said to be highly intelligent, playful, and in its behaviour reminiscent of dogs.

Ibizan Hounds are "escapologists": they are able to jump incredible heights from a standstill, so they need very tall fences. They also have been known to climb, and many can escape from crates, open baby gates and even locks.

The Maine Coon is a large and sociable cat, hence its nickname, "the gentle giant." It is characterized by a prominent ruff along its chest, robust bone structure, rectangular body shape, a silky flowing coat, and a long, bushy tail.
The Bichon Frise loves human company and demands much of your attention. They are generally very sociable and do well with an owner that takes them along on outings.

Mastiff type means a large molosser dog. The term "mastiff type" has been used synonymously with the term "molosser". For example, the bulldog breeds, the Great Dane, the mountain dogs, the pit bulls and even smaller dogs such as the Boston terrier, may be considered "mastiff types" in this broad sense.

Rottweilers are a powerful breed with well-developed genetic herding and guarding instincts. Potentially dangerous behaviour in Rottweilers usually results from irresponsible ownership, abuse, neglect, or lack of socialisation and training.

Javanese are noted as an intelligent cat that tends to vocalize, though often for no apparent reason. They are notably fond of play, jumping and human contact and allegedly depressed if regularly not entertained by humans or other pets. They are reportedly good mouse hunters.

The Airedale can be used as a working dog and also as a hunting dog. Airedales exhibit some herding characteristics as well, and have a propensity to chase animals. They have no problem working with cattle and livestock.

The temperament of a papillon is a happy, friendly, adventurous dog. They are not shy or aggressive. Papillon's make excellent family dogs but should be watched around little children, as should any dog, due to a small child's lack of understanding of a dog's behavior and the likelihood that they will do something to upset the dog.

A tabby is any domestic cat that has a coat featuring distinctive stripes, dots, lines or swirling patterns, usually together with a mark resembling an 'M' on its forehead. Tabbies are sometimes erroneously assumed to be a cat breed. Jill will change this.

The Weimaraner is a large dog that was originally bred for hunting in the early 19th century. Early Weimaraners were used by royalty for hunting large game such as boar, bear, and deer. Jill will change this.

The Italian Greyhound makes a good companion dog and enjoys the company of people. However, the breed's slim build and short coat make them somewhat fragile, and injury can result from rough or careless play with children.
Whippets are quiet and not prone to barking, but require regular exercise. They are generally gentle dogs and may be content to spend much of the day resting.

The breed is often described by the Latin phrase multum in parvo, or "much in little" or "a lot of dog in a small space", alluding to the Pug's remarkable and charming personality, despite its small size.

The Pekingese breed is over 2000 years old and has hardly changed in all that time. The Pekingese's flat face and large eyes are some of the breeds most obvious characteristics. The body is compact and low to the ground.

Norwegian Forest cats have a quiet voice but can develop a loud voice if kept in a house with a dog. They are friendly, intelligent, and generally good with people. The Norwegian Forest cat has a lot of energy and can be very demanding of attention.

The Bulldog is a breed with characteristically wide head and shoulders along with a pronounced mandibular prognathism. There are generally thick folds of skin on a Bulldog's brow; round, black, wide-set eyes; a short muzzle with characteristic folds called a rope or nose roll above the nose; hanging skin under the neck; drooping lips and pointed teeth, and an underbite with an upturned jaw.
A domesticated canine descended from multiple breeds, often propagating without any intervention, record-keeping or selective reproduction. Commonly known as Mutts.

Beagles are noisy hunting dogs. They look best while wearing old timey detective hats. This is placeholder text that Jill should change. It will be seen in CAP, probably the gallery, and perhaps in live mode.

Having been bred as an indoor monastery sentinel dog by Tibetan Buddhist monks, Lhasa Apsos are alert with a keen sense of hearing. The ideal Lhasa temperament is to be wary of strangers while being loyal to those closest to them.
A foxhound is a type of large hunting hound bred for strong hunting instincts, great energy, and, like all scent hounds, a keen sense of smell.

Keeshonden tend to be very playful, with quick reflexes and strong jumping ability. They are eager to please and very quick learners, which means they are also quick to learn things their humans did not intend to teach them.

The Greyhound is a breed of dog, a sighthound which has been bred for coursing game and Greyhound racing. Since the rise in large-scale adoption of retired racing Greyhounds, it has seen a resurgence in popularity as a family pet. Jill will change this wikipedia sourced text
The folklore surrounding black cats varies from culture to culture. Some see them as a symbol of prosperity, while others see them as a symbol of luck; either good or bad.

Chow Chows tend to display discernment of strangers and can become fiercely protective of their owners and property. For these reasons, some owners have attributed a cat-like personality to the Chow Chow.

Egyptian Maus are a small- to medium-sized short-haired cat breed. Along with the Bahraini Dilmun cat, they are one of the few naturally spotted breeds of domesticated cat. The spots of the Mau occur on only the tips of the hairs of its coat.

The German Shorthaired Pointer was developed to be a dog suited for family life as well as a versatile hunter. Therefore their temperament is that of an intelligent, bold, boisterous, eccentric, and characteristically affectionate dog that is cooperative and easily trained.
This breed is gentle, and is tireless when following a scent. Because of its strong tracking instinct, it can be willful and somewhat difficult to obedience train and handle on a leash.

In the wild, this cat is an excellent fisher and hunter, which may explain why the Kurilian loves to play in water. The Kurilian's wild look is not reflected in the temperament of the breed. It is known for its clever and gentle nature.
Labradors have a reputation as a very even-tempered breed and an excellent family dog. This includes a good reputation with children of all ages and other animals.

Dalmatian serves as a firehouse mascot and is sometimes used to educate the public in fire safety, but in the days of horse-drawn fire carts, they provided a valuable service, having a natural affinity to horses.

The Devon Rex is a breed of cat with a curly, very soft short coat similar to that of the Cornish Rex. They are often associated with being one of the most hypoallergenic cats available because of their type of coat. However, they are technically not hypoallergenic.
Considered highly intelligent, extremely energetic, acrobatic and athletic, Border Collies frequently compete with great success in sheepdog trials and dog sports.

Jack Russells are first and foremost a working terrier. Originally bred to bolt fox from their dens during hunts, they are used on numerous ground-dwelling quarry such as groundhog, badger, and red and grey fox.

The Balinese is a long-haired breed of domestic cat with Siamese-style point coloration and sapphire-blue eyes. The Balinese is also known as the purebred long-haired Siamese, since it originated as a natural mutation of that breed, and hence is essentially the same cat with a medium-length silky coat and a distinctively plumed tail.

The collie is a medium-sized, fairly lightly built dog, with a pointed snout. Many types have a distinctive white pattern over the shoulders. Collies are very active and agile, and most types of collies have a very strong herding instinct.

The Bombay cat breed is a type of short-haired cats developed by breeding sable Burmese and black American Shorthair cats, to produce a cat of mostly Burmese type, but with a sleek, panther-like black coat.

Like many working dogs, the Australian Cattle Dog has high energy levels, an active mind, and a level of independence. The Australian Cattle Dog is a sturdy, muscular, compact dog that gives the impression of agility and strength.

Bluetick Coonhounds are bred to be hunting dogs. They are athletic, hardy, and need a full-time job or activity such as hunting, obedience, or agility to stay happy. They can be challenging to train and they should be monitored around cats or other small animals.

Irish wolfhounds have a varied range of personalities and are most often noted for their personal quirks and individualism. An Irish wolfhound, however, is rarely mindless, and despite its large size is rarely found to be destructive in the house or boisterous.

Turkish Angora cats are playful, intelligent, athletic and involved. They bond with humans, but often select a particular member of the family to be their constant companion. They are in turn, very protective of their person.

Some Savannahs are reported to be very social and friendly with new people and other cats and dogs, while others may run and hide or revert to hissing and growling when seeing a stranger. Exposure to other people and pets is most likely the key factor in sociability as Savannah kittens grow up.

The ideal Yorkshire Terrier character or "personality" is described with a "carriage very upright" and "conveying an important air." Though small, the Yorkshire Terrier is active, very overprotective, curious, and fond of attention.

The French Bulldog, like many other companion dog breeds, requires close contact with humans. They have fairly minimal exercise needs, but do require at least daily short walks. The French Bulldog is sometimes called "Frog dog" or a "Clown dog".
The general appearance of the Sheltie is that of a miniature Rough Collie. They are a small, double coated, working dog, agile and sturdy.
The American Eskimo is an affectionate, loving dog. The breed is easy to train and they are excellent with children because of the dog's high intelligence and its willingness to please.

Irish Terriers are active dogs and need and enjoy consistent mental and physical challenges. Full of life, but not hyperactive; it should be able to relax inside the house and be roused to full activity level quickly.

The Somalis are recognized for their bushy tails, large almond eyes, and large pointed ears, earning the breed its nickname of "Fox Cat." Their ticked coats, containing between four and twenty colors on each hair, are very fine in texture, making their coats softer to the touch.

Rhodesian ridgebacks are loyal, intelligent, and somewhat aloof to strangers. This breed requires positive, reward-based training, good socialization and consistency; it is often not the best choice for inexperienced dog owners.
The German Rex is a medium-sized breed with slender legs of a medium length.It is considered a very friendly cat and quickly bonds with its owner. It is lively, playful, and intelligent.

Ocicats are friendly and sociable and are not often shy around strangers. This makes them good family pets, and most can also get along well with animals of other species. Their temperament is similar to that of a dog and are often referred to as a "dog in a cat's body".

Known for a stubborn, mischievous, and headstrong temperament, it also chases small animals. The Schipperke is sometimes referred to as the "little black fox", the "Tasmanian black devil", or the "little black devil". They are naturally curious and high-energy dogs and require ample exercise and supervision.

The Shiba is a relatively fastidious breed and feels the need to maintain itself in a clean state. They can often be seen licking their paws and legs, much like a cat. They generally go out of their way to keep their coats clean.
A bicolor cat or piebald cat is a cat with white fur combined with fur of some other color, for example black or tabby.
The Akita is a powerful, independent and dominant breed, commonly aloof with strangers but affectionate with family members.

Samoyeds' friendly disposition makes them poor guard dogs; an aggressive Samoyed is rare. The breed is characterized by an alert and happy expression which has earned the nicknames "Sammie smile" and "smiley dog".

Bernese are outdoor dogs at heart, though well-behaved in the house; they need activity and exercise, but do not have a great deal of endurance. They can move with amazing bursts of speed for their size when motivated.

Although a Shih Tzu's temperament varies from dog to dog, the breed has a personality and temperament that is loyal, affectionate, outgoing, and alert. Training and proper socializing must start at a young age for the Shih Tzu to obey basic commands, for the Shih Tzu is prone to stubbornness when it comes to training.
The British Shorthair is the pedigreed version of the traditional British domestic cat, with a distinctively chunky body, dense coat and broad face. Jill will change this wikipedia sourced text.

American Wirehairs are similar to American Shorthairs, with the exception of a springy, wiry coat, including ear fur, and whiskers. This coat is similar to the wire coats of some dog breeds, such as terriers. Their fur requires little grooming, although lighter cats may require sunblock.

The original Siberian Huskies were bred by the Chukchi people — whose hunter-gatherer culture relied on their help. It is an active, energetic, resilient breed, whose ancestors lived in the extremely cold and harsh environment of the Siberian Arctic.

The Bengal is a domestic cat breed developed to look like exotic jungle cats such as leopards, ocelots, margays and clouded leopards. Bengal cats were developed by the selective breeding of domestic cats and hybrids of the asian leopard cat.

The breed is highly affectionate, playful, extremely patient and eager to please. As such, dogs of the breed are good with children and other dogs. Cavaliers are not shy about socialising with much larger dogs.

The Russian Blue is a cat breed that comes in colors varying from a light shimmering silver to a darker, slate grey. They develop close bonds with their owners and are sought out as pets due to their personalities, beauty and coat.
The typical Spaniel is friendly, eager to please, quick to learn and willing to obey. In the right circumstances they can be an affectionate and easy-going family dog.

Orientals are social, intelligent, and many are rather vocal. They often remain playful into adulthood, with many enjoying playing fetch. Despite their slender appearance, they are athletic and can leap into high places.

Chartreux cats are also known for their "smile": due to the structure of their heads and their tapered muzzles, they often appear to be smiling. Chartreux are exceptional hunters and are highly prized by farmers.
The Havanese is a toy dog. It is smart and can be easily trained. It is best to train this dog at a young age, because some habits will stick as they become older.

Alaskan Malamutes are still in use as sled dogs for personal travel, hauling freight, or helping move light objects; some, however, are used for the recreational pursuit of sledding, also known as mushing, as well as for skijoring, bikejoring, carting, and canicross.
The Japanese Bobtail is a breed of domestic cat with an unusual "bobbed" tail more closely resembling the tail of a rabbit than that of other cats.
A tame feline descended from multiple/unknown breeds, often propagating without any intervention, record-keeping or selective reproduction. Commonly known as Domestic or Tomcats.

Pharaoh Hounds have no link with Ancient Egypt. However, a popular myth holds that the breed is descended from the Tesem, one of the ancient Egyptian hunting dogs. Some believe that there are similarities between the breed and images of dogs found on the walls of ancient Egyptian tombs.
Boxers were originally bred to be medium-size guard dogs. Today, although they are a part of the AKC’s Working Group, they mostly find homes as loving family companions. Jill will change this later.

Originally, all Burmese cats were dark brown (sable), but are now available in a wide variety of colours; formal recognition of these also varies by standard. Both versions of the breed are known for their uniquely social and playful temperament and persistent vocalisation.

The Newfoundlands have webbed feet and a water-resistant coat. Known for its calm and docile nature and its strength. They are highly loyal and make ideal working dogs. It is for this reason that this breed is known as "the gentle giant".
Pit bulls were created by breeding bulldogs and terriers together to produce a dog that combined the gameness and agility of the terrier with the strength of the bulldog.

The Smooth Fox Terrier is a highly energetic dog, and thus not recommended for first time dog owners. As the breed was originally bred to go after small animals they also have a high prey instinct, they are very friendly dogs and don't mind strangers.

Siamese are usually very affectionate and intelligent cats, renowned for their social nature. Many enjoy being with people and are sometimes described as "extroverts". Often they bond strongly to a single person. Some Siamese are extremely vocal, with a loud, low-pitched voice—known as "Meezer", from which they get one of their nicknames.
The Abyssinian is a breed of domestic short-haired cat with a distinctive "ticked" tabby coat, in which individual hairs are banded with different colors.
Cocker Spaniels were originally bred as hunting dogs with the term cocker deriving from their use to hunt the Eurasian woodcock.

The St. Bernard or St Bernard is a breed of very large working dog from the western Alps in Switzerland, Italy and France, originally bred at the Great and Little St Bernard Pass for rescue. Jill will change this.

Pomeranians are typically friendly, playful and lively but can be aggressive to other dogs and try to prove themselves. Pomeranians are alert and aware of changes in their environment, and barking at new stimuli can develop into a habit of barking excessively in any situation.

The English Foxhound is a pack hound, therefore, it gets along well with other dogs and enjoys human companionship. It gets along with horses, children, and other pets, as it is a gentle, social, and tolerant breed.

Miniature Pinschers are for experienced dog owners. The Miniature Pinscher is an assertive, outgoing, active and independent breed. Miniature pinschers are energetic and need a fenced in yard to run in; they make great agility dogs.

Although they are considered to be working dogs, Doberman Pinschers are often stereotyped as being ferocious and aggressive. As a personal protection dog, the Doberman was originally bred for these traits.

The Great Dane is a large German breed of domestic dog known for its giant size. The German name of the breed is Deutsche Dogge, or German Mastiff. The French name is Dogue Allemand. The Great Dane is one of the tallest dog breeds. Jill will change this.

The Brittany was originally bred as a hunting dog and noted for being easy to train and sweet-natured. The breed is generally more sensitive to correction than other hunters, and harsh corrections are often unnecessary.
Usually easy to train, Miniature Schnauzers tend to be excellent watchdogs with a good territorial instinct, but more inclined toward barking than biting.

The Havana Brown is an intelligent cat that often uses its paws both to examine objects and to communicate with its owners. Curiosity brings them to the door as visitors arrive rather than preferring to be hidden as many cats will do.

The Scottish Fold is a breed of domestic cat with a natural dominant-gene mutation that affects cartilage throughout the body, causing the ears to "fold", bending forward and down towards the front of their head, which gives the cat what is often described as an "owl-like" appearance.
The Basenji is alert, energetic, curious and reserved with strangers. The Basenji tends to become emotionally attached to a single human. Basenjis may not get along with non-canine pets.
Sphynxes are known for their extroverted behavior. They display a high level of energy, intelligence, curiosity, and affection for their owners.

The breed standards describe the ideal Old English Sheepdog as never being nervous or aggressive. The Old English Sheepdog comes from the very old pastoral type dogs but no records were kept of the dogs, and everything about the earliest types is guesswork.

The Black and Tan Coonhound makes a suitable pet: it is mellow, amiable, calm, and unobtrusive indoors; outdoors, its strong hunting instinct takes over and it can be difficult to turn it from tracking after it starts trailing.

The British Longhair is a longer-haired development from the longstanding British Shorthair breed. In the mid-20th century, British Shorthairs were interbred with imported long-haired varieties with an aim to producing more stout and round-faced stock, while retaining the short coat

Schnauzer comes from the German word for "snout" and means colloquially "moustache", because of the dog's distinctively bearded snout. Although the schnauzer is considered a terrier-type dog, they do not have the typical terrier temperament.

The Boston Terrier is a gentle breed that typically has a strong, happy-go-lucky, and friendly personality with a merry sense of humour. Bostons are generally eager to please their owner and can be easily trained.

The Irish Red and White setter can be the most devoted and affectionate of dogs making them ideal all-round family dogs. They are extremely intelligent and respond well to proper training but they do need to have plenty to occupy them.

Portuguese Water dogs make excellent companions.They are loving, independent, and intelligent and are easily trained in obedience and agility skills. Once introduced, they are generally friendly to strangers, and enjoy being petted, which, due to their soft, fluffy coats, is a favour that human beings willingly grant them.

Toy Fox Terriers, like many active and intelligent breeds, can learn to respond to a number of words. Toy Fox Terriers were used commonly in circus shows by clowns, and they are said to make great companions for owners with a good sense of humor.
Polish Lowland Sheepdogs are stable and self-confident. They have an excellent memory and can be well trained, but may dominate a weak-willed owner.

The Birman, also called the "Sacred Cat of Burma",[1] is a domestic cat breed. The Birman is a long-haired, color-pointed cat distinguished by a silky coat, deep blue eyes, and contrasting white "gloves" or "socks" on each paw.

The temperament of the typical Afghan Hound can be aloof and dignified, but happy and clownish when it's playing. This breed, as is the case with many sighthounds, has a high prey drive and may not get along with small animals.

The Curly Coated Retriever was originally developed as a gun dog and their temperament and conformation reflect this purpose. Curlies are still used in many countries as bird hunting companions, including in both upland and waterfowl hunting.

The oriental longhair is a really active cat that likes to play a lot. If the owner does not have the time to do so, it will find a toy to play on its own. This breed enjoys jumping and does it really well, without breaking any objects due to its agility and elegance.

The quintessential Chesapeake Bay Retriever has a bright and happy disposition, intelligence, quiet good sense, and an affectionate protective nature. Some can be quite vocal when happy, and some will 'smile' by baring their front teeth in a peculiar grin.

Husky is a general name for a sled-type of dog used in northern regions, differentiated from other sled-dog types by their fast pulling style. They are an ever-changing cross-breed of the fastest dogs.
The Singapura is one of the smallest breeds of cats, noted for its large eyes and ears, brown ticked coat and blunt tail.

A Goldendoodle is a cross-breed obtained by breeding a golden retriever with a poodle. The original purpose of the cross was to attempt to develop guide dogs suitable for visually impaired individuals with allergies.

The Otterhound is a large, rough-coated hound with an imposing head. Originally bred for hunting, it has great strength and a strong body with long striding steps. This makes it able to perform prolonged hard work.

The Persian cat is a long-haired breed of cat characterized by its round face and short muzzle. In Britain, it is sometimes called the Longhair or Persian Longhair. It is also known as the Shirazi cat or Iranian cat, particularly in the Middle East. Jill will change this.

The Field Spaniel can be a good family dog while it has a job to do. They are suitable for dog agility and hunting. Without some sort of purpose, the dog can often try to amuse itself and cause mischief.

The temperament of the West Highland White Terrier can vary greatly, with some being friendly towards children, whilst others prefer solitude. It will not tolerate rough handling such as a child pulling on its ears, and can be both food- and toy-possessive.
The LaPerm is in many ways a cat of moderation with no extremes and is still true to its original type. It does however have an unusual coat.

The Welsh Springer Spaniel is active, loyal, and affectionate. They may meet strangers barking when in their territory, or act aloof, cautious or wary. The breed is well known for being friendly and demonstrative to all members of the family, especially children, and accepting other pets of the household with a friendly, playful attitude.

Two of the wire fox terrier's most distinctive traits are its energy and intelligence. It has a low threshold for boredom and requires stimulation, exercise and attention. The wire fox terrier is a companion animal that requires near-constant attention.
Calico cats are domestic cats with a spotted or particolored coat that is predominantly white, with patches of two other colors.

How a Chihuahua turns out depends mightily on the genetic temperament of his parents and grandparents. Chihuahuas can be easily provoked to attack, and are therefore generally unsuitable for homes with small children. The breed tends to be fiercely loyal to one particular person and in some cases may become over protective of the person, especially around other people or animals.

Distinguished by their long beards and eyebrows, Standard Schnauzers are always pepper and salt or less commonly black in color, with a stiff and wiry hair coat on the body similar to that of other wirehaired breeds.

The American Bobtail is an uncommon breed of domestic cat which was developed in the late 1960s. It is most notable for its stubby "bobbed" tail about one-third to one-half the length of a normal cat's tail.

The Golden Retriever is a large-sized breed of dog bred as gun dogs to retrieve shot waterfowl such as ducks and upland game birds during hunting and shooting parties, and were named 'retriever' because of their ability to retrieve shot game undamaged. Jill will change this and likely remove references to guns and things that they shoot.
These cats are sweet-tempered, intelligent, and generally very social and good companions. Because of their heritage from the Siamese cats, they tend to be more active than Persians.

Toddlers have arrived! There are three ways to bring these adorable little ones into your Sims lives. You can add them to your families in Create a Sim, age them up from a baby, or even adopt them. Bring them into your world and enjoy the special (but sometimes chaotic) moments one can only experience with toddlers.
Show your little Sims love and affection as you teach them to walk, talk, and use the potty. Help develop their minds by reading them stories, playing with flash cards, and stacking building blocks.
Feed your Toddlers in their high chair, tuck them in at night in their tiny toddler beds, and decorate their room with new furniture and decals. These objects and more can be found in Build Mode.
Have your Sims love and care for them.

Love is in the air! Jasmine is back in town, and playing the role of Cupid. This week only, your Sims’ can get that first kiss, hot date, or even married three times faster than usual! Just ask Jasmine for a boost that will help you hit your relationship goals three times faster. Woohoo!

After setting a Club hangout, try customizing it to accommodate your Clubs' interests!
Group Activities have never been easier to do! Form a Group under the Actions menu when clicking on Sims.
You can hire Sims to serve as staff on objects, like a DJ for the DJ booth.
A bush can come in handy when needing a nap... or a way to relieve one's bladder.
Try pairing up Sims you think are a good match! Select Hook Up With under Other Sims to do so.
Sims are free to do things naked! Just make sure there are no kids around.

Not feeling like joining any of the Clubs around town? Try creating your own Club using the Club Manager Panel!
You can purchase powerful Club Perks from the Club Panel!
Show everyone your Clubs' style by setting a unique Club Outfit from the Club Panel.

Tired of swimming in boring old chlorinated water? Build Mode’s got you covered.

The higher the Handiness Skill the more masterpieces your Sims can create with the Pumpkin Carving Station!
Grab a treat from the Sugar and Spice Candy Bowl! Go ahead, it won’t bite… much.
Try some new and delicious recipes like Cheese Eyeballs and the Zombie Cake that will delight your guests at any party!

Children can perform puppet shows to advance their Social skill. Higher Social skill allows them to perform new shows!
Only children can see the true elemental powers of Voidcritters when they’re brought to life on the battle station.
