Wind Chimes: Metallic, Ceramic, and Bamboo... low, medium, and high pitches too! What can't they do?
When adding seeds to the Bird Feeder, beware of the angry birds...
Hit the gym before attempting tricks on Lawn Water Slides. Your Sims' Fitness or Motor skill dictates how often they wipeout.
Interact with a Yoga Instructor to start a Yoga Class!
There are multiple varieties of Incense to try! Each one will make your Sim react in different ways, so try them all!
Sims getting bored while meditating? Try improving their Wellness Skill and bring them to enlightenment!
Mastering Wellness Skill will enable your Sims to do advanced yoga poses and give a variety of great massages.
Sims with high Wellness Skill can socialize with other Sims to help boost their emotions and control their motives!
As utterly relaxing as the sauna is, beware overindulging in the steam!
Enjoy a refreshing mud bath or soak in any type of bath tub at home or at the spa!
The secret ability of teleportation is within the grasp of Sims who have high Wellness Skill!
Improve your Wellness Skill by reading books on Wellness, practicing Yoga, meditating on the meditation stool, and by giving massages at home.
Have you visited The Perfect Balance Spa yet? We think you should.
Set a dress code for you restaurant to keep your guests looking good.
Check out the Chef’s Choice on each menu to get some great dishes at a great value.
Want a multi-course meal? Place an order for the 1st course and after it arrives, put in another order. Repeat until stuffed.
Hire more Restaurant employees to speed up your business. (But it will cost you some profit).
Restaurant ratings can change over time if they’re left open; even when you’re not there. Check your businesses frequently.
Coach your Restaurant employees to ensure your Diners get the best possible service.
Keeping tables close to the chef station can decrease food wait times.
Comping food & drink is a great way to increase ratings (at the expense of profit).
Pay attention to the needs of your customers and react quickly to secure high ratings.
Dishes paired with the correct red or white nectar can make a meal that much better for a Sim.
Sims with high cooking skill should try and learn all experimental dishes.
Feeling chilly outside? Warm up with the heat lamp!
Loved the food you ate today? Remember to compliment the chef by talking to them or the waiter!
Have you checked out all the restaurants that came with Dine Out yet? Go find them in “My Library”!
Take the restaurant with you and place the chef station object at home! You can hire a chef or even cook at it yourself.
Customize your restaurant menus with anything you want! Just don’t go over 30 items in each category.
Is your child going through a troublesome phase? Ask them about it to get tips on passing through it more quickly.
Asking for help from parents and siblings is a way to improve the quality of your school project.
Make sure to hide your journal under the mattress to help prevent snooping siblings from reading it.
When children are ignoring a parent's discipline technique, a time out or grounding is in order.
Leave a kind note for a Sim on the family bulletin board to improve relationships.
Kids will ask for advice from time to time, and how a parent responds affects their Character Values.
Sims with the Responsibility Trait will naturally be better at their jobs.
Show some love and pack a Sim a Sack Lunch!
Sims can play instruments to relieve negative emotions (requires instrument Skill level 4.)
To learn more about Character Values, hover over a kid's Simology Panel.
Poisoning can turn deadly, but the locals of Selvadorada may be familiar with an antidote.
In stock adventuring gear changes regularly, so visit the Puerto Llamante Marketplace often!
To alter a Sim’s mood while exploring the Belomisia Jungle, seek out a scenic view or try tasting a wild berry.
The jungle of Selvadorada has many trials (and many biting critters), but a jack-of-all-skills can clear a path with ease.
The ancient Omiscan builders protected their civilization’s secrets by developing techniques that changed the layout of the structures to confuse intruders.
The Curio Shop stocks many hard-to-find items that might be useful in your investigation.
Feeling lost? Chat with the residents of StrangerVille and see what they know!
Things haven’t been the same in StrangerVille since the secret lab was built in the crater…
The native plants of StrangerVille may taste delicious, but they have some… side effects.
Your Sim might have to befriend the StrangerVille locals before they’ll give up their secrets.
Use the Listening Device to spy on your neighbors and to gather important information.
Some information is restricted to military personnel and government agents.
¥ØU ŞĦØUŁĐ ŇØŦ ĦΔV€ ĆØΜ€ Ħ€Ř€ ¥ØU ĆΔŇŇØŦ ŞŦØP Μ€
Soldiers and scientists can often be found grabbing a drink at the local bar.
Opportunity awaits in Newcrest! Make it yours! Visit or Move In via World Select.
Upgrading the Hot Tub can be quite beneficial for your Sims… try it and be amazed!
Just moved in? Look out for neighboring Sims that will be delighted to welcome you to your new home.
Skinny Dipping is highly encouraged in Hot tubs...
Cooking skill unlocks a wide variety of ice cream flavors. Add toppings and garnishes for the finishing touch!
Sims describe the flavor of Dragon’s Breath ice cream as a “slow burn”… If you’re lucky.
An ice cream diet?! The Taste of Diet flavor is almost too good to be true!
Chilling Mocha ice cream is best when “shared.” Try the Chilling Touch on friends & family.
Popcorn and scary movies don’t mix. Viewer beware!
Unleash your inner cinephile and opine upon actors, directors, scenes, and more, once a film’s credits roll.
Stay tuned for a special airing of “Plumbob Pickers: Top 10 Putrid Picks."
Agree. Awesome. Disagree. Insightful. Like. LOL. Zagadoo!
Wish for Simoleons when a Sim’s in need; the Whispering Wishing Well frowns on greed.
A seemingly harmless wish made at the Whispering Wishing Well may have unforeseen consequences.
Afterlife got you down? Ghosts can use the Whispering Wishing Well to return to life for a single Simoleon.
The many faces of the Whispering Wishing Well forewarn of a successful wish… or if your deepest desires will be turned against you.
When the reaper appears on the Whispering Wishing Well you wish at your own peril.
Feeling mischievous? Pour soap in the Fountain of Gluteus Maximus then stomp around inside for a bubbly good time!
It’s a well-known fact, wishing wells love Simoleons. Gaining favor with the Whispering Wishing Well may be well worth the asking price.
The Whispering Wishing Well knows all about love/hate relationships… try wishing for romance while the well is in a foul mood.
Drink platters created via the Globe Bar are an upscale way to whet your guest’s appetite at any social gathering.
Use the Vanity Table to apply a temporary makeup makeover for a hot date, or any other special occasion.
Get to know your butler. Their traits play a role in how effective they are at providing white-glove service.
Consider dismissing other recurring services after hiring a live-in butler. Butlers are trained to attend to many of your household’s needs.
Praise your butler if you feel they’ve provided 5 star service. Your appreciation will lift their mood for a spell, allowing them to work even faster.
Telling Stories is a great way to enjoy other Sim's company. Select a Sim and Tell a Group Story under Group Activities.
No fire to roast food? Refreshments can be stored in a Cooler.
Check each fishing location – different fish appear in different types of water.
Select your sim to lie on the ground and gaze up at the sky for some R&R.
Check back at different times of day to see what Insects come out.
Change Sims into their camping gear by selecting Plan Outfits on the Tent.
Mud in rain, water balloons in sun, and snowballs in snow—all can be used to start a throwing fight!
Ice and Roller Rinks will appear around the worlds during the seasons, but you don’t have to wait, you can place one on your lot from Build Mode.
Look in the Reward Store for new weather based traits which allow you to tell some interesting stories with your Sims.
Are you a gardener? Well don’t forget to check out the Reward Store for the Money Tree that your Sims can plant.
After you research a plant, information on that plant will be added to your Sim’s notebook accessible at the top of the phone menu.
There are lots of activities to do at a Campfire – roast some food, sing campfire songs, or just play with fire.
You can find rare collectibles by exploring space in the Rocket Ship!
Looking for new wall art? Try the Microscope or Observatory to get some beautiful prints.
The Microphone is a great way to practice comedy skill and amuse guests.
Gardening skill can lead you to grow the rare Cowplant. Completely safe as long as you feed it!
Looking for a quick way to change emotion? Try the Tea Magic Personal Brewer.
Like cupcakes? We do too! Try making some with the Cupcake Factory.
What power? The power of voodoo. Who do? You do...with high level Mischief skill!
Looking to bring gaming to the next level? Try searching for the Motion Gaming Rig in build mode.
What do we want? Half Walls! Where do we find them? In Build Mode!
Hey! Who locked the door? Let me in! - Keep unwanted guests at bay by locking doors.
If your Sim has high enough Handiness Skill, a miniature version of the Camping Mascot can be created at the Woodworking Table.
Toddlers need a Toddler Bed to sleep. Find them in the Toddler sort in the Kids section of the Build Mode catalog.
As Toddlers gain Movement skill they will be able to walk faster and eventually they can run.
Toddlers love picture books. Purchase Toddler Books from the bookcase.
As Toddlers gain communication skill they unlock new options for conversation and progress from babbling to complete sentences.
Imagination skill can be gained by playing with toys, playing with the dollhouse, or reading books.
Get all Toddler skills to level 3 or 5 before Aging Up to unlock special traits.
Gain skills and watch movies on the new Wabbit Tablet.
Do it together! Toddlers learn twice as fast when building skills with older Sims.
The Ranger Station is a good source for more camping information in addition to purchasing supplies.
Reading a camping magazine can be both relaxing and informational. Select Read Wilderness Digest on the Tent.
The tent isn’t just a place to sleep – relax, tell stories, or read The Wilderness Digest.
Fish can make great food, decorations, or even earn lots of Simoleons.
Telling Ghost Stories at night could attract strange, un-dead sims.
Waterfalls generally contain rare types of fish.
How hot is too hot? Try out the Curry Challenge at the Spice Festival.
Are you the ultimate geek? Test your programming and video game skills at GeekCon!
Food Stalls are a great way to discover new foods and unlock their recipes.
Schmooze with your Landlord often; who knows when you’ll need him/her to fix a thing or two…
Things keep breaking at your place? Magical Gnomes will fix them with the Gnomes Lot Trait!
Copy rooms, roof shapes, or stairs sizes by selecting them and using the copy tool.
Quickly find residential and commercial lot required objects by selecting the objects in the requirement panel.
Miss your friends? Give access to your place to close friends and family with a key and they’ll be sure to pay you a surprise visit.
To joke or to prank? That is the question. Choose your side at the Humor and Hijinks festival!
One Sim's trash is another Sim's treasure. Come buy and Trade collectibles at the Flea Market.
Learn your Romantic Destiny from the Romance Guru at the Romance Festival.
Need someone to talk to? Make a splash with the Potty Mouth 2.0!
Eating with Chopsticks isn’t easy at first, but just stick with it!
You can jam with more than your voice using the Singing Skill! Try using other instruments to sing and play.
Things just seem to go wrong with the Cursed Lot Trait… can’t say we didn’t warn you.
Eating poorly made Pufferfish Nigiri can cause a slight case of DEATH.
A Perfect Llama is every bowlers dream… throw ten strikes in a single game to accomplish this rare feat!
Sims with High Cooking Skill can fill the Fountain of Mirth with Cheese to create superb Cheese Dippers.
Sims with High Mixology Skill can extend the party with the Party Extender Punch.
Pressed for time? Not to worry. At a small cost you can make a feast using the Banquet Table.
Mischievous Sims can sabotage the Fountain of Mirth... Don't say we didn't warn you.
Toddlers with enough Imagination skill can Make Believe on the Toddler Jungle Gym to pretend they’re in outer space, or exploring a sunken shipwreck.
Toddler Play Dates are perfect events for building lasting friendships between the neighborhood’s tots.
Have you visited Magnolia Promenade? A world of shopping awaits!
Don’t be afraid to experiment! Inventions are the heart of the scientist career.
Run more experim... we mean tests, to get better diagnosis from your Patients.
Feeling sick? Recover faster by drinking Tea and Orange Juice.
You don't know what to expect when expecting? You can now deliver your baby at the Hospital!
A wise Detective takes their time and knows when they have enough clues to I.D. their perp.
Could the truth really be out there? Strange, dancing lights can lead to interesting out of body experiences.
Use your Sim’s phone to Buy a Retail Store.
You can earn Perk Points that are used to buy Retail Perks while running a store.
Your Sims can paint the world around them when they Paint from Reference on the easel. Paint all the things!
Expensive Cameras have more sizing options for photos as well as the ability to zoom.
The Baking skill allows Sims to bake delicacies on the Cupcake Factory as well as the stove.
As a Doctor, perform well at the hospital to unlock new socials, treatments and tests!
Use the new Move Lot tool in Build Mode to move your entire lot.
Have you looked at your Notebook yet? You can review its contents at the top of the Phone Menu.
Don’t forget to keep your pet’s food bowl filled. A full belly pet is a happy pet!
Pay attention to your pet’s thought balloons. They will give you a hint into what they need.
If you think your pet needs something but you’re not quite sure try asking your pet, “What’s Wrong.”
Leveling up your Pet Training Skill, you’ll be able to direct your dog to Perform Tricks. With luck, you might get some Simoleons from bystanders.
Each dog will need to learn tricks individually, but you will gain skill for teaching any dog.
Pets are loveable animals, don’t forget to hug and kiss them daily.
Your Pets are bound to misbehave, it’s up to you whether you let that misbehavior continue or teach them to stop.
If your Pet dislikes someone you want them to like, use the Be Nice To interaction.
If your Pet likes someone you want them to dislike, you can use the Be Mean To interaction.
Be nice to Patchy, and he might help you with your garden.
Plan events and holidays using the Calendar! You can only schedule one goaled event or Holiday per day.
Your gardening plants will grow based on the seasons, so check out their growing information in the tooltips and Notebook.
If you rake enough leaves you’ll get a large pile of leaves that your Sims can Burn, Play In, or even Woohoo in.
The Sprinkle-O-Matic is an easy way to keep your garden watered consistently, and is not a bad way to cool off from the heat.
Be careful of those mud puddles, they are quite slippery.
Upgrade Dr. June’s Weather Control Device and you might even be able to change the current season!
Sims can use friendly socials to declare love or hate for a particular weather or temperature.
Grow your own flowers? Make arrangements for free!
Have a green thumb? Join or make a career out of Gardening.
Gnomes love fun stuff – try appeasing them with a toy! Or else feel their wrath…
Giving a gift is as easy as having something in your Sim’s inventory!
If you want to be covered when it rains, don’t forget to place the Umbri Umbrella Rack on your lot and take an Umbrella!
When it’s hot out, a Kiddie Pool is the perfect place to relax for Sims of all ages.
You don't need Kava Roots to make Kava, but it is preferable.
Need some quick cash? Take on an odd job or two!
Need island fruit native to Sulani? Check the iLand Beach Shax!
Keep the island pristine and see what happens!
Don’t let your Vampire get a sunburn. Trust us!
There are ways to tame Vampire thirst without drinking from Sims.
Vampires reveal their Dark Form when drinking from Sims.
Search the midnight streets of Forgotten Hollow for a Vampire BFF!
Pour a cup of coffee and stay up late. Vampires are called Nightwalkers for a reason.
Becoming a Vampire can mean enduring multiple days of unusual ailments.
Study up on Vampire Lore to find out more about the ancient ones.
Vampires can turn into bats. Loveable, cuddly bats.
Search the paths of Forgotten Hollow for a chance of finding a rare Plasma Fruit.
All windows come with UV protection so vampires are safe indoors!
Vampires LOVE the short days in Forgotten Hollow. Other Sims, not so much.
Vampires gain experience, rank up, and unlock more powers.
Interactions with bat icons are related to Vampires.
Vampires take on weaknesses as they rank up. Choose wisely.
Sims improve at bowling as they play. Highly skilled bowlers will wear bowling gloves on the lane.
Sims will show up to bowl at Bars, Nightclubs, and Lounges that are equipped with bowling lanes.
Bars, Nightclubs, and Lounges equipped with bowling lanes offer late night Moonlight Bowling on weeknights.
Use bowling ball racks to change your ball’s color. Bowling kingpins can even use a clear skull ball, the stuff of legends.
Earbuds can be ordered from a computer. They're great for enjoying music on the go!
You don't need expensive and bulky workout equipment to stay in shape; try a workout video on your TV.
Successfully completing all of the endurance climb challenges on the Rock Wall grants access to a dangerous fire climb.
Piles of used clothing will start to stink. Place them in a Hamper to keep your home fresher longer.
Looking for an eco-friendly laundry alternative? Try using the Wash Tub and Clothesline.
Dryer lint traps are infamous for starting fires. Remember to clean yours before it becomes a problem.
Try adding laundry additives to your Washing Machine for some extra fragrance… or funk.
Tired of your pet rodent’s shenanigans? Order an IQ Limiter Treat from a PC or the Vet Clinic.
Pet rodents age faster than Sims. Order an Anti-Aging Treat from a PC or the Vet Clinic if you can’t bear losing them.
Don’t fret if your pet rodent escapes their habitat. They’ll be back, and they may even send you a postcard from their travels!
Keep your pet rodent well fed and their habitat clean, or they’ll start to dislike you.
Advanced stages of Rabid Rodent Fever are highly contagious, and left untreated will result in death.

Build a variety of restaurant venues from a classic diner to an upscale Italian bistro, or customize pre-made restaurants using new objects and décor. Personalize your space by adding an outdoor patio, comfy booth seating, or unique signage.
You are in control of owning and running a restaurant. Hire and outfit staff, set the menu and prices, and chat up diners to improve customer satisfaction!

Take your Sims out to enjoy a delicious meal with exceptional service. Restaurants are the perfect place to catch up with friends over brunch, spend time with family, or have a romantic date, all without having to do the dishes.

Sims with adventurous tastes can dig into new experimental cuisine that looks almost too good to eat! Serious foodies can snap food selfies to memorialize these edible masterpieces or learn to cook them at home.
A seemingly normal world shrouded in secrecy. Watch the world change before you as you dig deeper and deeper into the mystery. Unravel its secrets to the world, fall in love with its charm.

Join the all new Military Career, where your Sim can become a Grand Marshall. Or maybe take the path of a Covert Operator to keep tabs on suspicious (or maybe, not that suspicious *wink*) Sims in the world.
With the new StrangerVille Mystery Aspiration, your Sims will be in headfirst into the investigation. Can your Sims uncover what is truly behind what is plaguing the town?

Locals say ever since the Secret Lab got built, the town has been…acting weird. But the only way to find out is to investigate! Traverse the lowest levels of the Secret Lab and see what hides behind the curtain.

Every day is Ice Cream Day! Enjoy your tasty treat with various toppings ranging from chocolate sauce to cherries. Between hard serve, soft serve, gelatos, sherbets, and sorbets, you’re sure to find the perfect flavor to delight your Sim!
Get the all-new ice cream maker!
From cabinets with frosted glass doors to new stainless steel appliances, create the coolest kitchen worthy of a master chef for your Sims to cook and chill in.
You can’t have a kitchen renovation and then show up in yesterday’s fashions. A variety of new hairstyles and trendy, casual apparel will ensure your Sim is eating their ice cream in style.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Cool Kitchen Stuff

Ring the bell to summon your Sim’s own live-in butler who can cook meals, tidy the home, greet guests, and fulfill most every request. Praise the butler to receive quicker service that’ll keep your Sims living luxuriously.
Quickly apply makeup that’ll last the evening or give your Sims a new look head to toe. Sims can use the vanity mirror to primp themselves before a night out or practice their flirty advances.

Adorn your Sim’s home with luxurious art deco furnishings that feature mirrored surfaces and gold accents. Enjoy a night in by relaxing in front of the marble fireplace with a drink served from the handcrafted globe bar.

Outfit your Sims in old-Hollywood inspired fashion that’s as elegant as it is timeless. Accessorize with sparkling diamond jewelry and choose lust-worthy hairstyles that’ll have your Sim making a grand entrance wherever they go.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Vintage Glamour Stuff
Sims can master their mind, body and emotions. Improve this skill through yoga, massage, and meditation to unlock the power to freeze needs and teleport!
Attend classes at a spa and master everything from the Half Moon pose to the Lord of the Dance pose to hone your Sim's inner wellness.
Go with the flow with Yoga
Work out your Sim’s tension through a variety of massages. Kick back in the sauna or soak in a mud bath to soothe your cares away.
The new Spa venue type will re-energize even the most stressed Sim. Choose from three pre-built venues or build your own!
Enjoy it all at the Spa
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Spa Day
Toddlers can burn energy while having fun on the collection of playground objects. Tiny Sims can hop into the ball pit with a buddy, scoot down the slide, or scamper through colorful tunnels.

Build the perfect play space in a local park or backyard, then invite the neighbors over for a play date! Toddlers can make friends and let loose while parents facilitate the fun, tell stories, and grill up the kids’ favorite foods.

Express your toddlers’ personalities with new boy and girl fashions and hairstyles. Choose from a variety of tops, bottoms, and shoes that showcase their unique style. Dress in whimsical outfits from butterfly-winged tees to animal hoodies, even rainbow moccasins.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Toddler Stuff

Your Sims can cool off and let loose on two all-new lawn water slides. Perform and perfect a variety of tricks for your audience including surf-sliding through the jaws of a shark! Add soap for an even wilder experience.

Brighten up your Sim’s outdoor space with vibrant potted plants, playful decorative lights, and multi-colored patio furniture. Finish off the look with a soothing wind chime or add a bird feeder that’s sure to attract a few feathered friends.
Dress your Sims in comfortable clothing and relaxed hairstyles that are perfect for hanging out in the backyard or sipping a glass of iced tea.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Backyard Stuff

Welcome to Sulani! Set sail on the glistening water in your island canoe, swim to your heart’s content, and explore the scenery on a watercraft. Build a spectacular sand castle, catch some rays, and even meet a mermaid!

Become a Conservationist, and watch your Sims’ impact bloom all over the island. Take to the waves for fishing or diving, become a lifeguard to keep the locals safe under the sun. Sims can do a few odd jobs or fish for their next meal.

Tradition runs deep on Sulani, and your Sims get to experience it. Immerse Sims in their newfound lifestyle by attending a pit barbecue event, learning about local folklore, tasting tropical delicacies, and chatting with Elementals from the island.
Dress Sims in tropical garb inspired by sun, sand, and waves. Or, gear up for water activities like snorkeling and swimming. Decorate a rustic oasis with home objects and unwind at the tiki bar.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Island Living

With all-new Create A Sim options, create vampire Sims that are alluring or frightening. Choose their fangs, add mysterious glowing eyes, and even customize a unique Dark Form to transform into when enraged or spooking other Sims.

Earn and wield dozens of unique Powers that give vampires the ability to control Sims’ minds and conjure spiritual energy. Balance your skills by taking on weaknesses and unlock new Powers by winning epic duels to advance your rank.

The dark, mist-covered land of Forgotten Hollow, is the perfect place for vampires to socialize and let loose. Visit the abandoned mansion to discover its secrets, collect ingredients for gruesome new recipes, or move in and build your own lair.

Experience the life of a vampire and choose how to live. Will you drink from Sims or eat Plasmafruit to quench your thirst? Embrace evil and stir up trouble or blend in and start a vampire family? Whatever you choose, always avoid sunlight and garlic foods.

Now your Sims can live out their wildest dreams of fame and fortune! Rise to stardom in your current career, or catapult to fame with a new pursuit. Bask in the limelight as an aspiring actor or livestream your every moment as an influencer.
Be your own muse and direct your Sim toward a brilliant acting career. Get your big break with commercial gigs or land a part in a television series.
Join the glitz and glamour of Del Sol Valley, a new world where your Sims discover fame. Get a starter home in Mirage Park or work your way up to a house in the hills in The Pinnacles.

As your Sim’s status skyrockets, you gain Fame Perks. Decorate a gorgeous mansion with gold-plated furniture and take home a unique set piece to put on display as a tribute to the golden age. . . of you.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Get Famous

Create your own space complete with neon lighting, bowling-themed décor, and even a bar for your Sims to enjoy refreshments between frames. Customize its look with retro-modern furniture that looks awesome in the alley or at home.

Challenge your Sims to a game of bowling on the all-new bowling lane object. Start off using bumpers and improve your skills to unlock impressive trick shots. Dim the lights and turn up the music for an out of this world moonlight bowling experience.
Outfit your Sims in retro bowling shirts and shoes or give them a rockin’ new look with rockabilly-inspired clothing and hairstyles.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Bowling Night Stuff
Your Sim can join the ranks of Willow Creek's finest as a detective! Follow your Sim as they patrol the streets, investigate crime scenes, and solve cases at the police station.
Head to the hospital and spend your Sim's days saving lives. Sims in the doctor career start off as Medical Interns but with a little hard work, they can become seasoned surgeons!
Sims in the scientist career can conduct research and collect specimens that can be used to discover new compounds and devices. Your Sim's creations can even lead to new inventions!
Sims interested in managing a store to earn some extra Simoleons can now run a business! Jump start your Sim’s entrepreneurial dreams by purchasing a Retail Store via the phone.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Get to Work
Add a habitat to your household with all-new small pets like a hamster, rat, pygmy hedgehog, or miniature bubalus! Have your Sims name their new pet and learn how to take care of them.

Show your Sims and their pets are made for each other with matching pet outfits like a comfy robe and purr-fect pajamas. Put a glamorous dress on your feline friend or have your dog don a hat for the right occasion.

Have Sims decorate their living room with uniquely-designed décor and paw-some pet-inspired furniture for the kids’ room. From cute cat pillows for your Sims to bright beds for your cats and dogs, there is something for everyone.
Add a movie theater experience to your home and watch ten unique films from the comfort of your Sim’s couch or under a starry sky.
Satisfy your Sim’s snack cravings with freshly popped kernels smothered in butter, cheddar, or sugary sweetness. Mmmm...Popcorn...
Dress in carefree style that’s perfect for hanging out during the day or lounging in the evening. Don’t forget the hairstyle to complement the look!
Add a splash of color and flair to your Sim’s home with a collection of vivid décor and decorative lighting. Every great accent piece has a story, these are no exception.
Set the Mood with Fun Accent Pieces
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Movie Hangout Stuff

Your Sims can try traditional foods, dance to new music, practice native customs and shop for authentic décor. Dress your Sims in local fashion from outfits full of colorful patterns to durable clothing suitable for the jungle!

Venture deep inside the mysterious rooms where Sims may find priceless relics, great treasures or doom! Have your Sims visit again, where they will experience new challenges and uncover different treasures or traps.

Sims gear up in hiking attire and prepare for danger as they trek deep into the jungle, revealing hidden pools, ancient artifact sites and ruins. Beware of natural dangers and obstacles, from deadly bees to poisonous spiders!
Sims can excavate and examine these precious objects closely at the archeology table, determining their quality, but watch out for ones that are fake!
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Jungle Adventure
With a variety of stunning flowers, moss covered statues, and ivy wrapped arches, you can create a romantic garden space so lovely your Sims’ hearts will skip a beat!

Toss a coin in to see if your Sim’s wish comes true. With a bit of luck, Sims can be granted eternal youth, extravagant riches, or even the love of their life. Be careful, because you may not always get what you wish for.
Whisper a Wish in the Wishing Well
A magnificent garden centerpiece that is also a great spot for your Sims to enjoy each other’s company. Feeling playful? Jump in, splash around, and add soap for a bubbly good time.
Romantically inspired modern fashion and hairstyles add a touch of floral fun to your Sim’s wardrobe.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Romantic Garden Stuff

Improve your Sim’s fitness skills and physique by ascending the all-new rock climbing treadmill. Complete climbing challenges, compete for the high score, and learn advanced bouldering techniques that’ll leave spectators in awe.

Dress your Sims in athleisure apparel that’ll inspire them to reach their fitness goals. Choose an outfit from the collection of vibrant tops and bottoms, then pop in some earbuds and hit the gym, or wear the new look out on the town.

Invite the outdoors into your Sim’s home with nature-inspired objects and décor that convey a sense of motion. Build a spacious fitness studio to watch workout videos, or create a modern bathroom space that’s perfect for a post-exercise soak.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Fitness Stuff
From hot and sunny to blustery and snowy, every world’s climate is unique and impacts your Sims’ choices, relationships, and daily activities.

Bundle up to build a snowpal with friends, toss on a raincoat to splash in a spring shower. Dress Sims in new swimwear to cool off in the sprinkler, harvest honey in the fall, play in leaves, or have child Sims make homemade holiday crafts.

Decorate your home and bring Sims together to celebrate heartfelt holiday traditions. Watch as your Sims countdown the calendar days for the next holiday. You can even create custom holidays and choose how your Sims celebrate.
Create beautiful bouquets and unearth new discoveries in the gardening career. Advance your Sim’s budding talents to unlock fresh skills, new outfits, and handy objects.

Level up your Sim’s parenting skills to satisfy their child’s needs and influence their behaviors. Gain new abilities through experience and choosing when to discipline bad actions, encourage good behavior, or just let kids be kids.

The decisions you make influence how your Sim parents and leave a lasting impact on their child’s future. Each choice shapes their personality, affects their traits, influences their family relationships, and guides their path into adulthood.

Gather your Sim’s family to participate in new activities and spend quality time with each other. Sims of all ages can work together to complete a variety of school projects, express their creativity using construction blocks, or volunteer their time for good.

Customize your Sims’ looks and their home with new family fashion and build items. Give the kids’ bedrooms extra personality, remodel the kitchen to feel homier, and let your Sims express their sporty or artistic sides with new outfits.

Adults and children love soaking in the tub, while handy Sims will find a plethora of upgrades. Couples enjoy quiet moments together to discover new romance. Find it in Build Mode under Outdoor Activities.
Relax in the all-new Hot Tub!
From swimsuits to slim-fit polos, choose from a collection of chic apparel. Master the grill in the new “kiss the cook” apron. Top off your Sims’ laid-back look with new hairstyles.
Set-up an open-air lounge area by the pool with a variety of stylish furnishings and décor. Heat things up on the new barbeque grill and serve up some refreshments at the new patio bar.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Perfect Patio Stuff

Use the powerful Create A Pet tool to express your creativity as you customize your Sims’ perfect cats, dogs, puppies, and kittens. Choose from a variety of breeds, give them distinct personalities, and directly manipulate their features.
Experience the companionship and fun that furry friends bring to your Sims’ lives. Cats and dogs have minds of their own and form special relationships with Sims based on their daily interactions.

Build a veterinary clinic, hire a dedicated staff, and further your career as the town’s most promising animal doctor. You’re in control of daily operations from the services offered to what you charge.
Become a Vet and Run a Clinic

Discover the coastal shores of Brindleton Bay, a new world where your Sims and their pets can live and enjoy outdoor activities. Play fetch near the harbor docks, take a walk to the lighthouse, or visit a park to setup an obstacle course.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Cats & Dogs
Carve a pumpkin! But beware of Sims who like to stomp. Ghost Sims will even be able to put a candle-lit pumpkin on their heads!
See what surprises await for your Sims as they take their chance with this mischievous object. Oh, the things they will do for a piece of candy.
Decorate your Sim’s home with a collection of fun décor objects. Treat your guests to the Eyeball Cheese Plate and other new edible delights.
Invite Sims over for a Spooky Party
A spooky party is only as good as the Sims who show up – in costumes! Play dress up from Pirates to Super Llamas, there are fun options for Sims young and old.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Spooky Stuff
Every Sim needs a vacation from time to time! Sims can use the phone or computer to book a vacation.
The Herbalism skill allows your Sims to identify wild plants and brew potent herbal remedies.
Your Sim can be a true lover of the outdoors! Create new craftables at the woodworking table, fish for new wild fish, and collect insects from all over Granite Falls.
What goes bump in the night? A Sim in a bear costume, of course! Roar and spook out other campers, or simply just cause mischief while looking silly.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Outdoor Retreat

Gather your Sims’ laundry, load the washing machine, and then toss them in the dryer for a pristine look. Your Sims can also hand wash their clothes in a washtub, then line dry for a spotless outfit that other Sims will surely notice!

Transform your Sims' home with country-inspired décor that best suits your Sims’ lifestyle. Discover new ways to decorate household rooms with wooden tables and wicker furniture. Add decorative items to rooms from colorful rugs and lively succulents!

Outfit your Sims in country-themed attire from floral patterns to everyday denim. Styles include free-flowing tops and bottoms made from natural cotton fibers. Try hassle-free hairstyles that complement your Sims’ comfortable new looks.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Laundry Day Stuff
Explore a densely populated city with a variety of neighborhoods. Paint a mural in the Arts Quarter, sing your heart out at the Karaoke Bar in the Fashion District or shoot hoops in the Spice Market.
Explore the City of San Myshuno
Enrich and grow your Sims by taking them to different festivals all over the city where they can watch street performers, enter competitions, and meet Sims from different walks of life.

Each apartment has unique traits that will enhance your Sims' gameplay. Experience the charm and thrill of your first apartment. Help your Sims work their way up to living in a Skyscraper Penthouse, with panoramic views.
Work Your Way Up from Starter Apartment to Penthouse

Embark on new careers! Make dramatic speeches as you fight for a cause as a Politician. Show the world how cultured you are as a Food or Art Critic. Inspire the masses and earn followers working in Social Media.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 City Living
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 My First Pet Stuff
Throw the most lavish party in town with a collection of flashy furniture & decorations. Add fun and elegant pieces to your Sim’s home.
Party in Style, Live in Luxury

From sparkly sequin dresses to shiny 3-piece tuxedos, your Sims will be the best dressed at any black tie event - or just any event period. Complete their glamorous look with new hairstyles and accessories.
Delight your guests’ with new recipes via a quick click on the table, or prepare and serve your own elevated cuisine! You can find this item in the Bars category in Build Mode.
Indulge in the all-new Buffet Table

Take advantage of the Mixology and Cooking skills to serve a variety of drinks and snacks, or use the Mischief skill to make things more “exciting” by adding a little something extra. You can find this item in the Bars category in Build Mode.
Experience the all-new Fountain of Mirth
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Luxury Party Stuff

Collect and trade monster cards featuring your Sim’s favorite magical creatures. Use cards in the electronic battle station to bring them to life and challenge friends to a monster duel that’s sure to excite.
With the all-new puppet theater and a bit of imagination, Sims can tell a variety of whimsical stories to entertain an audience of family and friends.
Build kids bedrooms that are both expressive and full of style. Excite your Sim’s imagination with colorful new furniture and themed decorations ranging from space robots to fun flower flourishes.
Trendy yet playful kids clothing and hairstyles let Sims showcase their individual style, or highlight their obsession with the latest tween heartthrob.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Kids Room Stuff
Create and join unique Clubs where you set activities, select the members, choose their style, and customize their hangouts. Playing with your Clubs also unlocks Club Perks for you to enjoy!
Meet up with other Sims for exciting group activities including bonfires, foosball, darts, Don’t Wake The Llama, and more! There’s always a great reason for your Sims to get together!
Pump up the crowd by creating the perfect mix on the DJ Booth. Then jump on the dance floor, challenge other Sims to a dance battle, and show off your dance moves.

Explore this beautiful new world with its scenic neighborhoods and lively hotspots including local pubs, cafes, and discotheques, as well as the mysterious ancient ruins, picturesque bluffs, and the sprawling Von Haunt Estate.
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Get Together
Welcome to The Sims™ 4 Dine Out

Welcome to StrangerVille: "The only thing stranger than the people is the flora!" StrangerVille is a quiet little town with a strange problem. The residence are very friendly, but at night things start to get more interesting. If you want to find out more about this town you can find Military Personnel hanging out at the Local Bar, Scientists researching at the Local Library, and that Curio Shop stand is sure to have some strange odds and ends by the trailer park.
Take your Sims on a mysterious adventure into the wild and discover a new culture!
Experience the celebrity lifestyle with your Sims!
Create a variety of cats and dogs, add them to your Sims’ homes to forever change their lives, and care for neighborhood pets as a veterinarian.
Start your investigation and solve the mystery of a desert town that holds a deep, dark secret.
Add weather to your Sims’ lives to tell new stories, enjoy seasonal activities, and celebrate heartfelt holidays.
Elevate your Sim’s fitness and embody an active lifestyle.
Develop your Sim’s parenting skills to help shape their children’s lives into adulthood.
Welcome home a new small animal and show love for Cats and Dogs.
Escape the ordinary and enjoy a laid-back lifestyle!
Surround your Sims in clean clothes while living a rustic lifestyle.
Give your toddlers new ways to express their personalities, burn off energy, and make friends.

The small town of Forgotten Hollow has remained virtually unchanged for the four generations it has existed. All of its original town founders disappeared shortly after the town was founded. All except for Vladislaus Straud. His great grandson, Vladislaus Straud the IV, still watches over the town to this day.

You are terrible, these co-workers are terrible, this whole place is terrible.

Things are okay. I can't say this is my dream career though.
Things here are great! You're a fantastic boss and I couldn't be happier.
I'm feeling really fulfilled in my current role. It couldn't get much better.
I don't know how much more of this I can take. You will miss me when I'm gone.
I'm pretty sure I'm going to make the employee of the month.
I don't know why I'm still here. I couldn't be more unhappy.
I don't want to be too critical, but maybe if you put me in charge I could turn things around.
Things are going well. I feel I'm really starting to stretch my work skills.
How am I feeling about my job? Meh!
I'm motivated by my desire to stay employed.
But... but... but... I've been trying to not mess up.
I'm so ashamed. I didn't mean to mess up. Please don't put this on my permanent record.
I'll shape up and stop making mistakes. I just didn't sleep well last night.

A buzzword free inspirational speech. I'm inspired because you managed to pull that off.
That was better than any poster I've ever read.
Thank you {M0.Mr.}{F0.Ms.} {0.SimLastName}! I think I'm pretty awesome as well.
Thanks for the feedback {M0.Mr.}{F0.Ms} {0.SimLastName}! I won't let it go to my head.
The appreciation feels great. Keep the compliments rolling in. I can't get enough of them.
Wonderful. I try to be a model employee and it looks like my effort is paying off.
It is so good to hear the extra effort I've been putting in is noticed. Thank you!
Off site training? Will there be an obstacle course? Don't tell me. I want it to be a surprise.
Great, just what I wanted, a chance to go to a class in my off time.
Thank you {M0.Mr.}{F0.Ms.} {0.SimLastName}. This will be a great opportunity to refine my skills. I'll go after my shift.
Thanks, I appreciate you investing in my future here! I'll go to a class next time I'm off work!
Hmm... training after my shift. Are you helping me improve or are you trying to tell me I'm not good enough? Either way, I better study hard.
I could have grown and cooked my own food by this point. This is unacceptable. I'm leaving!
This is horrible! I didn't wait this long for my new phone on opening day. I'm out of here.
{0.SimFirstName} is bursting... with anticipation to meet {M0.his}{F0.her} new bundle of joy!

{0.SimFirstName} stepped into the portal, but didn't find the familiar sunny pasture. {M0.He}{F0.She} did hear some strange humming, and followed the sound until {M0.he}{F0.she} kicked into a crystal.\n\nAs {0.SimFirstName} picked up the crystal, {M0.he}{F0.she} felt the familiar queasiness that happens when being ejected from The Mystical Magic Bean Portal Tree.

{0.SimFirstName} stepped into the portal, and was whisked away to the sunny pasture once again.

The glowing tree did not bear any fruit this time, however upon the ground a short distance beyond it, was the elusive Cowplant Berry!

{0.SimFirstName} pocketed the find moments before the same whisking returned {M0.him}{F0.her} home.

{0.SimFirstName} stepped into the darkness...

"Hey! What are you doing here?" a voice questioned. {0.SimFirstName} was surprised to find someone else in the portal, however this didn't stop {M0.him}{F0.her} from following the voice.

"Fine then! Take this, keep quiet, and get out," the voice commanded as {0.SimFirstName} felt something land in {M0.his}{F0.her} pocket, followed by a sudden push forcing {M0.him}{F0.her} back the way {M0.he}{F0.she} came.

{0.SimFirstName} found {M0.himself}{F0.herself} standing in a prehistoric land surrounded by the flora and fauna of long ago.

{M0.He}{F0.She} was just about to explore, when {M0.he}{F0.she} felt the portal trying to drag {M0.him}{F0.her} back. {0.SimFirstName} stomped {M0.his}{F0.her} foot in defiance. Unfortunately it stomped upon something more than ground.

{M0.He}{F0.She} reached down just as the land faded away, and {M0.he}{F0.she} was back. Whatever it had been, appeared now to be a rock of some sort.

{M0.He}{F0.She} picked it up.

{0.SimFirstName} is an Active Sim. Active Sims tend to be Energized and enjoy Exercise.
{0.SimFirstName} is just a helpless toddler, Caregivers and other Sims in the household will need to help to care for {M0.him}{F0.her}.
{0.SimFirstName} is Ambitious. Ambitious Sims are career focused. If work goes well, or poorly, they'll have an Emotional reaction!
{0.SimFirstName} is an Art Lover. Art Lovers are easily Inspired by Art and love to discuss Art.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Bookworm. Bookworms are Inspired by Books and love to discuss them with other Sims.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Bro. Bros love watching Sports, being around other Bros, and know how to handle their Juice.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Childish Sim. These Sims never quite grow up and never lose their love for toys or hanging out with kids.
{0.SimFirstName} is Clumsy. Clumsy Sims tend to fail at physical activities more often, but they shrug it off and laugh.
{0.SimFirstName} is Noncommital. These Sims grow Tense from stability, be it in their relationship or career. Infuse change often!
{0.SimFirstName} is Creative. Inspiration comes to Creative Sims often, but if Creative activities are ignored, their Emotions will suffer.
{0.SimFirstName} is Evil. Evil Sims become Happy from the misery of others and have a variety of ways to accomplish this.
{0.SimFirstName} is Family Oriented. Family Oriented Sims are happiest around Family and grow sad as a result of extended separation.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Foodie. Foodie Sims are obsessed with eating, discussing, and cooking high quality culinary treats.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Geek. These Sims need to play games and are great at finding rare Collection items in the world due to their innate knowledge.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Genius. Genius Sims are more Focused for mental pursuits, which they require to remain Happy.
{0.SimFirstName} is Gloomy. Gloomy Sims often suffer Sadness, which can affect those around them.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Glutton. Gluttonous Sims can eat and eat and eat (anything), but beware if you let them grow hungry!
{0.SimFirstName} is Good. Good Sims are Happy when others around them are Happy and they seek to improve the world.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Goofball. Goofballs are often Playful.
{0.SimFirstName} Hates Children. These Sims fear parenthood, loathe the presence of children, and become Happy from being mean to younger folk.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Hot-Head. These Sims tend to be Angry, often to the detriment of those around them.
{0.SimFirstName} is Erratic. Erratic Sims live an Emotional roller coaster that is unpredictable.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Jealous Sim. Jealous Sims gain a boost of confidence when near their Significant other but can also get uncomfortable when they are not around them.

{0.SimFirstName} is a Kleptomaniac Sim. Kleptomaniac Sims become tense if they have not Swiped any objects recently, and will also gain a boost of energy after a successful object Swipe, careful not to get caught Swiping objects as this can make a Kleptomaniac Sim embarrassed.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Lazy Sim. Lazy Sims enjoy TV more than others, can lounge anywhere, and don't care much for physical activity.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Loner. Loner Sims are happiest in solitude and are wary of groups of strangers.
{0.SimFirstName} Loves the Outdoors. Getting outside often is a requirement for these Sims, but the Emotional reward is worth it.
{0.SimFirstName} is Materialistic. Materialistic Sims need to buy new things and enjoy admiring and discussing their belongings.
{0.SimFirstName} is Mean. Mean Sims become Happy when they say Mean things to other Sims.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Music Lover. These Sims need music in their lives often and are Happiest when playing music or discussing it with others.
{0.SimFirstName} is Neat. Neat Sims are deeply uncomfortable in a cluttered home, but thankfully are Happy when cleaning and can Clean House.
{0.SimFirstName} is Outgoing. Outgoing Sims need to socialize more often, but are Emotionally strengthened by doing so.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Perfectionist. Perfectionist Sims take longer to craft things, but tend to craft items of superior quality.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Romantic. Romantic Sims tend to be Flirty and need to infuse their lives with Romance often.
{0.SimFirstName} is Self-Assured. Sims with this trait feel good about themselves and often experience extra Confidence.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Slob. Slobs aren't bothered by filthy surroundings and tend to create messes more quickly.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Snob. Snob Sims love to critique the work of others and prefer the companionship of fellow Snobs.

We're inspiring tomorrow's artists, today. That's our mission statement... There's just one problem; we can't paint! We're urgently seeking a talented artist to demonstrate their skills to a camp of naturally gifted children.

<font color="#0949AB">Pay:</font><font color="#10A317"> {0.Money}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">Due By:</font><font color="#10A317"> {2.DayOfWeekShort} {2.TimeShort}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">{3.String}</font> {4.String}

Substitute art professor wanted - post haste! Can you paint? Do you have a modicum of public speaking skills? Are you able to maintain your composure when your authority is inevitably challenged? If you answered yes, yes, YES, then it's your lucky day to get paid. Please bring an original painting whose fundamental composition can be taught, and report to the dean's office for classroom assignment.

"Ain't no party like a painting party 'cause a painting party don't stop."\n\n...at least, that's our motto. What's yours? If it's fun, and involves painting, then you might just be the perfect fit for our Nectar & Painting gig! Come lead a class, have a drink, share some laughs, and get paid.

Indie video game studio with an indie budget seeks an independent artist whose passion outweighs their desire for a big payday. That's not to say you won't be paid... Don't worry; this isn't spec work. We're just looking for someone who wants to be a part of our vision, and can work under our specific budgetary guidelines while still creating compelling characters. Does that sound like you? Sign up today!

<font color="#0949AB">Pay:</font><font color="#10A317"> {0.Money}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">Due By:</font><font color="#10A317"> {2.DayOfWeekShort} {2.TimeShort}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">{3.String}</font> {4.String}

Contractor character design gig available for AAA game production. This exciting opportunity comes with the chance to get credited and paid! The publisher is under the gun to get this major release out prior to the end of the fiscal year, so they'll pay top dollar to any artist who can crank out top notch character designs that meet their exacting design specifications. Now get crunching!

The Plumbob Pictures character designers are on strike... again. But, their loss can be your gain. Our film producers are desperate to get their latest film production back on track. The job is simple; study the director's designs, and use your artistry to make larger than life characters that leap off the script's page!

Help! We're a small indie studio that recently went through a crowdfunding platform to launch development of our newest video game. There's just one problem... We're lacking a talented concept artist to map out our world, which is leaving our environment artists sitting around with nothing to do! Can you help unjam our production schedule? Cash on delivery!

<font color="#0949AB">Pay:</font><font color="#10A317"> {0.Money}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">Due By:</font><font color="#10A317"> {2.DayOfWeekShort} {2.TimeShort}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">{3.String}</font> {4.String}

Sorry space cadets; this is not an opportunity for astronauts. No, we're seeking someone that sees themselves as both an artistic luminary and a pragmatic painter. Someone with the vision to imagine new worlds, the skill to put their ideas to canvas, and one that's come to the sobering realization that art for art's sake doesn't pay the bills. Accepting this gig means taking our design doc and visualizing it as an exciting new world for a brand new video game intellectual property.

Hey there creative genius! Yes, you! Have you been toiling away unpaid and unnoticed on the sci-fi spec art of your dreams? Plumbob Pictures is in need of a concept artist to envision the landscape of an alien planet for an upcoming blockbuster film. Enlist today!

Hi friend, are you a skilled artist? Do you know how to keep your mouth sh... Sorry, do you know how to keep sensitive information privy to interested parties? This gig requires utmost professionalism, and we define professionalism as someone who doesn't ask too many ques... Whoops, there I go again. Don't mind me! Professionalism to us is someone who can work on a 'need to know' basis. Still interested?

<font color="#0949AB">Pay:</font><font color="#10A317"> {0.Money}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">Due By:</font><font color="#10A317"> {2.DayOfWeekShort} {2.TimeShort}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">{3.String}</font> {4.String}
Art dealer looking for a temporary associate to assist with a business deal. Must be highly skilled in painting. No questions asked. <u>No cops.</u>

How do you feel about the reappropriation of famous paintings held in private collections? Moral gray area, or justified usage of artistic skill? I'm not talking about stealing anything... just a little forgery my friend! Let's be straight; if you're going to be a Debbie Do-Gooder - don't bother applying. But if you're willing to roll up the sleeves on your smock-frock and get painting, then we've got a job for you.

We've developed the last mobile app you'll ever need. Seriously - it's a bold statement, but we're just that confident. In the near future, sims will constantly be on their phones, finding themselves absolutely hooked to power we'll put in the palm of their hand. There's just one final component we need before we can launch... the perfect app icon that will make our app stand head and shoulders above all others on the mobile store. Are you the expert iconographist we've been searching for?

<font color="#0949AB">Pay:</font><font color="#10A317"> {0.Money}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">Due By:</font><font color="#10A317"> {2.DayOfWeekShort} {2.TimeShort}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">{3.String}</font> {4.String}

Things have been going exceptionally well for The Sims Studio, having launched our title "Sims Forever" nearly 5 years ago. Fans of the game are clamoring for something new though, and we're getting to work on yet another expansion pack for the seminal title. Can you help take Sims Forever to the next level? We need to outsource icon art to someone who's proficient at visualizing moodlets, headlines, whims, traits, aspirations, and more with minimal guidance. Get in the game!

We're a hot new Sillisim Valley startup, and we need to make a splash with an eye-grabbing professional logo before raising further capital in our Series B funding round. Look, don't get bogged down in the details... This is a simple job. And don't even think about asking to get paid in stock grants (fat chance we'll give an artist equity before our eventual record smashing IPO.) You give us a hot logo; we give you Simoleons.

<font color="#0949AB">Pay:</font><font color="#10A317"> {0.Money}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">Due By:</font><font color="#10A317"> {2.DayOfWeekShort} {2.TimeShort}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">{3.String}</font> {4.String}

We don't want our company stuck in a Web 2.0 world, so we're working on developing our Web 3.0 strategy. We're seeking a technically inclined artist whose on the cutting edge of technology to craft a company logo that'll last through Web 4.0 and beyond. Conducting interviews today!

We make products that people want, but products are nothing without an image. An icon, a logo, a visual identity... something that everyday people can relate to and remember. That's where you come in. We need a logo for our latest product. Sure, it's a corporate gig working for "the man", but it's reliable work that'll pay the bills.

Spirited young politician seeks portrait to give an air of credibility to {M0.her}{F0.his} new office in City Hall. Looking for an artist that's skilled in taking a reference image and instilling the subject with a sense of sophistication and statesmanship. Government budget allocates funding for one portrait per elected term, so paying well for top tier work.

<font color="#0949AB">Pay:</font><font color="#10A317"> {0.Money}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">Due By:</font><font color="#10A317"> {2.DayOfWeekShort} {2.TimeShort}</font>\n<font color="#0949AB">{3.String}</font> {4.String}

Seeking a talented artist to paint a portrait of a recently departed loved one... {M0.She}{F0.He} still comes back as a ghost on occasion, but I'd prefer to remember {M0.her}{F0.him} as {M0.she}{F0.he} was. Will pay handsomely for top tier work.

I'm a wealthy octogenarian experiencing a late-life crisis. What I need is a painter to capture my likeness, in the hopes that future generations of my family will have something to remember me by. I'm afraid the reaper may soon pay me a visit. Time is of the essence... Will pay handsomely for rapid and professional work.

Calling all artists! The Sims Transportation Administration has successfully lobbied for funding for public art. The city airport has a large blank wall that's perfect for a mural, and we're paying artists to submit proposals of what to paint in that space. Once the proposals are gathered, we'll establish separate commissions to review the proposals, to ruminate on sourcing materials, to study the environmental impact on migrating bird populations, and to evaluate the life stories of the artists involved. Once all that information is gathered, then it's on to step 3... Well, let's not get ahead of ourselves; just submit an interesting painting, ok?

The local government is offering a no-bid contract to Electrified Artists for Electrical Box Art. Perhaps they thought the agency's name made its contractors uniquely qualified for the job, or maybe it's just another example of government largesse. Either way, the net result is money in your pocket should you take this job. Just drop your proposed painting off at City Hall for rubber stamp approval and you'll be on your way.

City Hall is conducting a competitive bidding process for a proposed mural that will help spruce up the aging Main Street district. Subject matter of the mural is up for interpretation by the individual artist, and will be evaluated by city council appointees prior to processing a payment.

Are you an artist who can quickly render passable likenesses? Do you have a penchant for binge watching serial crime dramas? Let the record show that the Venn diagram of Sims who fall into both of these categories accounts for only 0.013% of the population. If this accurately describes you, then we need your skills as a courtroom artist for a high profile trial.

Hey you computer savvy folk. I have some very private files that need to be encrypted. You know, just in case. I don't know how to do it myself, so I'm willing to pay someone to take care of it. Seeking professional to encrypt highly sensitive documents. I'm a self-employed entrepreneur working with important clients that trust me to keep their information secure. I like being busy.
Everything's okay...

Anyway, my independent mindset (and coaching book written by a self-made billionaire) tells me the best way to handle this is to pay someone else to do it. Contact me.

Hello? Is this working? These modern technologies... Always more trouble than help. Anyway, I run a small business. We're going over 40 years strong, but lately our customers have been asking if their data is secure. What does that even mean? It's trapped in an electric box of madness that I don't know how to use half the time. That's secure right? Anyway, someone mentioned encryption. Do you know encryption? I sure don't.
They're after me. Don't ask questions, just help me encrypt these files before they get me! Quickly, they could be here any second. Contact me on a secure line. SECURE.

Trade: Freelance Artist Can a digital painting make you cry? Right now, no one knows. This is party because many would consider the very idea frivolous. But it's also because whoever successfully answers this question must first have answered several others. Why do we cry? Why do we laugh, or love, or smile? What are the touchstones of our emotions? Until now, the people who asked such questions tended not to be the same people who created digital art. Instead, they were writers, filmmakers, painters, musicians. They were, in the traditional sense, artists. We're about to change that tradition. The name of our agency is Electrified Artists.

Be your own boss! Set your own work schedule! Sounds good, right? If you're both self-disciplined and determined, a career as a freelancer may be the right path for you. Multiple trades available to work within; agencies are standing by to connect you with eager clients today!

Trade: Freelance Programmer\n\nWant in on a little secret? You don't have to be an expert about computers to be a great freelancer! All you need is a PC, a search engine, and the iron will to deal with "ideas people". Still, it helps to be an expert.

Trade: Freelance Writer\n\nWhen people see us in the street, they point and exclaim "Them's Fighting Words!" Okay they don't. Perhaps someday. We handle jobs ranging from proofreading to ghost writing for famous people. Grab a keyboard, boot up your favorite word processor, and join us!

Did you know you have a cat on your head? Aw, quit lion!
This darling hat looks just like a teddy bear. Unless it gets angry. Or hungry…
Some say this hat helps you see in the dark. But it’s the ears that have us wondering…
Is that cow winking? Mais oui! She’s on your gorgeous head after all.
Show your stripes, and unleash the tiger on you.
You may be afraid of a lot of things, but wearing a chicken on your head? Not one of them.
Don’t forget your safety helmet! This cool-looking cap not only completes your costume, it has extra padding to protect your head, just in case somebody bites it.

Inspired by a time your children don’t remember, where acid wash, crop tops, and shoulder pads were all the rage! The designer of this cropped jean jacket took an old silhouette but added modern touches, like updated denim washes and a slimmer fit. Coordinating graphic tees by famed designer R.T. Hoots are included in this set! Outrageous!

These solid tees are great for growing kids. As their personalities develop and change, the versatility of a basic tee can change with them. If they want to be a rocker one day and a prepster the next, no problem! Encourage their imagination and self-discovery with the Cute-Tee Shirt.

These solid tanks are great for growing kids. As their personalities develop and change, the versatility of a basic tee can change with them. If they want to be a rocker one day and a prepster the next, no problem! Encourage their imagination and self-discovery with the Cute-Tee Tank Top.
Get noticed. This brightly colored clown costume is so impossibly loud, you’ll attract smiles everywhere you go. Look the clown part to the very last stitch. Good cheer is sure to follow.
This silk dress will enhance every single curve of your Sim. It fits so perfectly that you'd swear your Sim was sewn into it, or that millions of little worms weaved a dress around her.
If there’s one thing we love here at Canine Fashion, it’s dogs and dresses. Each of our styles is inspired by a particular breed. This model happens to be the Cocker Spaniel.

It’s our company policy not only to hire talented tailors, but also brutally honest ones as well. You see, we are purists at heart: no frills, no embellishments, just pure honest-to-goodness tailoring. This dress is a statement, but it is second to you.

Glisten in the glow of every flaming drink with your very own tiki-rific two-piece! This flashy shorts and bustier combo is topped with a tropical chemise and accented with shiny bangles, so you sparkle all night long.
This ravishing number takes the little black (or white) dress and makes it delightfully littler.
Be the life of the party by being-you guessed it-Death! Really, who could be more riveting, more unforgettable, more electrifying? Just step into the party and suck the air right out of the room.
Squeeze into a tight-fitting spandex body suit, then toss on a massive foam hot dog and bun. We guarantee, you’ll relish all the attention!
These sateen cigarette pants are absolutely fabulous! While we do support being fashionably fashionable at all times, we do not condone smoking either cigarettes or these pants.

Pajamas are fun. You wear them at night! They're snuggly and comfy and such a delight. When you go to your dresser and think which ones to wear, choose the Slamma Jammas - the pajamas that care! Not literally though.

Life’s too short and frankly too busy to plan every last detail; that includes hemming your jeans. When someone asks if you want to go do something that you don’t really want to, look at them and point to your jeans. They’ll get the point. The pre-rolled Off the Cuff Jeans scream, “I’m just too busy.”

Tailored Power Pants gently skim the body, drawing positive attention to curves, while vertical piping helps to elongate the legs! If that wasn't enough, each pair is infused with 5000 watts of energy before leaving our factory. Talk about power!

These classic straight leg jeans are pleasant and agreeable to all figure types. If there was one word to describe them, it would be “delightful”. And also “accommodating.” Ooh, maybe even “egalitarian!”
These pants are made of super supple leather. The leather is cloned from cows that were voted by their classmates as "Most likely to make a fantastic pair of leather pants."

A pleated skirt is a versatile piece for anyone’s wardrobe. Paired with a tailored blouse it can look quite chic, while paired with an oversized kitten sweater it can provide a pleasantly hipster look. Either way, whatever look you may aspire to, this skirt is sure to pleats.

At first glance, The Executive Mullet Skirt has simple tailoring and detail, but one look at the back will reveal intricate piping and a little bit of "whoo!" This skirt is all business in the front, and all about fun in the back.

Even though time travel hasn't been invented yet, it doesn't mean you shouldn't be ready! Maxi skirts cover your ankles and provide beautiful movement when you walk. Whether traveling into the past, present, or future, you will be perfectly and appropriately dressed.

Ever had the urge to have a different hair style every day? Ever wish there was a machine that would let you drastically change your hair at the push of a button? Sorry, that doesn’t exist. This hair style, however, provides two different styles depending on which way you turn your head; edgy one side, romantic on the other!
Did you know you have a cat on your head? Aw, quit lion!
This darling hat looks just like a teddy bear. Unless it gets angry. Or hungry…
Some say this hat helps you see in the dark. But it’s the ears that have us wondering...
Is that cow winking? Mais oui! She’s on your gorgeous head after all.
Show your stripes, and unleash the tiger on you.
You may be afraid of a lot of things, but wearing a chicken on your head? Not one of them.
You wouldn’t smile if you were endangered. Why should your hat?

Neo-Pirate Fashion is all the rage! Elite fashion magazines like Bazarrrrgh point to ruffle shirts bursting out of corsets, giant feather hats, and faux shoulder parrots as this season’s inspiration. Don’t be the square pegleg! Make Pirate’s Booties a part of your warrrrrdrobe!

These boots are a work of art! They look great with more constructed outfits, but are also perfect for an easy day out with one of the more flowy silhouettes in your closet. Purchasing these boots should be a no-brainer. We hope you’ll be easily suede.
Get the happiest feet around with Just Clownin’ multi-color clown shoes. These puppies are so impossibly comfy and roomy, your feet will grin from toe to toe.

Toe over-hang is the worst! As you walk around in heels, your foot slides forward and before you know it your toes are draped over the front of the shoe! Eww! Not to worry though, we've provided a stylish and functional cross strap that keeps your foot in place and looking like a diva.

These Feline’s Fancy Pumps are the perfect option for elevated footwear. With a heel that is only an inch and a half, they provide a nice little boost while still being completely comfortable to walk in! They’ll make you purr… or something.

A Lady Pumpleton Original, this elegant top is made from the finest silk; a fabric that she genuinely loved. In fact she loved it so much, she and Sir Pumpalumps slept in a giant silk cocoon at night. Weird.
Not sure what to wear today? Try the "What-a-Cinch Top." It flatters all figures, gathering at the waist. You can dress it up or down but preferably not horizontally.
Emerge from your style cocoon in a beautiful camisole! It lightly skims the body and is incredibly flattering.
This might be the most basic wardrobe purchase for your Sims. If your Sim loves versatility, then buy it, else don't.
Halt! Who Goes There? Halter Top
Friends can't keep a secret nor keep their mouths shut? No worries! You can always keep your hoodie zipped up. Keep it all under cover with The Secret Keeper Zipup!

Inspiration for fashion can come from all kinds of places! Paired with leather pants, you've got a nice biker leather suit. Paired with a maxi skirt, you've got a hot trend. This biker jacket can be as literal or as interpretive as you like.
To pass Quality Assurance, each shirt had a tester mashing the buttons repeatedly for 48 hours. We are now confident that this shirt is bug free and will not freeze with excessive use.
A tank and a bra combined, this two-for-one top is a real bargain, dude! Whether you’re going to the beach or a punk concert, rock it out, for totes! Nice shirt, bra! Tubular!
Thicker than spaghetti and not as thick as udon, this tank has the perfect width straps! The extra fabric for the straps was taken from the bottom of the torso. It all evens out.
Boost your Sim's style with the Turn Up the Baseball Tshirt. It's an awesome basic that's sure to be a home run!
Get noticed. This brightly colored clown costume is so impossibly loud, you’ll attract smiles everywhere you go. Look the clown part to the very last stitch. Good cheer is sure to follow.
Nothing is more dashing on a gentleman than a tuxedo with full dress tails. And if you’re not a gentleman, well, this will fool anyone.

Sidle up to every fiery drink and cast forth its radiance for all the world to see. Made of remarkably reflective material, this suit serves as both community mirror and fire protection, just in case somebody spills.
Be the life of the party by being-you guessed it-Death! Really, who could be more riveting, more unforgettable, more electrifying? Just step into the party and suck the air right out of the room.
Squeeze into a tight-fitting spandex body suit, then toss on a massive foam hot dog and bun. We guarantee, you’ll relish all the attention!
