Developed in the 1970s, the Shaggi-luscious is a hybrid between a chrysanthemum and a daisy. Said to have medicinal qualities, in some cultures, it is enjoyed as a tea when people get tired of looking at it.
As soft and pink as a baby’s bottom, these tender roses are much better smelling.
With naturally red roses and no paint about, this regal rose bush comes fit for a queen.
Closely related to the red, red vine popularized by a reggae song, this shrub bears gorgeous red flowers sure to brighten your garden.

It’s not that you don’t love the others, but the firstborn is always special. This strain of sunflower was cultivated in separate gardens, one at a time, so every single flower can be unique as a firstborn.
Competition is healthy when reaching for the sun. This plot of sunflowers is cunningly designed, allowing each flower to grow up free of the others’ shadow.
Delicate and classic, and extremely poisonous, but perfect for adding curb appeal.
Delicate and classic, and extremely poisonous, but perfect for adding curb appeal.
Delicate and classic, and extremely poisonous, but perfect for adding curb appeal.
This grass always seems greener in someone else’s yard. Just remember, they’re thinking the same thing when they look at yours.
We made this artificial turf much more convincing by letting it go a bit. The tall, scruffy weeds make it look unquestionably authentic.
This fine topiary design is ideal for untutored shears. With straight edges, flat sides, and a concealed wire under-carriage, it offers easy upkeep for amateurs and experts alike.
Created by a horticulturist with a deft and steady hand, this marvelous elephant can be admired solo, or placed trunk to tail with others for a grand parade effect.
Every lawn needs a bush painstakingly trimmed to resemble a llama. Why? Because llamas are awesome, that's why.
Much more attractive than barbed wire and equally as effective.
These large cacti can grow to be over 40 feet tall. Not recommended if you have a Napoleon complex, but otherwise, beautiful!
Similar in stature to a barrel cactus, these unusual cacti have a narrow opening at the top, making a great place for hiding and protecting your valuables.
These spiky plants flower but once in their lifetime. Cherish the moment, then come back and buy another. And another!
Barrel cactus can actually grow quite tall and harbor dangerous pathogens on their needles. A brilliant and lovely way to keep burglars away!
These towering cacti are ringed with pointy branches, providing 360-degree protection and plenty of gorgeous blooms in spring.
This would be impossible to resist ingesting, if it weren't for the spikes on the tip of each leaf.
This luscious topiary design is especially suited to tall trees, so no one will try to lick the branches.
This fancy topiary design is not only popular with children, but French poodles as well.
New, from Reclamation Homeware, it’s a cute little potted plant. What? Sometimes you just need a nice plant in your house. Not everything has to be a journey into man’s existence you know.

When we set out to create the Manifest, we knew it was about so much more than just designing a potted plant set. It was about shifting hearts and exploding patterns. It was about healing world hunger and ending war in this lifetime. We think you’ll agree the results surpassed our wildest dreams.

Tickle all five senses with our Lovely Lily Pot. Breathe the flowers’ sweet aroma, ogle their long and delicate stamen, run a finger along soft, smooth petals and touch the pollen to your tongue. Listen closely, and you may hear secrets whispering through its branches. Or is that just the pitter-patter of your poor heart?

Designed for the delicate, leggy beauty of such fleurs as orchids, forget-me-nots and the rare hybrid orchid-you-nots, this hand-painted planter is the perfect complement to any indoor or outdoor space. With petite handles, sturdy curves and a full upper lip, its demi-glazed allure is undeniable.

This cheery pail of Perma-blossom sunflowers will hearten any space, any time of year. Handcrafted from antique tin and rusted to perfection, this pretty pail and flower set evokes the charm and romance of a forgotten farm, reclaimed by nature and preserved just for you.
Devastating volcanic activity, giant meteorites pounding our planet, exploding suns… however the end comes, keep it happy with a pot of flowers! Flowers make people happy!
Cities In Dust Potted Faux Plant

These palms were born and raised in a sheltered mangrove off the sea. Their days were spent among the fishes and animals, an active participant in the complex ecosystem of their home. From time to time, the palms dabbled in their favorite hobby: warding off hurricanes from the island's shores. It was a good life, but as time passed, the palms grew tired and yearned for a quiet retirement. After selecting a trendy pot, they packed up and resettled in a new home—less densely-populated and complete with low-oxygen soil.

This plant was granted for the New Lunar Year of the Pig, starting in February 2019.\n\nA wonder of a new lunar year, this tree has been known to sprout different citrus fruit including oranges, kumquats, and tangerines. On special occasions, red envelopes may appear as if expressing a wish of safety and good energy to the household.
Lucky Citrus Tree of the Moon
Some hypothesize that more than fifty percent of the world's lifeforms originated in outerspace--like this twiggy plant!
Line your walk with living sculptures! This solid stone planter and hedge is a truly tasteful addition, an artful collaboration between Nature and shears.
This hefty cement planter makes a statement-hence, its name. Perfect for lining a patio or defining a porch.
Transform your patio into a private sanctuary. Each solid stone planter holds a dense, full, fast-growing shrub, so you can look out on greenery and have no one looking back.
My Own Private Eden Patio Shrub
Not recommended for houses with small children, cats, or people with bad balance.
Go coconuts for this potted palm, and bring the feel of the tropics right into your home.
Add foliage without fuss. This wonderfully tall houseplant comes in a simple, low clay pot, so you can focus on the greenery and not the greenery holder.
This verdant fern adds a splash of life and color to any room. Also great for hide n’ seek with children and petite adults.
Too big for an ant, maybe, but just right for your home, don't you think?

Our Mega Fern is constructed out of a space-age polymer that is so life-like, you literally cannot tell it from the real thing. Neglected, it will even break down and die at the exact same rate as living organic material! Now that’s progress!
Foliage artisans scoured arboreal forests for years in search of the perfect twig. It imparts an air of forgotten grandeur and reminds you of life’s impermanence.
Unlock by reaching level 8 of the Tech Guru career while in the Start-up branch.
Unlocked at level 8 of the Tech Guru career while in the Start-up branch.
Be reminded that plant life can sprout from even the most improbable nooks and crannies with this festive, fertile terracotta urn.
A vessel fit for the queen of flowers: a brushed-nickel chalice housing only roses hand-picked from fragrant spring gardens, trimmed with sparkling gold leaf.
This vase is great for a baby's room. Delicate tulips not included.

The value of antiques resides in their history. Who loved this pot? What great storm created its rusty patina? That’s why, after exposing the Mega Houseplant Pot to a chemical wash and ultra-violet ray flash, our robots print an official Mega Houseplant history, randomly generated so each legend is unique. Yet each pot is exactly the same!

If robots could cry, ours would have been moved to tears in the design process of this charming, vintage-esque flower vase. Instead, they just overheated slightly, and then returned to optimum working conditions.

Why shop for antiques at estate sales or the main streets of upper class vacation towns? Simply walk through our hermetically sealed front doors, into our dust-free warehouse, filled with hard-working robots - and there’s that aged-looking flowerpot you always wanted, under the florescent lights. Isn’t it quaint?

Princess Cordelia used to love lounging by tide pools, watching the crabs scuttle over rocks. She took special delight in the way they seemed to hop up onto tiptoe and bolt as if life depended on it, which it usually did. Crabs are yummy.

Like most royalty, Princess Cordelia enjoyed structured clothing and often sported a bustle and a corset. This delighted her first pirate boyfriend, perhaps a little too much. This vase is actually based on the parting gift she gave upon dumping him, lest he forget her curves or thorns.
A rustic vase of sunflowers adds a painterly touch to any room.
Unlock by reaching level 6 of the Painter career.
Unlocked at level 6 of the Painter career.
A single rose nestled snugly in a slender bud vase to beautify the room.
Unlock by completing the Date Event at the Silver Level.
Unlocked by completing the Date Event at the Silver Level.
A compact houseplant for enlivening small spaces with a touch of green.
Needs no fertilizer, no light, no special care. Water once per month, and this sturdy, juicy succulent will provide years of deceptively low-maintenance greenery.
Slick tendrils slither toward the ceiling, entwined in a mesmerizing tangle. Guaranteed to add a dose of sinister weirdness to any room.
Welcome visitors to your home with an unassuming houseplant that says, "Howdy folks, I am capable of keeping living things alive!"
For the ultimate locavore. Grow a replica of your favorite salad right on your countertop. Warning: Toxic if ingested.
Energize an office or living area with a fresh, jazzy spray of greenery. Place in a southwesterly corner of the room for ultimate energy flow.
An unassuming array of flowers perfect for conducting neighborly conversations about the weather, the new garbageman, and whose toolshed is not up to HOA code.
A stately, traditional home deserves windows festooned with stately, traditional strands of climbing ivy.
Aloe vera plants grow best in dry climates.
This cactus is King of the desert.
This cactus is the Emperor of the desert.
The prettiest flowers in the whole desert.
A medium sized hedge with bright green leaves.
A small hedge with bright green leaves.
A thick hedge with bright green leaves.
A long hedge with bright green leaves.
A short hedge with bright green leaves.
This tall hedge has bright green leaves.
This tall hedge is very versatile.
This tall hedge is long and leafy.
This hedge makes any garden more beautiful.
This topiary is sure to enhance any garden.

The Sim Geological Council wanted to let you know that you've satisfied their stringent requirements in both hoarding and showing off your pretty crystalline friends. This is your very own Consummate Gem Connoisseur plaque. It's almost as pretty as your gem collection.

Your attention to microscopic detail (literally) has paid off! The slides you possess are the envy of microscope-toting scientists far and wide, many of whom are now wondering why hadn't they thought about magnifying their prints to a large gallery size earlier.
After studying your space rock collection from afar, the Simsonian Observatory has awarded you this plaque for a collection that is truly out of this world!

At the behest of the local community, the Sim Gardening Society has decided to reward you for your impressive collection of flora both grown and pinched. No longer will you have to sneak surreptitiously behind your neighbor's yard in search for that one last plant - you now have them all!

No longer are fish the strange beasts wriggling and flopping among your darkest nightmares. No longer! Your mastery over these aquatic creatures of the deep have earned you The Right Angler plaque, courtesy of the local Sim Fishing Club.

You did it. You've tasted and shared every experimental dish. #1MillionLikes #Completionist #BeenThereAteThat #MunchieMondays #TastyTuesdays #WaffleWednesday #ThirdCourseThursday #FastFoodFriday #SavorySaturday #SundaeSunday #EliteFoodie #NomNomNom #OneMoreBite #GlutenFreeForAll #Chef2Table #Table2Mouth #BroughtMyOwnFork #NoLeftovers #PeepMyPlaque

Your appreciation for Voidcritters of all elements knows no bounds!

• You... the protector of flame, forever may it burn.
• You... defender of the earth, stoic and firm.
• You... speaker for the void, its dark mysteries preserved in your mind.
• You... champion of the wind, swift to an ally's side.
• You... safeguard of oceans deep, channeling torrents of furious water.

This plaque commemorates that Voidcritters far and wide shall know your name and sing your praises, from this planet and onwards throughout the galaxy.
We salute you! This is your very own Feather Accumulator plaque. It is almost as fluffy as your full feather collection...almost!

You have mixed feelings about your frogs. Remember when you just had two and they were just plainly colored and less well-patterned? Well, neither do they. What really matters now is that you have a lot of frogs in individual terrariums. Congratulations! The SimValley Frog Fan & Appreciation Society thought you deserved a reminder that frogs have feelings too. Remember to feed them often!

It wasn't about the gilded and jeweled treasure. That wasn't the reason you trekked through dangerous jungles and trap filled temples. No, it was this plaque. This plaque is your ultimate reward. Display it with pride.

The Xenolife-Friend Wall-Mounted Reminder is a proud gift from the Simsonian Xenolife Appreciation Society, where it states in fine print to rotate the terrariums a few times a week, just so your extraterrestrial friends and cadavers get their recommended healthy dose of gamma-ray bursts.

This mysterious plaque wasn't postmarked, nor was it clear where it came from. What is obvious, however, that someone, somewhere is deeply appreciative that you've reunited these figurines of Sims from another time, in another place.

The Gargantuan Telescope is a prestigious trophy awarded only twice monthly to the special few who have trawled the night sky for magazine-cover worthy space vistas and/or Simlitzer Prize celebrity alien paparazzi pictures. Well done, you cosmic voyeur, you!

All your penpals discovered somehow that they know each other! What are the odds! This plaque is the result of a unanimous decision in a lengthy forum thread over what they should all pitch in to send you.

This gift from the Simsonian Museum Paleontology Department quietly congratulates you on your veritable fossil collection. It comes with a note saying that they aren't the very least bit jealous. Most definitely not.

The Magnum Ingot plaque refers to the rare, sensitive Magnum alloy created from mixing all the metals discovered in your collection. The Sim Geological Council, however, cautions against any sort of alloying done at home.

Hurrah! This plaque represents the celebratory cry of having combed through geological formations and extracting the fundamental building blocks of matter! A complex feat? Not really, It's All Elementary!

Searching dingy, free side-walk boxes for these treasures is hard work! For your Sim's time and effort, you have earned a plaque to proudly display with the snow globes found. Hopefully they were washed thoroughly before displaying.

Thank you for your hard work cleaning the streets! The posters covering our beautiful city have taken over buildings and electrical boxes, but with your help, the city is 2% cleaner. For that, we reward you this plaque.

This plaque commemorates all the time you've spent in the dirt discovering and restoring Ancient Omisca Artifacts. Decorating your apartment with these objects will truely allow you to call your style 'vintage'.
The Rung My Bell Pool Ladder is a no muss, no fuss aluminum ladder to get you safely in and out of your pool.

The transition from diapers to toilets need not be a stress-filled affair. The Practice Potty will help your little one improve their potty skills. It's comfortable and comes in a variety of colors. And, most importantly, it is made of easy to clean antibacterial plastic!
High class toddlers need the finest of potty chairs. They will not settle for anything less than this chair. Only plebeians use other potty chairs.
For those toddlers that need a friendly face when they learn how to go potty…\nThis little monster shouldn't be too scary, and will hopefully be one of their new best friends.
Don’t let your child’s love for books die out! Just think, if dinosaurs actually read books, they might not be extinct today.
A heavy, sand-filled bag, on a floor-mounted pedestal, designed to withstand repeated and forceful abuse from punches.
Work out aggression and stress! Condition biceps! Keep fit for interstellar smuggling by delivering a few well-placed thumps into the side of this bag, which never fights back.
Unlock by reaching level 9 of the Astronaut career while in the Interstellar Smuggler branch.
Unlocked at level 9 of the Astronaut career while in the Interstellar Smuggler branch.
Keep your punches and roundhouse kicks in fighting shape with this old-school leather punching bag. Filled with gravel and broken glass for extra knuckle callusation.
Unlock by reaching level 10 of the Criminal career while in the Boss branch.
Unlocked at level 10 of the Criminal career while in the Boss branch.
This is the end of the road.
Artfully weathered bronze panels and whizz-bang gaslights conceal a sleek modern rocketship with the most up-to-date technology on the inside. It’s only what’s on the outside that counts, right?
Machine-crafted from carbon-fiber sheathing forged from minerals found in space geodes, this space vehicle promises the smoothest, most luxurious ride to interplanetary adventure.
Unlock by reaching level 10 of the Astronaut career while in the Space Ranger branch.
Unlocked at level 10 of the Astronaut career while in the Space Ranger branch.
During the war, rockets were made by hand, and kids rocketed to school both ways uphill! In snow! Let this museum-quality relic be a reminder of just how easy you astronauts have it today.
Unlock by reaching level 10 of the Astronaut career while in the Interstellar Smuggler branch.
Unlocked at level 10 of the Astronaut career while in the Interstellar Smuggler branch.
These rocks cling precariously to the sides of cliffs.
A matched set featuring an experienced older rock to act as the primary decoration, and a smaller novice rock to learn and develop important rock skills.
Forged by millennia of intense compression and geothermic combustion, this rock is finally ready to stand guard over your front walkway.
Beautifully smooth multi-purpose rock with contoured flat surface for use as patio décor or lawn decoration!
Admire the studiously disheveled look of this on-trend pair of mini-boulders. Get them before it’s cool.
Wizened mystics once used the surface of this sedimentary marvel to divine the future and conduct ancient, secret ceremonies. Legend says it retains its powers still....
This boulder claims that it is actually a sculpture of an older, grander boulder.
I want no boulder, no boulder but this one.
This boulder's career has hit rock-bottom.
Out of shear necessity, a larger rock split in half to form this slightly smaller rock.
This desert boulder has never enjoyed the bustle of living in the city. It considers itself more of a country rock.
A very large rock found in the desert.
A boulder found only in the desert.
This large boulder is silently waiting. Silently.
A massive rock that dominates the landscape.
This boulder once had many friends. Now it has been deserted.
This lovely rock is found in warm, dry locales.
A boulder too big for a Sim to move.
This boulder is neither big, nor small.
Even a small boulder is awfully large.
These rocks are found on the edge of a cliff.
Like many others who have come before it, this space rock knows not the unique pleasure of being unlike another.
A glowy, oddly enchanting space rock that mesmerizes and bewilders.
A very pretty space rock that somehow found itself here.
Rocks make the world more lively and beautiful.
I wonder how old these rocks are?
This rare formation of rocks is only found in the desert.
Save on energy bills and prevent rot with a quality rooftop ventilation system.
Too Hot to Not Roof Vent
Things used to be made better. This is one of them.
Add a touch of nature with the Terrific Terrapin! This decal will liven up the bottom of your pool, fountain and/or even your floor. Also available in multiple colors.
Make it klassy! Apply this decal to your pool, fountain and/or floor to add depth and dimension.
Add a touch of nature with the Tiny Terrapin! This decal will liven up the bottom of your pool, fountain and/or even your floor. Also available in multiple colors.
Perfect for a workout but stylish enough for any part of your home. This rug will let you enjoy your floor activities in casual comfort. Comes in multiple colors!
Unlock by reaching level 5 of the Athlete career while in the Body Builder branch.
Unlocked at level 5 of the Athlete career while in the Body Builder branch.

Everywhere the light intersects is a new color. Now comes the fun of talking about the differences between additive and subtractive color mixing. Does the rug count as Pink, Purple, or Magenta? And don't get us started on what is considered Mint...
If a traditional floral pattern is what you are after, be sure to try out the five designs found within this rangoli replica. Add the Rangoli Ground Candles for the perfect visual combination.
A spiral pattern meant to remind one of the familiar mix of colorful sands and powders found in traditional rangoli designs.
Accented by vibrant floral pastels, the two patterns found within this rangoli replica were inspired by nature.
Set a positive example for your infant with a beautiful tableau of happy animal families, and then walk all over it. That’s what family’s really about.
This plush rug from Kindermade is sure to keep your child entertained with colorful animal shapes.

The rings of a tree, the rings around a planet, the ring that symbolizes a lifelong connection around your finger. These things are all connected. Rings are the fingerprint of the universe, its loops and swirls revealing to us the truth of all things: that all things are true. The Elysium rug, from Reclamation Homeware.

Nothing celebrates the limitless potential of human ingenuity like a small area rug. It’s not hard to imagine a world where every space is tastefully accentuated by one of our stylish rugs, and there is no war. Buy The Indispensable, and achieve the impossible.
Unlock by reaching level 8 of the Criminal career while in the Oracle branch
Unlocked at level 8 of the Criminal career while in the Oracle branch

Who among us doesn’t remember the first time a rug made us cry? Like the greatest symphony, a good rug can make us laugh, cry, and fall in love all at once. Place The Meridian in your home, and feel the fullest extent of every possible human emotion simultaneously.

Close your eyes and imagine yourself sitting in a green field covered with beautiful, blooming flowers. Now open your eyes. Surprise! You’re still sitting on a field of beautiful flowers, only this one is better because when you run your hand over its fabric it feels like you’re petting a majestic stallion.
Guests entering your home will feel as if they’re being whisked onto a path of fragrant flowers, blowing in the wind and welcoming them.
Herald every arrival and departure with the classy curlicues and regal petals of the fleur-de-lis.

Invite romance into your home with the Run to Me Runner. This elegant, hand-tufted silk rug is so luxuriant underfoot, it practically dares you to cast off your shoes and socks and trip lightly across its soft, thick surface.

A true knockout for both casual and formal spaces, this lavish rug is exquisite to behold and even more exquisite to caress. Just one touch of a naked toe and you’ll find your heart is powerless, your knees weak. Go ahead. Faint. Its ample, silken depths will catch you in their unforgettable embrace.
Increase your gross motor coordination with this lengthy swath of circles, perfect for hopscotch, agility drills, or just starin' at, man.
Celebrate Mother Nature at her finest with soft, soothing colors and leafy silhouettes.
An exciting play of colors and angles makes this rug anything but square.
Broad brush strokes and a pleasing palette of colors add brightness and energy to any living space.
Beauty is toe deep with this super-soft bathmat-and oh, how great it feels!
Add shimmer, sparkle, and a touch of opulence to your living space with a dramatic rug fit for royalty.
Adorned with faded filigree yet redolent with color, this striking rug encircles you in vivid memories of a not-so-distant past.
A circle is round. It has no end. That’s how long this rug will be your friend.
An up-close look at a tea rose, from the perspective of a dazed bee.
Welcome! Your shoes are filthy! The sturdy mud-gripping tracks in this rug tell your guests that you don’t trust them to wipe their feet.
A friendly accent for indoors or out, this classic handmade collection adds depth and delight to any space.
A friendly accent for indoors or out, this classic handmade collection adds depth and delight to any space.

A magnificent tribute to abstract paintings, this rug brings a modern touch of whimsy to your décor.

Make a bold statement with bright, happy stripes across invitingly soft wool.

Children spend a lot of time on the floor. They crawl around, play with action figures, you name it! They need cushioning for their knees now because it won’t do them much good once they’re old and their knees are shot. Several fun designs!!
This handmade rug in dyed wool is the perfect accessory for a more rustic, earthy look.

One advantage a submersible has over nearly any other sea vessel is that the floor stays completely dry. But that’s not to say it’s warm-not in the least. Princess Cordelia designed this beautiful and luxurious rug to keep her royal toes as toasty as can be when she rose from bed on the Eppsilon.
Feel the rhythms and exotic pleasures of foreign lands with a fringed floor piece woven with the colorful silks and charming yarns of lands beyond.
Make your dreams come true—the easy way! Don’t bother working hard and paying dues. Just put this rug in your hallway and demand attention!
Unlock by reaching level 3 of the Entertainer career.
Unlocked at level 3 of the Entertainer career.
Never again will you or your family sustain injury on sharp, prickly rug corners! This decorative area rug features only smooth, rounded curves.
This is a rug. It has four right angles. It has lines. It is a pretty rug. It will make your home pretty.
Night and day, masculine and feminine, this irresistible rug unites all of existence into a single shed-free circle.
A part used for advanced electronics upgrades.
A generic part usable in many different types of upgrades.
A part useful for advanced kitchen upgrades.
A part useful for advanced plumbing upgrades.
Boiling points! Catalysts! Exothermal reactions! A child with an authentic science experiment set has a 624% increased chance of getting into the best colleges.
How about you give this contraption a spin and see how cool it is!
A pinch of this, a dash of that, a small sprig of elbow grease to mount this pot rack to the ceiling, and you've got yourself a kitchen! BAM!
BAM! Our classic gets a little down and but not terribly dirty in this version. Perfect for homes with higher ceilings or shorter chefs.
Our classic epicurean pot rack on long, elegant extender cables. Perfect for the very short, aspiring junior chefs, and floor-level cooking surfaces.
Delight your child’s eyes and brain with this colorful array of shapes. Every time it rotates, a neuron grows!
Show off your professional-quality pans with this professional-quality rack, sturdy enough to hang even a medium-sized animal carcass for smoking or curing.
Unlock by reaching level 7 of the Culinary career while in the Chef branch.
Unlocked at level 7 of the Culinary career while in the Chef branch.
A professional-grade hanging pot rack for your professional-grade pots.
Unlock by reaching level 7 of the Culinary career while in the Chef branch.

This oval pot rack can hold hundreds of pounds of high-quality cookware suspended above your head.
Unlock by reaching level 7 of the Culinary career while in the Chef branch.
Unlocked at level 7 of the Culinary career while in the Chef branch.
Hewn from timber reclaimed from condemned log cabins, this elegant fixture lends a rustic and rugged look to any hearth.
Our classic pottery storage solution, customized with supports hand-carved against the cross-grain from ancient petrified oaken forests.
If your vaulted cathedral ceilings feel a little too airy and light, cut through the emptiness with the girders supporting this bucolic pot rack.
Pie charts would be better if they came with pie, but at least they have pretty pictures and colors to dull the senses.
Use this intricately detailed box to hold onto those precious items that you hold dear.
Unlock by reaching level 5 of the Business career.
Unlocked at level 5 of the Business career.
This treasure chest will gladly devour your precious items to keep them safe from harm.
Did you shoot this duck? Of course not, but he doesn't care. This duck is angry. This duck is hunting you. So get yours today! Great for kids bedrooms, and birthday parties!
Is he a festive lawn ornament, or a fierce and hard-bitten snow pugilist? Did artist Holly Daze intend for his mittens to be particularly evocative of boxing gloves? You decide!
Drowsy, droopy Denny delights in dancing, drinking, and daydreaming on a dare at dawn. Dauntless Denny dazzles, delivering a divine dash of derring-do.
Knock-kneed and duck-footed, Gary teaches children the importance of owning your weirdness, especially if you have a freaky black tongue.

Until we challenge our perceptions of “knowing” we will continue to claw at false cages. What happens when the brain refuses to learn the wrong lessons? Travel in strange lands without leaving the comfort of your own brain. The Renascent, by Reclamation Homeware.
Babbling fish? Check. Dirty bathtowel? Check. Stylish yet supremely comfortable footrest? Buy it now!
It’s probably best not to ponder too much how the fellow got up there. Let’s just say that gnomes move in mysterious ways.

Bravo! Your Sims 3 adventures have earned you a trophy so large, your Sims can barely caress its shimmering pinnacle. But they can pat the Freezer Bunny, or hug the llama, or curl up below it in sheer wonderment. Beautiful, isn’t it?

Layer on the delights with this charming étagère. Designed to showcase your most enviable treasures, the four quaint, yet solid, shelves expose all to the admiring eye. Select your most cherished heirlooms and dare to bare them. This discreet display won’t let you down.

Why should produce have all the fun? These vintage fruit crates offer ingenious storage for toys, books, curios … anything your heart desires! Stack them up or scatter them about for a dash of country inspiration. The effect is so pleasing, your glee will be uncontainable.

Add a touch of old world charm with this rustic iron milk pail. One glimpse, and you can’t help but imagine the merry milkmaid, cheeks flushed in the cold, fresh air of a country morning as she leans against the warm, soft flanks of her cow. A beautiful vision…in a deftly tarnished bucket.

Your life should be filled with flowers—fields and meadows of them, towering golden sunflowers and vibrant, lovely lavender. But when you simply can’t get away, you can roll the beauty of the countryside right up onto your porch with the Caress Wheel Barrench. Friendly, earthy and functional, this handcart-turned-plant bench is the perfect resting spot for captive flowers and runaway souls.

Welcome nature into your garden with this hand-detailed ceramic bunny, a darling little visitor to nestle in your fragrant fields. Perky and playful, with a slightly porous finish, this eager companion can weather the most fervent storm.

The Screen of Secrets provides a nice, homey feel with pleasing colors and lovely, hand-painted flowers. But what goes on behind this dainty screen? Why, anything your little imagination can think of…

Retreat behind this natural-wood screen to dress or undress in tantalizing seclusion. Delicately carved and embellished with a charming floral print, this sweet divider is the picture of propriety—with only a few slim peepholes to taunt the curious eye.

Hewn from well-seasoned wood and then left out in the elements to age, this once-regal screen delivers the utmost privacy. Toss off your clothes with carefree abandon, dance and twirl to your hearts’ desire. No one can see you but you.

This stately ceramic vase takes command of any indoor or outdoor space, as well as anyone in it. Don’t be concerned by its haughty nature. It secretly covets attention, and the occasional furtive embrace.
The perfect combination of ease, durability and unobtrusiveness comes together in this handsome laundry hamper.
This simple plastic basket holds a single load of laundry with impeccable elan.
Who needs a hamper? Free-form laundry pile can occupy odd-shaped floor plans, spare furniture, and can even be shoved perfunctorily into dresser drawers.
A lot of bathroom storage in a small footprint. Helps keep dangerous medications out of the reach of children and short adults.
A cool, calm basin of water attracts not only local wildlife, but encourages quiet meditation. Your garden is the serenest.
Is this finely chiseled bust an artistic tribute to a great man or a hat rack? The world may never know.

Princess Cordelia once lived in a giant palace. After moving to a submarine of only forty-eight rooms, she no longer needed her full wait staff. She knew her butler wouldn’t be happy with so little to manage so she let him go. With a tear in her eye, she made this sculpture to remember him by.
Free-standing coat rack will sit quietly in the corner and hold your outerwear with nary a protest.
A room divider deliberately reminiscent of Japanese shoji screens, perfect for providing the illusion of privacy and separation without actually following through.
The plastic pink flamingo has a storied history as the premiere artifact of 20th century lawn kitsch. Display it ironically or earnestly; no one will know the difference.
Not enough for an entire rock garden, this scattering of stones adds visual interest to your outdoor spaces and makes barefoot walking that much more interesting as well.
You never used your locker in school, but now that you're home, they're suddenly trendy. Try one in the bathroom, play room, laundry room, or mud room.
A bank of lockers for those who feel nostalgic about high school gym class. Stores everything short of freshman hazing victims.
Double shoe rack with enough space for all your boots, flats, pumps, peep toes, sandals, platforms, mules, wedges, and kitten heels.
Double shoe rack for the man who has everything -- including more than three pairs of shoes.
An active athlete doesn't always have time to properly store their sports stuff. A pile by the door will do.
The RAW Bathroom Shelf by PostRustic blends raw metal framing with wooden shelf inlays for an industrial feel in your WC.
PostRustic's crate display is perfect for decorating a commercial venture or making your breakfast nook look like the chain café down the street.
What could be more rustic than an antique metal milk jug with a tree branch artfully placed inside? Nothing, that's what.
Antique Metal Milk Jug With Branch

Originally, designer B.F. Harlow constructed this llama only from wire. However, after some rather disturbing mid-20th century studies on the mother-child bond that used a wire surrogate, he went with this soft plush material instead.
A roly-poly unicorn pal who'll save your little ones' coins until it's time for them to smash it to bits to reclaim their cash.

Displaying fragile housewares on a submersible can be tricky, as sooner or later you always hit rough waters. Inspired by the muscular, sucker-bearing tentacles of undersea cephalopods, this étagère actually clings to the walls and floor wherever it is set, and features discreet suckers on each shelf to secure breakable items.

Princess Cordelia was a strong-willed woman. Aboard her submarine, The Eppsilon, she traveled the world, building furniture and stopping at ports to sell her wares. When feeling adventurous, she would spin the globe and say “Where should I go?” Where it stopped, she went. Bring this replica globe into your home. Adventure!
The Where Should I Go? Ball

Use this lightweight portable partition as a room divider, dressing room screen, or simply to hide unsightly piles of junk from prying eyes.
A tall floor vase perfect for postmodern floral arrangements.
Originally worn by Sir Lottalance, this suit of armor will add flair to your foyer or library. It's good for haunted houses, too.
Knight of the Octagon Table Suit of Armor
A quaint old-fashioned room divider perfect for preserving your modesty as you slip into something more comfortable.
Life is always a party with an instant-on laser light show that’s glowing with surprises. Light up the night with special animations featuring the Freezer Bunny or Grim Reaper. It’s Laserrific!
Let There Be Light! Laser Show
This classic fountain design consists of a tier of round basins each spilling water into another.
A playful fountain to add wit and whimsy to your outdoor spaces.
Three stacked boxes overflow with water in this excruciatingly modern fountain.
A lily pad big enough for a frog to sit upon.
Lily pads add visual interest to a body of still water without taking away from its tranquil nature.
Water lilies symbolize deep spirituality and contemplation, as well as longevity, fertility, and even the eternal renewal of life.
Blocky rooftop vents exchange hot and cold air, keeping the climate in your building at an optimum temperature-controlled level.
This rooftop HVAC unit may look quaint but it packs a heating and cooling punch.
Invite your feathered friends home to roost in their very own rooftop abode.
This clever gnome has traveled to the great beyond and back to bring a fright to your lawn. He’s the perfect decoration for a newly haunted home.

Some say that the age of handwriting is over, that those who fail to master today’s newfangled electronic “word processing” devices are fossils. Bah, humbug, we say! Enjoy the deliberate obsolescence of an archaic writing implement today with Executron!
Unlock by reaching level 8 of the Business career while in the Investor branch.
Unlocked at level 8 of the Business career while in the Investor branch.
(Found on a sticker on the underside of the nameplate) COMPANY PROPERTY, NOT FOR HOME USE, DO NOT REMOVE.

This is an incredibly rare trophy. Every year, only a few dozen are made. Well, except for a few extras due to injury replacements, or honorary All-Stars, or really special people. So really, there are only a few thousand in the world. So yeah, pretty rare.
Unlock by reaching level 8 of the Athlete career while in the Professional Athlete branch.
Unlocked at level 8 of the Athlete career while in the Professional Athlete branch.
This trophy is made of solid gold -- but don't worry! It features a ton of theft-protection features. Mainly, it's just too heavy for anyone who isn't a bodybuilder to walk away with it.

Unlocked at level 7 of the Athlete career while in the Body Builder branch.

You may not be the best player in the game or even at your particular position and maybe you're not even on the best team, but at least an arbitrary group of people have by some consensus agreed that you are the most "valuable." Whatever that means.
Unlock by reaching level 10 of the Athlete career while in the Professional Athlete branch.
Unlocked at level 10 of the Athlete career while in the Professional Athlete branch.
No one's quite sure what you have to do to earn this company award. Pretty sure it has something to do with some kind of acronym...
Unlock by reaching level 3 of the Business career.
Unlocked at level 3 of the Business career.

Is anyone more useless than a middle manager? Too high up to do work, and too low to make important decisions. At least with our Tiny Tranquility Zen Garden you'll be the absolute master of one square foot of sand and artificial pebbles.
Unlock by reaching level 6 of the Business career.
Unlocked at level 6 of the Business career.

This decoration was granted for the New Lunar Year of the Pig, starting in February 2019. The Pig returned home from the New Lunar Year celebration to find her piglets bundled in slumber, and the guardian Crows huddled in sleep nearby. With her arrival, the Crows awoke and recounted how excited her children were for the new year. As they were leaving, the Pig retrieved a metallic object from a mantle and offered, "I have nothing of value that matches the good fortune I've had tonight save for this heirloom, so I wish to pass that luck to you in gratitude." The Crows left with a promise to visit again soon. At their nest, the Crows examined the sycee quizzically for a while, and tried prying it open. Unsuccessful, there was a moment of silence... and finally sudden laughter and exclamation: "Oh, it's not a bowl with food or drink inside!"

This Pig statuette was granted for the New Lunar Year of the Pig, starting in February 2019. Every new lunar year, the countryside animals celebrate in a grand hall decorated with symbolic sycees and paper lanterns. This year, the new year arrived without the honored animal. The Pig arrived near the party's end and sat at a table in quiet embarrassment, noticed by the Goat. With all red envelopes gifted and food eaten, the Goat plucked a kumquat from a potted citrus tree and offered half to the Pig. She accepted with relief and explained she could not find anyone to care for her piglets until friendly Crows returned to her farm. With the Goat's understanding and help with introductions, the Pig's embarrassment melted away to happiness during the remaining festivities. The celebration ended at sunrise, and the Goat accompanied the Pig home. They decided their children should meet and exchange panda toys as friends, just as they had become. It is okay to be last and late. Good friends will wait for you.

For artists and aspiring artists. This perfect hand reference model can help you sketch the perfect hand!\n\nBased on hand models from the best hands of all worlds, this model will provide excellent reference for those studying the art of shaping hands.

Do not be fooled by the friendly or childish appearance of the circuitry kit. This kit means serious business while you work away in your experiment, or repairs. Brush up your skills, or just play around, this kit offers all and does all!
For bullet journalling, doodling, drawing, writing, plotting, and many other things. The Note Book, is the book for all notes, all the book you would only need.
Designed to look like fragile porcelain, this little critter is actually built tough from kid-safe synthetics to withstand bumps, bangs, scratches, tornadoes, fire, and packs of savage wolves.
Your baby will go buggy for this precious ladybug statuette, even though the statuette is terrified of your baby.
This magnificent blob of clay is ripe for your imaginative projections. It will be whatever you want it to be, or at least a reasonable likeness.

Believe it or not, this priceless bowl is the result of a lucky accident. Lulled by the hum of the potter’s wheel, the artist nodded off and dropped the bowl, causing the distinctive divot along one edge. Amazed at the effect, the potter tried to replicate it, but to this day has never achieved such a delightfully perfect flaw.
Add a touch of whimsy to your home with this ceramic bunny statue. This delightful little fellow can always be trusted not to eat your vegetables.
At once traditional and avant-garde, this strikingly contemporary bust commemorates the grand courts of old. Pay tribute to past and present with the unparalleled Le Courtier.
Stars are emblems of hope-glistening wishes, distant dreams. Modern artist Maya Braine challenges our preconceptions with this rock-solid sculpture.
A somber study of the walls people build, and the games we play.
This sweet llama statue adds charm to any hearth or sideboard. Adopt just one or create a family to showcase your domestic bliss.
A raw interpretation of what happens when you microwave your s’more.
A brutal depiction of the battle over the very last campfire marshmallow.
The epitome of the anti-functional art movement, this country-style teapot has been sealed shut with rubber cement and transformed into “mere” art.

Like the grand sculptures of yesteryear, this modern art piece is one of many celebrating the significance of contemporary landmarks. (Plastic knockoffs available at the airport for just a trifle less.)
The female form has long been the subject of fine art, but this simple silhouette is a more modern (and dare we say fun?) take on the classic.

Just like flames, we are born into this world, we grow, we dance, and eventually we disappear in a curl of sharp-smelling smoke. Set fire to The Definitive, by Reclamation Homeware, and add your light to the world.

Nothing says farm-fresh décor like this adorable wicker basket! Woven in the exact shape of its créateur’s favorite hen, this lively little biddy looks as if she might hop up and start pecking crumbs right off your bar or table. Fill her with flowers, warm buns or anything else you desire.

This pudgy little porker is a cheery and impish addition to any home. One glimpse into his mischievous eyes and you know he’s thinking naughty thoughts. Whatever could be passing through that piggish little brain? Let’s play a guessing game!

Enlist the services of a charming personal chef. Jolly, pink and generously proportioned, this friendly companion has an appetite for finer morsels. Indulge him by writing on his ready little slab. Then wipe it clean and start afresh, for another day full of delights.

Brighten your kitchen with this rustic ceramic pitcher. With a firm, lovely handle and open mouth, this hunk of clay is ever eager to hold more. Bring on the whisk, the baster, a whole battalion of wooden spoons. It welcomes all with the utmost cheer.

Give your wooden spoons a beautiful place to rest. Smooth and inviting, with admirable curves, this glossy pitcher is so lovely, you can’t help but caress its shimmering sides. Cradle its roundness, trace your finger around its rim, then listen as your spoons hit home with a truly pleasing smack.

Proud, graceful and perfectly proportioned, this exquisite ceramic rooster is sure to satisfy the most discerning taste. Go ahead. Give him a little pat. He’ll have you, and your entire gathering, crowing with delight.

Rest your eyes on this vintage Country Cockerel and you’ll be riveted. Captured mid-crow, this hand-painted centerpiece brings the liveliness of farmyard courtship right into your home and plops it on top of your dining room table! Adore it. Coo over it. Then dig right in.

This massive stone urn will add architectural drama to any patio or garden space. Hand-chipped and smashed for added interest and texture, the Antique Urn’s beauty is so astonishing, so stoic, you’ll long to curl up beside it and hear its darkest secrets.

Place your loved ones to rest in total dignity, or just pretend you did. One of the most delightful qualities of this pretty little urn is the lid. What could be concealed inside? You’ll cherish the mystery.

The elegant simplicity of this urn is deceptive. Peek inside and discover the subtle scars of time, hints of a furtive past that is so utterly heartbreaking, you’ll want to fill its depths with tears. Now wait. Pause a moment and contemplate your life. Doesn't it seem marvelous?
Keep everything you need at your fingertips-and away from everyone else’s. An elegant way to say “MINE” without saying anything.
Nothing smacks of domestic bliss like the scent of freshly folded laundry. Leave a few stacks lying around to get credit for all you do.
Keep smiles shiny and bright with Happy Teeth brushes and toothpaste. Comes with a tidy holder for accentuated hygiene.
Give your home the feel of a five-star hotel with folded bath towels at the ready. The ultimate escape whenever you need it!
Create an air of romance with these vanilla-scented candles. Wonderful for an evening with that special someone, or a bubble bath you, yourself, and you.
Remember when you used to need these to listen to music? You do? Then you’re definitely old enough to have these lying around.
Unlock by reaching level 7 of the Tech Guru career while in the Gamer branch.
Unlocked at level 7 of the Tech Guru career while in the eSport Gamer branch.
Why rely on natural pheromones? Trigger animal attraction every time with an arsenal of killer cologne.
Dining in? Transform your kitchen into a full-service restaurant with this fanciful condiment kit, complete with customizable menu!
Show off your green thumb with this handy basket and tool set-painted with bright flowers that are nearly as cheerful as your own.
Your garden is so robust, those naughty flowers grow everywhere! Look-even your watering can is bursting with gorgeous blooms.
Commemorate your early villainous inventions, whether they existed or not. Enclosed in indestructible safety glass, to ensure that mysterious enemies can’t use it against you.
Unlocks this item by reaching level 10 of the secret agent career while in the villain branch.
Unlocked at level 10 of the Secret Agent career while in the Villain branch.
There’s nothing you love more than puttering around your garden, so show it! These garden essentials come with rust and soil already caked on, for that I-really-dig-gardening effect.
A practical collection of basic tools, to show you really do get your hands dirty. Or at least, your gloves.
Add a little whimsy-and protection-to your garden with this charming fellow. A veritable sentinel for birds and squirrels, he takes his duties seriously.
This spritely fellow is sure to make you smile. And with special all-season paint, you can spread cheer all year!

He may have the classic gnome beard, but this cute little guy will always be your darling. Look at him reaching for your indulgent face, as if to say, “Up! Carry Me!” But you know he’s better off right in your garden, where he can warm your heart forever.
Gnome Matter What, I’m Still Your Baby
Every self-respecting cook must have one.
Brush up your look every day with this fanciful array of nail color. Or just leave them around to brighten your house.
If you desire a paper towel dispenser with severe yet functional style, look no further.
Smell as beautiful as you look-or better!
Keep your body scented and boudoir tidy with these fancy perfume bottles and matching tray. Ooh la la!
Why clutter the planet with plastic? Store your soap in this elegant dispenser that’s as smart as it is stylish.
Features reinforced seams, a padded base and ergonomic construction so all those books feel light as a feather. Small front zippered pocket has dedicated storage for pens, pencils, gum, and phone.
Get an A+ in organization with color-coded binders and an adorable bunny bookend.
Sharpen your study skills with a cup o’ pencils always at the ready.

You never know what life has in store. With just one box of Softy tissues, you can be prepared for everything from allergy season to sappy movies to absolute heartbreak. Softy tissues-we’re here for you.
Set your dreams adrift with this antique wooden canal boat, refurbished with lead-free green and red paint!
Turn any space into a showroom for one of the fastest, most fun cars ever made. Built to scale from metal and plastic and varnished in classic canary yellow.
Paddle down a river of nostalgia for the grand old days when these boats reigned. The River Queen is decked out in intricate detail with authentic woodwork, gleaming brass and indentured servants.
This realistically detailed trolley is every hobbyist’s dream! Working doors, turning wheels, and an accurately molded body are always geared up for a ride down memory lane.
The toy of a child's dreams! This engine car is part of a larger train set--complete with working wheels and doors!
The toy of a child's dreams! This cargo car is part of a larger train set--complete with working wheels and doors!
The toy of a child's dreams! This passenger car is part of a larger train set--complete with working wheels and doors!
The toy of a child's dreams! This coal cart is part of a larger train set--complete with working wheels!
The toy of a child's dreams! This caboose is part of a larger train set--complete with working wheels and doors!

Gun your engines and get revved for the ultimate model muscle car! The Midnight Raven is die-cast for pin-perfect authenticity. Tinted windows make it easy to picture yourself behind the wheel, or steaming up the backseat.
This scale model works as well as the original truck! Showcase it on your shelf, take it for a spin, or use it to haul off some other kid’s marbles.
This Super 6000 Propeller Plane model is an exact replica of the original aerobatic two-seater. Set your imagination soaring and try out some stunts of your own.

A precise replica of the van used by the famous Banana Bank Heist criminals. Some believe the van’s easy-to-spot color was the fatal mistake that led to the crew’s capture, but when police discovered the criminals had been using concealed bananas, not guns, to hold up the banks, they peeled decades off their sentences.
Fiercely carved from a angry looking piece of mahogany, this raw wooden sculpture screams of head-throbbing rage and brute savagery.
Part of a special collection of wooden figurines that comes with its own storybook, the Grizzly stars in “Camper’s Dream,” a campfire tale sure to give you shivers.
Part of a special collection of wooden figurines that comes with its own storybook, this darling Bunny hops to the rescue as hero of the Easter tale, “Gimme Back My Eggs.”

Part of a special collection of wooden figurines that comes with its own storybook, the Dragon stars in “Fire in the Hold,” the tale of a boy who loves his dragon so much, he makes the mistake of hugging it.

Part of a special collection of wooden figurines that comes with its own storybook, this Circus Elephant is the brave hero of the uplifting tale, “Let’s Roll!” Born with one useless leg, the elephant is secretly raised by a circus worker who teaches him to roll on a ball, transforming him into the attraction that saves the circus from bankruptcy.
A reenactment of the famous scene from the classic animated family feature 'Avians and Llamas' where Grumpy Sparrow finds herself enjoying the intimate embrace of Jon Swift.

Part of a special collection of wooden figurines that comes with its own storybook, this wild Stallion stars in “Untamed,” a racy romance about a woman, a cowboy, and the horse that taught them to love.
Made of knotty pine with a dark-cherry finish, this kitchen essential comes with all the knives you need to chop, slice, dice, or pare your ingredients the good old-fashioned way.

Part of a special collection of wooden figurines that comes with its own storybook, the “Jolly Lumberjack” rescues a woman and her two small children by chopping open their burning cabin. However, he singes his mustache in the process, making him a tad less jolly.

A scene from the popular childrens' folktale where an abandoned beach ball learns the meaning of friendship and youthful exuberance through the adventures it has with his new friend, the dolphin named "Doll Fin."
There is no joy here. There is only emptiness. This mask is the facade I wear to the world. The scroll underneath helps it balance.
You’ve got your mind on more important matters than putting your house in order. See?
They simply don’t make cameras like they used to. What fine memories were captured by this ten-pound lens--and the person strong enough to lift it.
Show off your caffeine commitment by adding this antique coffee pot to your décor.
Wake Me Up Antique Coffee Pot
From PostRustic's Raw line, this utensil holder brings no-nonsense style to your kitchen counter.
A beautiful repurposing of the finest antique architecture, this modern vase is embraced by two hand-carved oak corbels, recovered tacitly from the mantel of some old guy’s fireplace.
This industrial mug rack from PostRustic is a stunning work of art perfect for displaying the vessels that get you through the morning.

This fully functional cast iron scale can be used to ensure absolute fairness in distributing everything from coffee in the morning to dessert at night. Also useful to see your teacup poodle’s weight in gold, to compare apples and oranges, or just to remind visitors of your own sense of justice.
Give your degrees gravitas with this fine display. No diplomas necessary-we’ve already included some for you!
Keep your spices in line with PostRustic's tabletop spice rack.
Made from pieces of scrap metal bolted together, this decorative piece might not hold water (or tea), but it looks great on a sideboard.
She may not help keep your pool clean, but gnomebody dresses up your poolside like this bathing beauty.
While other gnomes laze around your garden or relax poolside, the Strictly Business Gnome has no time for any of that nonsense. He's got places to go, calls to make, and meetings to attend.

Cake? Check. Noise maker? Check. Party hat? Check. Llama’s not waking, bunnies freezing, roses budding, and splines reticulating? Check. Doesn’t take much more than that to get the party started! Happy fifteen!

Give your loved one a super soft stuffed bear to show them how much you care! He's a perfect gift for that special person on Valentine's Day, birthdays, anniversaries or any love-filled day of the year.

Some say he’s just a nutcracker, others know him as the war hero, Corporal McCracken. But a rare few know his true identity, “The Shrouded Oracle,” ninja in waiting. Standing patiently, ever vigilant, until ‘the day’ arrives. So, go ahead, and crack your nuts, but know the Shrouded Oracle waits. Hope he does not wait for you.
“My mother never allowed herself to be photographed. Though I recall, she looked quite a lot like, the Catrina doll.” - Bonehilda

Not to be mistaken for an inhabitant of R'lyeh. This gnome has traveled far and wide to live in peace amongst the other gnomes in your garden. He will try to fit in, to make friends, guard your lot from evil... or rise up and rule over all Sims ensuing chaos and cast aside all concepts of normalcy.

Hailing originally from the Cave of Caerbannog, there is more to this gnome than meets the eye. Succumb to its cuteness, stare into its childlike innocent eyes that can look into your soul... and potentially own it!

Stripped of all modern trappings and shorn of any responsibility, the Bare Essentials Gnome is a titillating effigy of the squat Sim form at its most diminutive state. Encased in a grid of decent propriety and ensconced in one’s shame, this gnome enters your home as one enters the world - naked.

This decoration was granted for the New Lunar Year of the Pig, starting in February 2019.\n\nA new year brings the promise of new beginnings and wishes of good luck and fortune. Such hope is contained in these boxes with citrus (oranges, kumquats, and tangerines) and Simoleons inside red envelopes.

These decorations were granted for the New Lunar Year of the Pig, starting in February 2019.\n\nChildren running off to open these envelopes filled with happiness, luck, and wealth is a humorous and joyful sight, but as an adult, take a moment to appreciate the giver’s well wishes for you and your future year. Only then, enjoy the gift, especially if the contents inside are of a Six Spirit Bag, with wind, fire, all that kind of thing.

Once known as Steve, the Reagnomper, has taken it upon himself to wander the land, searching for the unwanted, the broken, and the discarded gnomes of the lawn’verse. Those he finds he takes back to his home, where he grinds them up, allowing them to find a new recycled existence as a toilet, shower, or potting soil.
The Bearly Gnome's natural environment is outdoors, so he'll enjoy being placed on the front lawn to greet (or annoy) the neighbors.

People always ask us how to make their MegaMission furniture look well-used without having to interact with it at all. We always recommend that they place the Mega Couple Of Books on their table or desk. It tells people, “Hey, reading is a thing I do, and I often do it around this location!”

Nothing says “antique” like the least efficient form of map ever devised by man: the globe! We considered showing all of the continents merged together as Pangaea just to give it that extra, old-fashioned edge but it didn’t test as well. Built by nanobots!

We’ve instructed the robots at the MegaMission Furniture Warehouse to construct hundreds of different objects, but this is one they actually came up with on their own! Made with our proprietary synth-plant polymer.

Before the Great Sloth Invasion, Princess Cordelia was said to have brilliant prospects. Princes came from miles around just to have tea with her. Of course, we know today that the Princess had a thing for pirates, but we still created this stunning bust to remind us how she would have looked to prince and pirate alike.

Princess Cordelia’s 3rd pirate boyfriend, Captain Rodrigo De Pablo, suffered many injuries aboard the Eppsilon. Once, while fleeing a kraken, the hatch slammed shut on his feet, and he couldn’t stand for weeks. The Princess designed this cask while nursing her sweetheart back to health. With it she could quench his bottomless thirst whilst he lay prone beneath it.
Unlock by reaching level 6 of the Culinary career while in the Mixologist branch.
Unlocked at level 6 of the Culinary career while in the Mixologist branch.

It’s easy to lose track of time on a submersible, so Princess Cordelia designed this clock to create some order in her days. Unfortunately, it was still impossible to tell day from night, so she gave up and fed it to a kraken. Today, land-dwelling collectors find it much more useful.

Princess Cordelia’s 2nd pirate boyfriend, Captain Chaz MacFreeling, was as vain about his galleon as he was about his looks. He commissioned Princess Cordelia’s staff to carve him a replica, but he spent so much time gazing at it, she had it smashed to bits. This is a replica of the replica, rebuilt in astonishing detail by contemporary artisans.

Princess Cordelia adored crabs almost as much as she adored tea. Nothing was more delightful than seeing them dart about the tide pools in mortal fear of gulls! The Princess designed this tea set to capture the crab’s alacrity. She was working on a version that actually scuttled off, but the plans blew away while she was sipping tea.
Have a blast with this super-stellar miniature, featuring working lights and realistic rocket sounds! The perfect choice for aspiring astronauts everywhere.
Unlock by reaching level 3 of the Astronaut career
Unlocked at level 3 of the Astronaut career.
Keep your most important contacts at your fingertips, and show ’em off a bit while you’re at it.
Unlock by reaching level 2 of the Entertainer career.
Unlocked at level 2 of the Entertainer career.

Every self-respecting spy needs gadgets-and inside knowledge into a mysterious master plan. Of course, you can’t exactly leave the tools of this particular trade lying about, but it can help to impress persons of, well, personal interest.
Unlock by reaching level 2 of the Criminal career.
Unlocked at level 2 of the Criminal career.
Wow! The original blueprints for the Star Seeker 1001. Time to get busy.
Unlock by reaching level 4 of the Astronaut career.
Unlocked at level 4 of the Astronaut career.
Your engineering prowess has been recognized by the entire scientific community! Place this somewhere prominent, in case people haven’t heard about it.
Innovator’s Award for Excellence in Science
Unlock by reaching level 6 of the Tech Guru career.
Unlocked at level 6 of the Tech Guru career.
Your potential for stardom has reached new heights! This not-so-humble award is proof at last: you’ve got what it takes. Now run with it.
Unlock by reaching level 6 of the Entertainer career while in the Comedy branch.
Unlocked at level 6 of the Entertainer career while in the Comedy branch.
You’ve got your hands on a computer hard drive-and not just any computer hard drive. Do with it what you will, no questions asked.
Unlock by reaching level 3 of the Tech Guru career.
Unlocked at level 3 of the Tech Guru career.
Your knack for no-good deeds hasn’t gone unnoticed. Take this as a quiet acknowledgment, while everyone looks the other way.
Unlock by reaching level 3 of the Criminal career.
Unlocked at level 3 of the Criminal career.
These are the kind of bars you love to get behind-and now they are yours, all yours.
Unlock by reaching level 7 of the Criminal career while in the Boss branch.
Unlocked at level 7 of the Criminal career while in the Boss branch.
Bravo-your prodigious talent has earned you an Off the Charts Music Award! Get out your fancy garb and start writing that acceptance speech.
Unlock by reaching level 6 of the Entertainer career while in the Music branch.
Unlocked at level 6 of the Entertainer career while in the Music branch.
Accept this sweet-smelling centerpiece as recognition that your talents have blossomed.
Unlock by completing a Wedding Social Event at Silver level or higher.
Unlocked by completing a wedding at silver level or higher.
Nice! You’re getting the red carpet treatment now.
Unlock by completing a Date at Gold level.
Unlocked by completing a date at gold level.
These antique leather-bound tomes are proof you’re earning your place in Literary History. Breathe in their fabulous musty odor-it’s the scent of true fame.
Unlock by reaching level 6 of the Writer career while in the Author branch.
Unlocked at level 6 of the Writer career while in the Author branch.
Any self-respecting writer would be tickled to receive the Nom de Plume-and now you have it! (If you’re not feeling tickled, lean in closer. It works!)
Unlock by reaching level 8 of the Writer career while in the Author branch.
Unlocked at level 8 of the Writer career while in the Author branch.
Some of the most brilliant works of all time were tapped out on a typewriter just like this one. Commemorate the Greats, and join their ranks, with this prodigious award.
Unlock by reaching level 9 of the Writer career while in the Journalist branch.
Unlocked at level 9 of the Writer career while in the Journalist branch.
You’re not only well read, you pride yourself on owning first editions of all the great classics. Display these brilliant finds-and your brilliance along with them.
You want your skin to feel and smell marvelous. Achieve your most intimate desires with fragrant hand soaps, rich lotions, and scented talc on hand.
Created exclusively for men, this premium line of body care essentials leaves your skin as soft and sweet as a baby’s, while the robust, hard-edged packaging reassures you you’re still a man.
Keep healthy snacks on hand, or at least, where other people can see them.
Get cooking with this handy set of countertop cooking utensils. Guaranteed not to scratch your pans-though they do make convenient back scratchers.
Tickle your fancy with this nature-inspired print. Soft, illusory and delightfully mysterious, it leaves you with a fluttering so delightful, you’ll want to frame it and keep it on your dresser.
The simply organic beauty of a pear, trapped within the exquisite austerity of a modern chrome frame. Simple, sparkling, stunning!
This pure white modern frame fades gracefully into the painting’s white background, making the red of the apple deliciously vibrant and bold.
Apple of Your Eye Framed Watercolor
Store your favorite vintages in this tabletop rack inspired by the industrious honeybee and its hexagonal home.
Ah, who can forget the fabulous Llamacorn team of '10 or was it '12? Maybe '14?
Unlock by reaching level 7 of the Athlete career while in the Professional Athlete branch.
Unlocked at level 7 of the Athlete career while in the Professional Athlete branch.
Mr. or Ms. Solar System is not just the fittest man or woman in the world. He or she is the fittest man or woman in the galaxy, nay: the multiverse!
Unlock by reaching level 10 of the Athlete career while in the Body Builder branch.
Unlocked at level 10 of the Athlete career while in the Body Builder branch.
It may look like a simple pen holder, nothing out of the ordinary! And that may be true, but look at those lines...that style. It can dress any desk effortlessly and still hold any pen you want.
Unlike many unschooled “intellectuals,” you put your books to regular use. Stacks like these are merely the result of one afternoon’s inquiry, a casual attempt to satiate your cavernous curiosity.
Adorn your mantle and fill your heart with the gentle tick-tock of this antique rosewood clock. Features a hand-painted dial and polished bevel for timelessly elegant time-keeping.
Who stole the cookie from the cookie jar? This ceramic storage urn holds enough cookies that nobody will ever have to resort to thievery again.
Perfect for dog lovers everywhere, this classic statuette pays tribute to the fine breeding, exceptional nose, and extraordinary skill of the Royal Family’s pointers.
Artfully arranged to entice the appetite, these luscious fruits are kind of like having a still life in your drawing room, unless, of course, you upset the bowl.

Culinary inspiration is always within reach with this attractive spice rack. Designed to showcase the rich colors and varied textures of the many fine spices in your life, the Spice of Life Spice Rack is both practical and profound.
Embrace the romance of a garden gone wild. This weathered tin watering can is overflowing with lilies, as if they couldn’t resist taking root!
Some people go for holiday wreaths, some prefer garlands. What do I say? I say it depends on if you're more of a linear person, or whether you are possessed of a more circular nature.
Let your walls get in on the holiday fun with this Hanukkah-themed garland.
Sure, snowflakes aren't really this big, and can't be strung up. And yeah they tend to melt pretty quickly. But that's not the point! Get the feeling of snow without the actual thing!
For those who prefer their holiday foliage in ring format instead of conical, there are holiday wreaths.

Sure, any idiot can look at the latest stock prices on a computer. But not just any idiot has the office space to show the world his or her interest in the minute-to-minute fluctuations in stock prices.
Unlock by reaching level 7 of the Business career while in the Investor branch.
Unlocked at level 7 of the Business career while in the Investor branch.
It's hard to keep up with all the changes when children are learning and growing each day. But never fear, they'll be moody teenagers before you know it.
Light up your walls with these festive lights! Available in Extra Long, Long, Standard and Short.
Light up your walls with these festive lights! Available in Extra Long, Long, Standard and Short.
Light up your walls with these festive lights! Available in Extra Long, Long, Standard and Short.
