Lay upon the wall in four,
Skulls, butterfly, birds to adore.
Hanging for the dead I knew,
Until my turn to visit you.
“I think the deceased like flowers, because their noses have nothing better to do… now that they don’t need to drink coffee.” - Olive Specter

Why have one trendy pattern and style when you can have two?! Choose from different designs and patterns that wonderfully complement each other.\n\nNo walls need to be damaged with nails or adhesives, these are leaning paintings! They go against any wall you desire, have them in a new location every week, every day if so desired!
Better As A Pair Of Paintings
Celebrate your accomplishments! Display it proudly!\n\nCelebrate being your own boss, on your own terms, no matter the trade!
Unlock by maxing out the performance meter in any trade within the Freelancer career for the first time.
Unlocked the first time a Sim maxed out the performance meter in any trade within the Freelancer career.
Unlock by maxing out the performance meter in the Freelancer career as a Freelance Artist for the first time.
Unlocked the first time a Sim maxed out the performance meter in the Freelancer career as a Freelance Artist.
Fly your colors high, and display your pride!
Ever wish you could bathe in the sun's light mere miles from its firey surface? Now you can, with this reflective wall installation!
Shower safe with this acid-proof bathrobe hook! Never worry about the space squid again!
Robe of the Believer Wall Hook

This towel rack is the pinnacle of everything we have achieved at Reclamation Homeware. We nearly retired from our art when we saw it, convinced as we were that its design could never be surpassed. Yet the heart may not always listen to what the brain claims to know. We forge ahead!
Expose your most intimate belongings in this antiqued medicine cabinet. Three tidy shelves cradle the secrets to your beauty, while glass double doors allow visitors a looky-loo.
Immortalize Bessie the next time you whip up an ambrosia salad with this lovely classic kitchen decoration.
There's nothing like a gelatin casserole in the shape of one of our porcine friends. In the meantime, this makes your kitchen look homey.

You’ll love dressing up your home with this dainty delight. Each flirty, floral, and fabulously feminine dish is gently nestled in wicked hooks of metal. Intricately designed, with wistful peaks and many naughty embellishments, nothing caters better to true domestic fantasy.

What better way to juice up your walls than with this vintage crate art? Feel the sunshine pouring over you like melted butter, imagine the sweet scent of the fragile blossoms and savor the tender fruit dissolving in your mouth. One look and your guests will be instantly transported!

Kindle appetites all around with the scarlet appeal of autumn apples. Hand-painted on actual reclaimed crate wood, this cheery vintage art is as tasty as it is tasteful. With round, rosy fruit kissed by summer’s dew, you’ll have everyone cooing come fall, “How about them apples?”
This wall hanging is guaranteed to bring a little sunshine to your wall--and your day.
This splashy towel rack just loves to be admired. Cover it demurely with your plushest towels, but leave the dashing brackets bare to the adoring eye.
A shiny reminder of a day at the beach in your very own WC.
A wall-mounted shower caddy generously sized to accommodate all your shampoos, conditioners, body washes, moisturizers, gels, oils, soaks, salts, polishes, creams, and scrubs, you product fiend you.
This simple metal towel rack comes pre-stocked with unprepossessing white bath towels suitable for all your shower and bath needs.
This simple metal towel rack waits humbly to cradle your carefully curated bath linen collection.
Head all "What's for dinner?" queries off at the pass with this large illustrated chalkboard menu.
Mount this elegantly understated coat rack to keep jackets off the floor.
A large bulletin board suitable for pinning coupons, flyers, and report cards for easy display.
A tidy little space-saver with a shelf up top and a coat rack underneath.
Another tidy little space-saver with a shelf up top and a coat rack underneath.
Another Wall-Mounted Coat Rack With Shelf
Now your hose will never be mistaken for a garden snake again.
Still another tidy little space-saver with a shelf up top and a coat rack underneath.
Yet Another Wall-Mounted Coat Rack With Shelf
Hang your dress clothes on the handy mounted bar and stash your accessories on the accommodating shelf above.
A smattering of photos, motivational posters, and other mementos haphazardly tacked up on the wall.
Holds a single toilet paper roll with both efficiency and aplomb.
This chalkboard is great for leaving notes and jotting down recipes, but mostly just adding a homey element to a kitchen in which you usually eat pizza you had delivered.
Nothing says "Eat up!" like an oversized fork and spoon.
What arcane doors might these keys unlock? Perhaps it is safer never to know.
Sculpted from reclaimed industrial piping, this towel holder brooks no dissent. None. You will permit it to hold your bath linens and you will like it.
New from PostRustic, this cookware set comes with its only display rack to ensure your guests know you're cooking in style.
You may not be much of a collector, but PostRustic believes you should be able to fake that particular funk with a display that turns regular junk into a work of art.

Look below the surface of things, and there, you will discover their essence. This body? It’s molded from infinite oneness. The mind? It’s birthed from higher consciousness. That shelf? It’s shaped from rusted car parts and old diapers. The Affirmation. Set your bar stuff on the surface of essential trash.

This octagonal wooden hunk truly gives your home an old fashioned feel. In fact, we programmed our robots to calculate, to within .0001 percent, the most antiquated wall art they could produce. And they came up with this stump! More “caveman” than “arts and crafts,” but hey-our robots always go above and beyond.

When tasked with creating the Mega Wall Hanging, our robots arrived at this masterful employment of both three straight lines and one curved line, evoking all the complex emotions wrought by the greatest church windows, surf boards and ironing boards of our time. Simple. Yet indescribably profound.

When you can’t see the sky, you start to miss everything in it: the sun, moon, stars and birds, of course. Longing for the gentle doves that used to alight outside her window, Princess Cordelia sketched these doves to be crafted from bars of gold. The modern version has been cost-reduced and is made of Goldora instead.

Princess Cordelia’s pirate boyfriends were all quite fond of their parrots. Every time she acquired a new boyfriend, he commissioned a plate in his parrot’s honor. After her final romance withered, the Princess was stuck with a pile of plates, so she put them in a golden tree and hung it on the galley wall.
Princess Cordelia had mixed feelings about sea stars, but she did admire their stick-to-itiveness. These royal towel holders have unparalleled grip, and make a stellar addition to any head or loo.

Stellar as an accompaniment to the Sea Star Bath Towel Holder or as a standalone accent for your guest bath, the Sea Star Hand Towel Ring was designed by Princess Cordelia to replicate a sea star’s powerful grip. It can withstand any amount of tugging, even by untamed pirates.
This wall-mounted vertical bottle rack is so sleek, so stylish, you risk leaving your hand-selected vintages in place lest you disturb the visual order of their arrangement.
Unlock by reaching level 8 of the Culinary career while in the Mixologist branch.
Unlocked at level 8 of the Culinary career while in the Mixologist branch.
This isn't just any cork board. It's a well-considered art installment. With flyers and sticky notes and things.
You won first prize and all you got was this oversized ribbon to hang on your wall.
A durable and fully functional satellite dish ready to capture radio and television signals from any sim in the world, and maybe even further.
Unlock by reaching level 6 of the Criminal career while in the Oracle branch or reach level 8 of the Secret Agent career while in the Diamond Agent branch.
Unlocked at level 6 of the Criminal career while in the Oracle branch or level 8 of the Secret Agent career while in the Diamond Agent branch.
They say that opposites attract, but this wall-mounted knife rack is right up your alley. It frees up valuable counter real estate while our Positronic technology keeps your blades sharp.
No party is complete without balloons! The colorful banner is just icing on the cake. You didn't forget the cake, did you?
Unlock by completing a Birthday Party at Silver level or higher.
Unlocked by completing a birthday party at Silver level or higher.
A rugged metal frame encases this wartime tactical map. Hang it in your house to track your kids, pets, or even those pesky sims you are trying to avoid.
Unlock by reaching level 6 of the Secret Agent career.
Unlocked at level 6 of the Secret Agent career.
Book lovers everywhere will adore this literary tome surrounded by an ornate wood frame. The perfect gift for the librarian in your life.
Unlock by reaching level 5 of the Writer career.
Unlocked at level 5 of the Writer career.
Simple but hardly unassuming, this rack will hold your towels but never coddle them.
The severe beauty of this hypogeometric towel rack is a must for those still in the sway of modern architecture's harsh corners and unwavering lines.
Ducts and vents never get any respect. They deliver both hot and cool air as needed and with nary a thank-you. You owe your duct this stylish yet practical metal vent.
Wall Vent of No Particular Distinction
One's home is one's castle, and no castle is complete without a coat of arms hanging on the wall.
Coat of Arms With Shield and Swords

Protect endangered gases with festive rubber-alternative, helium-free Anti-Balloon Balloons. Better than regular balloons, these beauties stay up all night long-inspiring you and your guests to stay up late too!

Remember that funny old gag where you cover someone’s yard with toilet paper? These streamers are so much better! Not only does each alluring strip hang from a decorative ball, you get black AND white, both together, in one cool pack!
Be prepared for slips, spills, and judging neighbors, with a roll of towels at the ready!
Save counter space and show off your sharp things, too. This wall-mounted magnetic cutlery rack is the perfect practical display item.
Unlock by reaching level 6 of the Culinary career while in the Chef branch.
Unlocked at level 6 of the Culinary career while in the Chef branch.

Unlocked at Level 10 of the Gardening Skill
A basic packet of growfruit seeds.

Every athlete gets trophies -- that bowling league trophy you got when you were 8 or that second place hopscotch medal. Maybe try to earn something a little more grown up, ok?
Unlock by reaching level 2 of the Athlete career.
Unlocked at level 2 of the Athlete career.

A shelf that can be almost anything is perfect for children that love to change their room often and have large imaginations. Unicorns, Dinosaurs, Clouds, or Cars; It's up to them to decide what's best.

Think of the trillions and trillions of atoms that made up the cells that made up the animals and plants that evolved on our ever-spinning world into newer and greater realizations of themselves over billions and billions of years. And all of it has led to you buying this shelf. The Immaculate.

Sporting a distinctive multifold design for superior weight distribution, the Jokoh range of storage surfaces come in a large range of colors that promise to fit the most esoteric of interior spaces without breaking the bank.
Extraterrestrials chasing you through the house? Flatten their wheels with this discreet kneecapper! Keep a glass of our proprietary Alienz-Be-Gone in the compartment for extra punch!
Use this sturdy wall shelf with scroll detailing to house all your most precious tchotchkes.
An unfinished plank makes for a no-frills landing spot for your baubles.
A deep wall shelf perfect for displaying your little one's belongings--and keeping them off the floor.

For extra durability, our antique Mega Shelf is made with Oke, our proprietary oak substitute. It’s twice as strong as oak, and only five times as heavy. Carefully install a Mega Shelf in your home today. Goes great with Mega Globe and Mega Couple Of Books!

Shelves are the most underrated item in any house or submarine. We use them to hold up our most prized possessions! Princess Cordelia, living on her submarine, knew this all too well. She and her furniture artisans crafted this shelf and applied a tacky adhesive that kept items in place during sudden changes in depth.
A simple storage shelf with a twist: the end is capped with a built-in semicircular bookend to keep your tchotchkes from accidentally sliding off.
A beguiling mixture of classic and contemporary style, this clawfoot tub reproduces Princess Cordelia's lost luxury while the shower provides on-the-go convenience.
Under the Sea Clawfoot Tub with Shower

This combination shower and bathtub features two ways to please. Bask in the tub’s copious depths, or rise and find yourself captive to the shower’s powerful flow. Just beware: linger too long under its steamy force, and the results may shock you.

For those who wish to combine the soothing relaxation of taking a long, hot bath with the fun of standing, we have created The Peregrine. Feel its powerful spray! You can almost imagine yourself standing on the surface of a faraway alien world, naked in its hot rain.
Showerhead comes preloaded with a variety of pressure settings, including: Noir Night, Electric Sheep, Acid Rain, and more!
With a little imagination, you can pretend that this simple shower stall for your basic daily hygiene needs is actually a crystalline box in which you're temporarily trapped.
PostRustic brings its raw metal look to your shower. Available in an assortment of rustic tile colors, this is sure to add charm to your bath.
A shower stall with all the attachments you could ever need to get every inch of you squeaky clean.
A body in motion tends to stay in motion. This sign shows folks where to get their motion on.
A sign that conveys an air of authority without attracting too much attention. Suitable for office parks, doctor's offices, and corporate campuses.
A no-frills sign for a no-frills neighborhood joint.
A retro outdoor sign marks the spot for a classic diner experience.
Every day is taco day at the Cactus Cantina, proclaims this outdoor wall sign.
An oversized artist's signature, illuminated and ready to hang on your wall.
Add a little pizazz to your new joint with this neon light sign. It’ll definitely turn heads.
Get Your Jazz On Wall Sign
Every tiki hut needs a colorful neon parrot outside to proclaim that Polly wants to party!
Turn on this neon wall sign and break out the pupu platters, it's island paradise time. Watch out for spontaneous conga lines!
Circles represent wholeness, unity, completion. The cycles of life and of the passage of time. The infinite nature of the universe, without beginning and without end. Geometry is cool.
The hepcats will be hoppin' wherever this vintage-style wall sign is displayed.
Transform your rec room into a beachside bar with this colorful neon palm tree sign. Tropical shirts strongly encouraged.
The Divine by Reclamation Homeware: a sink for those who know that cleanliness is next to godliness.

Set new standards with the Pure Simplicity Sink. Effortlessly elegant to look at, Pure Simplicity’s true secrets emerge when you give the graceful handle a pull. Offering just the right balance of volume and flow, this remarkable faucet will keep even the vilest visitors coming back for more.
Sacred geometry suggests the oval is the most harmonious of shapes; bring your bathroom into cosmic alignment with this simple but effective counter sink.
Forget the cliches. With this stylish modern sink, your kitchen now has everything.
You may almost enjoy washing dishes in this oversized sink with extended drain.

Princess Cordelia had a dream that if she built a beautiful, state of the art sink like this one, perhaps her stinky pirate boyfriend would use it. Then she tried installing emergency cologne stations throughout her submarine’s hallways. Then she dumped him.
Can a kitchen sink be warm and welcoming? This model combines homey charm and high performance in one bold package.
Unlock by reaching level 4 of the Culinary career.
Unlocked at level 4 of the Culinary career.
An aggressively modern counter sink heavy with plumbing authority.

Other sinks may facilitate a splash of water on your tired, morning face. The Patrician is NOT other sinks. Experience a profound awakening, at all hours of the day, even when the taps are not running. Majestic marble-like surface forged from crushed milk cartons and melted gray crayons.

Rarely do we feel as inspired as when we are creating a conduit for the Earth’s eternal lifegiver, water. Every aspect of this work of art is designed to flow as fluidly as water flows through our very bodies. You will never see a finer sink. Smells slightly of wet garbage.
Installed with anti-coagulant spray and fresh handtowels. For those times when evidence needs scrubbing.
Warm wooden tones, antiqued metal fixtures and eggshell cracks in the porcelain basin evoke a simpler but still pricey time.
Stay clean with PostRustic's rough-hewn wood and raw metal pedestal sink. Perfect for smaller bathrooms.
Sprightly cabriole legs place your elegant basin sink at precisely the right height for maximal hygienic effectiveness.
There is nothing dainty about this striking pedestal sink, which is well-suited for modern and slightly intimidating bathrooms.

As we dream, we give our light to the universe. It reflects endlessly from star to star like the ripples on a pond when kissed by the falling autumn leaves. Even the tiniest ember of inspiration can ignite the world. Here’s a barstool.
Make way, space junk! This futuristic creation has all the charm of past satellites without any political baggage.

The serene allure of the Countryside Caress barstool provides a comfort so complete, we had to add a back to it! Seriously, people kept just sliding off with a contented sigh and smacking onto the floor.

We’ve reinvented the barstool to deliver comfort so complete, you’ll never want to stand or walk again! With shapely rounded legs and a plush, voluptuous cushion, the Velvet Embrace snugs your most tender curves for evenings of unparalleled pleasure.
Available in a variety of finishes, this barstool provides comfortable and stylish casual seating in your kitchen or dining area.

Inspired by the subaquatic world around them, Princess Cordelia's Furniture Artisans have brought you the Cephalopod Bar Stool. Because eight legs would be superfluous, they've included four beautiful tentacles -- legs, to hold you up while you enjoy a beverage or snack.

Inspired by the subaquatic world around them, Princess Cordelia's Furniture Artisans have brought you the Cephalopod Bar Stool. Because eight legs would be superfluous, they've included four beautiful tentacles -- legs, to hold you up while you enjoy a beverage or snack. Back support is included!
Cephalopod Bar Stool with Back Support
Sidle up to the bar on this sturdy metal stool dripping with industrial chic.
A barstool crafted with sweat, tears, and a woodworking table.
Enjoy a glorious day in the park without ever leaving your porch. This wood-and-iron slatted bench offers all the discomfort of a true park bench, without the noise and mess.
This is not your grandfather’s bench. Rather, it’s your uncle’s. Two solid planks offer all the support that most people need, with no extra fuss.
No matter where you go, no matter how far you run… the I Ran So Far Away chair is ready to caress your cares away. So sit, don't run, and just relax.
I Ran So Far Away Chair

This chair was granted for the New Lunar Year of the Pig, starting in February 2019.\n\nSit around the Shadow of the Moon Table, and gaze with amazement at the delicious feast set before you, with steam rising like a finger pointing away to the moon. Don't concentrate on the finger or you will miss all that heavenly glory.

Working isn't always glamorous, except when having to work sitting in this chair!\n\nBe your most fabulously productive self with this elegantly crafted chair, The Professional is here to take you through your day to day tasks, even your downtime.
Calm, cool, and collected, this metal dining chair softens its industrial profile with an extra-soft cushion to cradle your fleshy underside.

We are all of us united by our primal need to consume. We are driven by the desire to interact with our fellows. Mealtimes present us with the unique opportunity to do both. Satisfy your primal instincts with such class and elegance you’ll forget you’re sitting on trash. The Commissioner dining chair, by Reclamation Homeware.

Some pieces of furniture can't simply be aesthetically pleasing. They seem imbued with some special quality. In this case, this desk chair may not actually make you more intelligent, but it'll make you look it.
No matter how simple your meal, your time spent sitting around the dinner table will be out of this world with this sleek seat.

At what point do chairs go beyond relaxing the body and begin to relax the mind? At Countryside Caress, we call that point the Caress Chair. For the full experience, sit all the way back and stuff yourself with your favorite comfort food.

The Embrace is similar to our Caress Chair, only with little arms that reach out and hug you! What should be a very simple chair will surprise you with its intricate carvings. But don’t be alarmed - it’s just a little secret between you and the chair.
Like the sinister park bench from a gloom-ridden forest, only indoors and at your dining room table.
A leather-lined overstuffed office chair with full back and armrests that cradles your body while maintaining an appropriately imposing silhouette.
Molded plastic was never yet so comfortable nor so colorful.
This stern office chair eschews the mere fripperies of ergonomic comfort. You will suffer and you will like it.
Daringly modern dining room furnishing, or replica dunking chair? You decide.
You will never meet a more handsome chair than this. And the chair knows it. Don't be surprised if you find this chair admiring its scrollwork in the mirror. Vanity, thy name is chair.

The Kindermade Chair is the perfect complement to our Knowledge Console desk, but it’s also a superb stand-alone piece. It really ties a room together! Of course kids don’t care about that kind of thing, but you can tell the other parents.

Hewn from half-rotted firewood and slapped together with oversized nails, this rustic dining chair was inspired by the tale of a little girl in a cottage full of bears. But you can enjoy it in total safety!

Did you know that antique furniture can be hundreds of years old? Who’s got time to wait around for that?! For the freshest antiques on the market, you have to visit the MegaMission Furniture Warehouse. Buy one of our gorgeous antique dining chairs today, and we’ll guarantee it was an oak tree two days ago!

In order to seat her remaining courtiers in the tight quarters of her submersible, Princess Cordelia crafted a dining set without any arms. Look closely, however, and you’ll notice the attention she paid to the legs, exquisitely carved to mimic tentacles. Captivating!

Princess Cordelia’s 2nd pirate boyfriend, Captain Chaz MacFreeling, had perpetually tired arms. Due to his vanity, he was always taking out his gold mirror, holding it up to his face and blowing kisses. He commissioned Princess Cordelia to make him this armed dining chair so he could rest during meals. When she dumped him, she kept the chair.

Princess Cordelia’s 3rd pirate boyfriend, Captain Rodrigo De Pablo, was very accident-prone. Once, both of his feet were severely burned as he stepped over a steam vent. After that, he sat a lot and thus wanted very comfortable seating. Being Cordelia’s favorite boyfriend, he was gifted this padded chair from her.
Captain Rodrigo de Pablo Dining Chair
Astronauts require both comfort and security in their seating. This space-age chair provides both.
Unlock by reaching level 7 of the Astronaut career.
Unlocked at level 7 of the Astronaut career.
The ultimate chair from which to decipher malevolent machinations, the Swiveler is a must-have throne for any covert operative.
Unlock by reaching level 2 of the Secret Agent career.
Unlocked at level 2 of the Secret Agent career.
Why have three rungs when two will do fine? The epitome of minimalist practicality, this simple sitter gets the job done.
Sooner or Ladder Contemporary Dining Chair
For the minimalist who aspires to a life of comfort, this modern dining chair adds just a smidge of padding where it’s appreciated most.
The perfect outdoor seating for casual elegance in gorgeous teak.
This teak folding chair may not be the most comfortable outdoor seating option but it's certainly one of the most handsome.
Covered in the same luxurious, yet truly stain-repellant fabric as our White All Night Dining Tables, these grand, high-backed chairs are perfect for dining, sipping, chatting, and resting.
A higher quality chair made for those particularly hard to please home decorators. No, you don't have to compromise with your style choices simply because you have a toddler in your house.

MegaMission Furniture Warehouse knows you've been searching for that toddler high chair to match your perfectly antiqued furniture set. These chairs are made of easily cleaned wood and a strip of colored leather, so that no matter how messy your toddler eats it will come off.
A high chair made for any home. This essential piece of toddler furniture has been made in a number of colors to match whatever collection of Kindermade items that you may already have.
Desk chairs are yesterday's news... and they're for peons! Today's executive demands a more impressive seat. Sit in an Executron Executive Desk Throne and command your business empire!
Unlock by reaching level 7 of the Business career while in the Management branch.
Unlocked at level 7 of the Business career while in the Management branch.

Executives have important guests... but they're not as important as you are! That's why the Executive Guest Chair is specifically calibrated to be 20% less comfortable than the Executron Executive Desk Throne. Because you should always be more comfortable than your guests!
Unlock by reaching level 9 of the Business career while in the Management branch.
Unlocked at level 9 of the Business career while in the Management branch.
The friendliest of bear chairs is here to be your child's best friend.\nWe won't tell if you want one too.
Lil' Jony often let her pigs sit in a chair exactly like this one. Now, like Lil' Jony, you too can sit where Jony's pig sat.

Ease into this chair and be transported to paradise! Smell the salty sea breeze, hear the shuffle of banana leaves overhead, and the sun's warmth on your skin. It's not a hallucination! Though, it kind of sounds like a hallucination...

We are all united. We work, we play, we dance, and we rest. When you sit down to rest you are participating in part of the grand experiment we call life. Savor these moments in Reclamation Homeware’s Solidarity living chair, made from our proprietary blend of premium, pressed garbage.
Say farewell to the angular captain chairs of years gone by! Instead, recline in the comfort of your very own Laxseat. (Armrest console not included.)

Don’t think that we haven’t tried building chairs out of actual clouds. Such is our commitment to fine comfort that we will never give up on that dream! Until then, sink deep into the embrace of a chair that just feels like you’re sitting on a cloud.

Sometimes you just want to let go. You want to relax all of your muscles and allow something soft to cradle your body, yet provide you with support in all the right places. Heave a satisfied sigh and give yourself to the Pretty Sitter.
Every living room needs a chair like this--simple, straightforward construction for television watching and after-work relaxing.
This comfortable chair combines the luxury of a deep leather seat with a rugged frame built from old crates. PostRustic keeps you guessing.
Grab that toy remote control and get comfy! This kid-size armchair is cozy as a hug for your little man-in-training.

Aren’t you sick of having to treat antiques like they’re made of glass? What’s the value in furniture if it’s irreplaceable? Get rid of all that stress and invest in an antique Mega Living Chair from MegaMission Furniture Warehouse. All our antiques are mass produced, so you can do whatever you want to them!
Classic Mission-style craftsmanship almost meets comfort in this partially padded living room chair.
Whether you’re being tossed around in a submersible or simply lounging on land, the deep embrace of this velvet chaise is like no other. Sit back, snuggle in, and hope you never have to stand again.

Princess Cordelia’s 2nd pirate boyfriend, Captain Chaz MacFreeling, had perpetually tired arms. Due to his vanity, he was always taking out his gold mirror, holding it up to his face and blowing kisses. He commissioned Princess Cordelia to make him this armed living chair so he could rest during social visits. When she dumped him, she kept the chair.
Just in case someone mistakes you for a good guy, the nefarious glowing eye on this imposing chair will ensure they stand corrected.
Unlock by reaching level 8 of the Secret Agent career while in the Villain branch.
Unlocked at level 8 of the Secret Agent career while in the Villain branch.
Sink into profound thought in the leather depths of this armchair. Tall arms and shielded sides block out any distraction, while sending the message to all who come near that genius is in the making.
Unlock by reaching level 4 of the Writer career.
Unlocked at level 4 of the Writer career.
Firm. Stable. Singular. Unless you want more than one.
Plastic, portable, and perfect for the poolside or patio.
Lazy days await with this reupholstered mahogany loveseat. Note the hand-carved wood detailing, the breathable fabric, and... the pillows. Those perfectly puffable pillows.
It’s so utilitarian, you’d almost rather sit in each other’s laps to avoid contact with it.

Comfort affords a clarity of thought that allows us to weave the people, places, and moments of our memories into a grand tapestry that carpets our path into the future. Visualize your past, present, and future on The Epiphany from Reclamation Homeware. Built for comfort. Built from trash.
Talking lizard? Chess-playing hamster? Whomever you may host, this specially-designed loveseat will comfortably seat you and your tiny friend alike!

Looking to cozy up to that special someone? The Cozofa is on your side. It’s perfectly designed to bring two people closer together, because of its unparalleled comfort, and because three people will not fit on it.
We are only as strong as the truth, so this loveseat bares all: raw, crate-wood walls, exposed rivets and metal bracing-all supporting a supple interior of unsubdued comfort.
Enjoy the fresh air with someone you love! This beautiful wrought-iron bench is just the right size for an open-air rendezvous in the intimacy of your patio or garden.
Love is in the Air Seat

We had to convince our robots to build a 2-person sofa, as they decided that 3-person sofas were more efficient. They changed their minds once we explained the value of cuddling with someone special and then triggered the override switch on their decision cortex. You can’t teach a robot to love, but you can teach it to build a loveseat!

Love can be a fickle thing, sweeping in and out as if with the tides, especially when you are royalty. Princess Cordelia designed the Ocean’s Current Loveseat in tender acknowledgment of this truth. Swirling embellishments embrace its occupants: the Princess and her current love.

Cuttlefish are interesting little creatures. They have a flow-y, oddly-shaped body with tentacles that hang down. Seeing cuttlefish for the first time, Princess Cordelia knew she had to make a love seat based on their unique form! (She also liked the idea of cuddling on a cuttlefish love seat.)
Sleek clean lines square off with comfy cushioned seating in this contemporary loveseat. So neutral, you almost forget it’s there!
Call it a loveseat for the out of doors. This comely bench comfortably accommodates two people for an intimate picnic date.

Rest your feet on our Intimate Ottoman and everything else will follow! Irresistibly downy, with fabric as soft as a thousand butterflies' wings, this comfy, spacious and remarkably sturdy ottoman is prepared to support all of you, and one or two friends, as well.

Princess Cordelia’s third pirate boyfriend, Captain Rodrigo De Pablo suffered several injuries aboard the submarine. One leg got stuck in a pressurized air hatch, crippling him severely. Princess Cordelia designed this Ottoman for him to rest his leg and peg leg while enjoying a warm fire together. The peg unfortunately caught fire. At least he never suffered a broken heart.

We were under quite a lot of pressure by the Lil' Jony Preservation Society to include a matching sofa to The Lil' Jony living chair. But Lil' Jony never sat on a sofa! And her pigs sure as hellfire didn't like sofas! How can they call themselves the LJPS when they spread fallacies such as this! It's an outrage!! But fine, the matching Lil' Jony Sofa... hope you're happy LJPS, we hope you’re happy…

The body may rest where it pleases, but what of the mind and the spirit? Fret not. When we at Reclamation Homeware designed The Illumination, our goal was nothing short of Whole Restoration. It will soothe your very soul so thoroughly you won’t even detect the smell of the tightly pressed, rotten cardboard from which it is constructed.
Talking lizards? Chess-playing hamsters? Whomever you may host, this specially-designed sofa will comfortably seat you and your tiny friends alike!

Sinking into the Comfultimate sofa, you’ll swear you’re watching an Autumn sunset over flowing hills of lavender while you lie on a fluffy cloud made of hugs. Seriously. Every single time you sit down.
The Hipster Hugger is covered with faux-leather upholstery that’s vegan and stuffed with foam that has nothing to do with animals or nature.
Unlock by reaching level 5 of the Tech Guru career.
Unlocked at level 5 of the Tech Guru career.

Celebrate the unadorned truth with this artisan sofa from the Unabashed Collection. Untreated crate-wood walls, exposed rivets and metal bracing all support a supple leather interior, for stable, unsubdued comfort that simply doesn’t lie.

Who needs an antique that’s saddled with a bunch of history? Wouldn’t you rather be the first person ever to sit on your antique sofa? For fresh antiques without all the baggage, it has to be MegaMission Furniture Warehouse. Nothing beats that new antique smell!

Princess Cordelia’s 3rd pirate boyfriend, Captain Rodrigo De Pablo, suffered several injuries aboard her submarine. One leg got stuck in a pressurized air hatch, crippling him severely. Princess Cordelia designed this sofa with a matching ottoman for him to rest on. The ottoman, with its own tragic story, is sold separately.

Cuttlefish are interesting little creatures. They have a flow-y, oddly-shaped body with tentacles that hang down. Seeing cuttlefish for the first time, Princess Cordelia knew she had to make a sofa based on their unique form! (She also liked the idea of cuddling on a cuttlefish sofa.)
Sleek clean lines square off with comfy cushioned seating in this contemporary sofa. So neutral, you almost forget it’s there!
The Lin-Z is the latest in smart home technology! Use it to control your lights, play music, play trivia, and more! The Lin-Z learns as your interact with it. Just make sure it learns right...
Add flavor to any gathering with a floor-standing speaker set that looks as good as it sounds. Seriously-turn off the sound. See? The babes are still flocking.
Oldies are still goodies with this retro-style jukebox from back in the day. Faux-wood exterior and warbled sound quality keep it real, whether you’re grooving to R&B or doo-wopping to your faves.

Pump up the volume on this puppy, and you know the landlord’s on his way. So we built in a special audio-therapy track that only landlords can hear. Rock like a banshee with your friends, while your landlord sleeps away.
Retro style meets precision audio in this old-school style stereo. From the oversized dials to the wood grain detailing, you’ll be blasting from the past no matter what you play.
Unlock by reaching level 4 of the Entertainer career.
Unlocked at level 4 of the Entertainer career.
Sure, modern technology enables us to carry our entire music collections around in our pockets. But those tiny devices aren't as charming as your grammy's music player.
Not really portable with thin, tinny sound, this starter stereo is better than nothing, most of the time.
The ultimate space-saving stereo for the apartment-dwelling audiophile. Decent sound, with CD and radio options, and a look that never goes out of style.
This wall-mounted stereo is for use at community venues. Great for the Winter Holidays!
This wall-mounted stereo is for use at community venues. It haunts Sims with Spooky music. Great for Halloween decorations, haunted houses or those looking for something creepy.
This wall-mounted stereo is for use at community venues. It plays fun kids songs!
This wall-mounted stereo is for use at community venues. It plays soothing lullabies.
This rugged wireless speaker brings stereo-quality audio to the outdoors. You'll enjoy all of the standard stereo functionality - now mounted to your wall!
This wall-mounted stereo is intended for use at community venues. It shuffles through Alternative music and won't listen when "the Man" tells it to stop.
This wall-mounted stereo is intended for use at community venues. It plays smooth Blues music non-stop for all the hepcats out there.
This wall-mounted stereo is intended for use at community venues. Rumors say that its been playing Classical music for nearly 300 years without pause!
This wall-mounted stereo is intended for use at community venues. It blasts Electronica music and won't stop when you drop!
This wall-mounted stereo is intended for use at community venues. It loops Pop music 24/7/365!
This wall-mounted stereo is intended for use at community venues. It turns back the clock with Retro music all day, and all of the night!
This wall-mounted stereo is intended for use at community venues. It serenades Sims with Romance music late into the night, and it's still going the next morning.

A hypermodern kitchen range hood that skates on the cutting edge of technology without quite falling off. The hood's sleek design is reminiscent of stealth bombers and military drones, and it hums ominously just like its inspirations.
Breathe in the fresh country air without a hint of smoke or odors. This charming stove hood whisks the air clean, so you can bask in sweeter aromas than whatever you just tried to cook.
Breath of Fresh Air Stove Hood
Elevate the beauty of your country kitchen with this extra-tall stove hood. Pretty detailing around the base adds an air of fancy. Powerful performance is destined to sweep you off your feet.
Who knew a kitchen ventilation hood could be quite so quaint and charming? Easy curves and just a touch of trim make all the difference.
This charming metallic stove hood is traditional and efficient.
A taller version of our original, this charming metallic stove hood is traditional and efficient.

Princess Cordelia wanted to take her beloved chef, Matilda, aboard her submarine, but she was unwilling to leave her family behind. Luckily one of Cordelia’s pirate boyfriends had an amazing cook aboard his galleon. While purely for decoration, this copper hood helped the new cook feel at home.
Copperrrr and Otherrr Metal Stove Hood - Ceiling
Breathe easy as you cook up a storm. Designed for any island-based cooking range, this hood doubled as a ventilation system to purge the entire submersible of pirate smells.

This stove hood was invented by Princess Cordelia to keep her submersible from filling with smoke. Of course, it required a pretty long vent when she was leagues under the sea, but the modern version comes with everything you need.
Compact, understated and silent as a whisper, this covert stove hood takes care of your dirtiest business without breathing a word to anyone.
Unlock by reaching level 10 of the Culinary career while in the Chef branch.
Unlocked at level 10 of the Culinary career while in the Chef branch.
Want to be a great chef? Start by looking like one. This high-performance stainless steel range hood makes quick work of smoke, grease, odors and any doubts guests might have.
Unlock by reaching level 10 of the Culinary career while in the Chef branch.
Unlocked at level 10 of the Culinary career while in the Chef branch.
This impressive stove hood is sure to keep your kitchen smoke and odor-free like a prominent smokestack--but far more stylish.
Unlock by reaching level 10 of the Culinary career while in the Chef branch.
Unlocked at level 10 of the Culinary career while in the Chef branch.
In honor of the exquisite museum's centennial anniversary, KitchenMeister presents a decorative vent that'll have guests sighing in structuralist bliss.

This island range hood may look rustic, but its sucking power is so forceful, you may want to wait until after seasoning to turn it on full blast. Oh, and secure any teacup poodles and small children. That could suck.
Smoke and grease beware! This professional-grade stainless steel range hood takes no prisoners. And it looks great in your kitchen.

Smiling through tears at the birth of a child. A loved one’s final, poignant breath. Smoke ascending from your kitchen grease fire, into the arms of the universe. There are some moments we just know our lives will never be the same. The Noblesse stove hood, by Reclamation Homeware.

Cook in cozy country style with the Caress Stove Hood. This relaxed, wood-trimmed accessory adds a rustic touch to any kitchen. Fanciful as well as functional, it mounts directly on your wall, transforming the most modern appliance into a beloved and age-kissed creation.

Princess Cordelia wanted to take her beloved chef, Matilda, aboard her submarine, but she was unwilling to leave her family behind. Luckily one of Cordelia’s pirate boyfriends had an amazing cook aboard his galleon. While purely for decoration, this copper hood helped the new cook feel at home.
Copperrrr and Otherrr Metal Stove Hall - Wall
With bold angular lines and European styling, this high-power stove hood sweeps your kitchen into the modern era, while sweeping out smoke and smells.

Every consideration was given to making our stove a revolutionary product. Getting the colors right. Making the curves sexy enough. And wait until you see the box it comes in. Introducing: The Schmapple Oven. It’s Ovens to the Power of You.

Everything old is new again with this cast-iron wood-burning cookstove. Wood provides a welcome touch of smoke; iron provides durability and allows for even heating. And then there's the thrill of working with live fire. Modern ranges just can't compete.

This oven is anything but “conventional!” Each built-in burner is slightly oversized with a BTU range between 6,000 to 16,000 to maximize your cooking potential. The interface features a new, clean and easy design, and our pro-clean surface actually repels spills and messes. (All joking aside, though, it is actually a conventional oven.)

With the streamlined design of this economy model oven, you can feel the simple joy of cooking again. Who needs fancy, complicated controls like a “timer” or “distinct temperature settings?” You turn a dial, the stove gets hot. That’s all you need! Ready for cooking to be fun again? Here comes the YumCooker!

Did you know that you can tell the quality of an oven by the size of its viewing window? This oven might not have the largest window on the market, but it is definitely not the smallest, either! For an oven with a respectably-sized viewing window, consider the Cooking-U Pro, by Glassworth’s.
This highly specialized appliance cooks up pancakes so fluffy, they float on thin air. Makes it easy to tell when they’re done.
Unlock by reaching level 10 of the Culinary career while in the Chef branch.
Unlocked at level 10 of the Culinary career while in the Chef branch.
An attractive ground light used in public places.
Storm drains help keep the street from flooding!
This bench is attractive and uncomfortable. What a combo!
This lamp lights even the darkest alley.
Guaranteed to shine bright all night.
Signs add variety to the world around them!
This wheelbarrow is both functional and decorative.
A bollard is a short vertical post.
This light is larger than normal lights. How strange!
This trim is both decorative and functional.
Wood crates are old fashioned, but style stylish!
Wood is sturdy and strong. It never goes out of style.
A light designed to line sidewalks.
Broken wood is often old and somewhat unstable.
Old wood is pretty, but brittle.
All the best tables are made of wood.
What do rabbits have to do with eggs? You'll have to ask this adorable fellow!
Unlock by completing the Decorative Eggs collection.
Unlocked by completing the Decorative Eggs collection.
The team at Kindermade simultaneously produced a giant stuffed dragon and a giant stuffed dinosaur. We often got them confused! Here’s one of them. The dinosaur? Looks like a dinosaur.
The team at Kindermade simultaneously produced a giant stuffed dragon and a giant stuffed dinosaur. We often got them confused! Here’s one of them. The dragon? Looks like a dragon.
The first horned animal you can’t wait to snuggle! (Its magic is in its horn!)

Children have the biggest imaginations because they rarely have any notion of what is actually possible. In that spirit, Kindermade brings you Blarffy, the impossibly huge teddy bear! Your child and Blarffy are sure to have a roaring good time.
For the space-wise astronaut, this high-power weapon is essential for defense against aliens, muggers and space-borne guard dogs.
A unique tool of trade for Style-Influencers that captures gathered Impressions from a Sim in that career, tracking the evolution of their aesthetic tastes to unlock a variety of custom looks.
Unlocked by joining the Style Influencer career
Unlocked at level 1 of the Style Influencer career

Do you know what’s possible with a little bit of fire and love? No, not roasted marshmallows! Okay...maybe fire-roasted marshmallows. But also this table! This artisan coffee table was hand-crafted using ancient fire-etching techniques, carving tools, and the unwavering affection of its maker.
Lightweight aluminum construction plus a wooden surface makes for a lightweight, portable patio table suitable for all your al fresco dining needs.

Life is infinite, ever cycling through darkness and renewal, ever turning round like a circle. So spins the Earth, so is designed The Ascension coffee table by Reclamation Homeware. Made from 100% reclaimed garbage, neatly pressed and painted into its compelling shape, this table too takes its place in the Great Circle.
This artist's rendering of a silicon life form will make a great new housemate. It won't play fetch, but it's a perfect table!

This elegant design is a reassuring statement on incongruity. The simple, straight lines tell you that the Caress is here to do its job, but its playful curves and hidden accents suggest a flirty bit of fun lying just beneath the surface.

Constructed of reclaimed, untreated crate-wood with industrial steel bracing, this hard-working coffee table is protected by shatterproof windshield glass to protect against stains and just about anything.
Iron and glass combine to form an arresting table to anchor your outdoor patio look.

Our coffee table is the epitome of mission-style design, featuring simple lines and a certain “arts and crafts” charm. But what else would you expect from MegaMission Furniture Warehouse? Our simple furniture-crafting algorithms and charming hydraulic robot arm assembly make us the mission masters!

Princess Cordelia tried scallops for the first time while aboard her submarine. Cooked in garlic, they were the most delicious thing she had ever eaten. She was thankful for the experience and in honor of the poor scallop that lost its life, she designed this table. So touching!
The ultimate blank slate, this contemporary coffee table features clean lines, a neutral palette, and an empty shelf that simply aches to be filled.

Teak isn't just a status symbol. It's well-suited for outdoor furniture, such as this patio table, due to both its natural beauty and resistance to the elements. It's also lighter than other materials, requires little maintenance and will not get hot in the sun.
Perfect for dinner party favors or if you wish to style your dining room as if it were a 5 star restaurant. Just be careful not to stain the cloth, it is really hard to wash it off.

Please note, the runner has been factory sealed into place, do not attempt to remove. Failure to comply will result in serious fines, because honestly, we’re tired of people trying to return the table claiming it’s damaged. Look, it’s attached, we’re telling you it’s attached, DO NOT ATTEMPT TO REMOVE THE BLING BLANGING RUNNER… if you do, I’m just going to send Bruno. I’m tired of trying to reason with all of you… it’s Bruno time.
Cabriole Leg Table with Runner and Garland, Holiday edition

Awaken all your senses by taking your coffee in the beautiful outdoors. This feather-light bistro table combines classic wooden slats with an aluminum frame, so you can freshen your outlook just by moving it about.
My Yard or Yours Bistro Table

Picnic “en plein air” day and night with this affordable backyard dining table. Combining a classic slatted surface with a lightweight aluminum frame, this table is so portable, you can even BYOT to a friend’s.
My Yard or Yours Patio Table

Nothing reflects human existence like a small table. Without these simple objects, civilizations would tumble and break apart. Carved from our proprietary blend of reclaimed garbage and topped with diamond-cut windshield glass, The Staccato separates our world from chaos.

Our dining tables say a lot about us: who we are, where we’ve been, how we perceive the world around us. Find your place in the world with this exceptional multipurpose surface from Reclamation Homeware. The Fermata: let it define you.
This stunning contemporary table provides ample room for your entourage. See-through glass ensures no hanky-panky, without the delightful risk of getting caught.
Quadrapedal table inspired by Morson Whale's famous radioplay monster. Experience all the terror in the comfort of your own home!
This design was inspired by the calcified remains of an unusually giant sea sponge found deep in Paclantic Ocean.

Nothing celebrates curves like a perfect circle. Our Perfect Curve dining table features a deliciously rounded top supported by long, elegant legs. Just sitting at one is like being in a passionate embrace. Put the Perfect Curve in your dining room and satisfy your hunger.

One can admire The Enduring for its quiet strength. With its steady legs and long, smooth surface it is ready not only to serve you, but up to three of your friends as well. Stoic, but reliable: The Enduring.

Feast your eyes on the bountiful beauty of our Cornucopia dining table. While the dark, glossy expanse seems somber at first glance, a peek below the surface divulges finely carved legs, colorful character and a proclivity for revelry.

As busy as family life gets, dinner brings everyone together, so it’s important to gather your energy around a quality table. With rich cherry tones and an unshakeable foundation, the Heart of the Home inspires confidence meal after loving meal.
Heart of the Home Dining Table

Hewn from half-rotted firewood and slapped together with oversized nails, this rustic dining table only wobbles a little. Inspired by the tale of a cottage full of bears, it’s yours to enjoy in safety!

Pairing a concrete base with a reclaimed 18th century pantry door, each table in this collection has its own unique story. Admire each nick, wonder at its secrets, and open the door to lively chats for every meal to come.

Pairing a concrete base with a reclaimed 18th century pantry door, each table in this collection has its own unique story. Admire each nick, wonder at its secrets, and open the door to lively chats for every meal to come.
Your family will love sitting down to a meal at this large dining table made from distressed slats reclaimed from a demolished toolshed.
With an easy-to-clean glass top, room for an umbrella, and an intricate wrought iron base that always stands its ground, this delightful table is no mirage!

Spend more time in your yard or garden with the Garden Gander Bistro Table. The perfect perch for a morning coffee, afternoon snack, or light meal, this classic iron and wood beauty is eager to greet you, rain or shine.

Equally at home on your patio, in your kitchen, or gracing your dining area, this incredibly versatile table is simply a dream come true. Just be sure you like where you put it. All that iron is challenging to lift.

You’ll never find an antique mission table more authentic than our Mega Table. It will lend a classic, arts and crafts feel to any home. With its sturdy construction, it is the picture of beauty through simplicity. Made entirely from our proprietary wood substitute, Wud!

The true value of an antique is in how many people you can tell that you own an antique. With the mega-sized version of our Mega Table, you can gather several people around the very antique you wish to show off! When they all demand to know where you got it, don’t forget to tell them: MegaMission Furniture Warehouse!

Impress your guests with the elegant craftsmanship of this hardwood table. With a sleek glossy surface, sturdy legs, and decorative corbels at each corner, this table was handcrafted by an old-world father and his only obedient son.

Fleeing the Great Sloth Invasion, Princess Cordelia and her pirate boyfriend escaped on her submarine. He brought his cook along to replace the one Cordelia left on land. Cordelia dumped the pirate before long, but happily kept his chef! In honor of the great dining she kept in her life, she designed and built a series of lovely tables.

Fleeing the Great Sloth Invasion, Princess Cordelia and her pirate boyfriend escaped on her submarine. He brought his cook along to replace the one Cordelia left on land. Cordelia dumped the pirate before long, but happily kept his chef! In honor of the great dining she kept in her life, she designed and built a series of lovely tables.

Fleeing the Great Sloth Invasion, Princess Cordelia and her pirate boyfriend escaped on her submarine. He brought his cook along to replace the one Cordelia left on land. Cordelia dumped the pirate before long, but happily kept his chef! In honor of the great dining she kept in her life, she designed and built a series of lovely tables.
Princess Cordelia had many pirate boyfriends, and her boyfriends always came with a crew. This elegant dining table fit the entire lot, until she banished them for want of manners.

This table was granted for the New Lunar Year of the Pig, starting in February 2019.\n\nCustom allows designating a seat of honor for this table that seats six, but you don't have to. The Shadow of the Moon Table can be communal, where all can have equidistant access to the delicious Vegetable Dumplings and Mud Carp in the middle.
Celebrate family unity with this modern glass-top table. Shaped in a perfect square, for exactly four diners, it discreetly deters unwanted guests from crashing your dinner gathering.
Inspired by early colonial furniture, this graceful table provides ample room for friends and relations without undue fuss.
With sleek continental styling and a tempered glass-top, this modern dining table is easy to dress up or down to suit the worthiness of your guests.
Enjoy the good times with relatives and more on this privacy-proof dinner table! Now guests will know exactly who's kicking them in the shin.

Show Mother Nature how much you care with a patio table built from sustainable teak hardwood, responsibly farmed and cultivated by well-paid, full-grown workers. Sanded with recyclable sandpaper and coated with eco-friendly sealant, it’s as green as you get without harmful dyes.
Behold the first truly stain-repellant, pure white dining ensemble. Anything your guests drop will bounce off the table and stick to you-know-who, so your tables stay sparkly clean meal after meal.
This affordable patio table pairs a natural-wood surface with a lightweight aluminum frame. If you’d like to move it, just leave the umbrella open and see where the wind takes you.
My Yard or Yours Umbrella Table
Create a private oasis in your own backyard! With a wipe-clean glass top and a wrought-iron base that stands its ground, paradise awaits wherever you place it.

Built from sustainable teak hardwood, responsibly farmed and cultivated by well-paid, full-grown workers, this eco-sealed patio table is a great choice for you and the planet. The included umbrella is made from 100% recycled materials, for guilt-free basking and bragging.
This little table is perfect to fit into the corner of any tight space. It has plenty of space for the stuff that has no where else to go.
Perfect for a small spaces, whether it is beside a sofa or as a nightstand. Assembly not required, comes already built in its perfectly angled glory.

Some furniture collections claim to be “conversation” pieces. How dare they! We are not discussing banal trivia like sports or the weather. We are talking about FURNITURE, the greatest artistic expression of man! It should be celebrated, shouted from the mountaintops! The Vociferate end table is a literal exclamation point in the furniture “conversation.”
Who needs dinosaur toys with your very own Tyrannosaurus-Desk! (Not anatomically accurate.)
Cutting-edge polymers protect your clothes from moths, government intelligence, and going out of season. "Fun" size.

You could place nearly anything on top of this dazzling end table, but why would you? Why not just admire its beauty as you run your fingertips back and forth across its strikingly smooth surface? Wow... That is one smooth table.
The ultimate in improvisational country style, our Crateable end table is so masterfully relaxed, it can hardly stand up. Really. You might want to prop it with something.
This glass-topped end table features hand-carved wood for texture set in rough metal framing. This table is serious.

Our furniture-crafting robots did such a wonderful job creating countless mission-style masterpieces that we decided to give them two weeks of vacation, which they promptly spent creating these delightful end tables. You know it’s a quality table if a robot made it in its spare time!
Return to quality with this beautiful solid wood end table, handcrafted by third-generation Amish artisans. The slatted base makes a wonderful hideout for mischievous children and timid pets.

As the relationship between Princess Cordelia and Captain Rodrigo De Pablo got serious, the princess tried to incorporate his things into her submarine-home’s décor. Most of his belongings were destroyed in The Battle of Cape Blunderbuss, so she took his only remaining possession, a pirate chest, and refurbished it into this table. That’s love.
Clean, simple, devoid of prior influence, this pristine end table is yours to fill as you like.
An end table made from wood with bare hands. Well, hands and a woodworking table.
Whether your favorite mental sport is poker, Old Maid, or chess, get your game on anytime with this table at the ready.

The Alternate Augmented Reality table (Alt AR Table) strives to bring augmented reality to your basic reality. You may want the actual AR, but that’s decades away - so until then, try our alternate AR. Alternate AR, it’s like the real thing.
Declare your modern sensibility from the moment guests enter your home. Bold, beautiful, impossible to miss, nothing screams for attention like the Bold Statements Console Table.

With a supple wooden surface and delicate painted legs, nothing welcomes you home quite like this hall table. Adorn it with cherished trinkets, or keep it astonishingly bare-its enduring beauty will never disappoint.

With intriguing nicks in its weathered surface, this antique buffet murmurs of dinners past. How many meals-and secrets-has it witnessed? How many treasures locked in its two discreet drawers? Feed your fancy daily with the Timeless Traditions buffet.
This glass-topped console is the perfect accent to any hallway or room. So riveting that putting objects on this surface is not recommended, in fact - it won't allow it.
Celebrate the quality and beauty of handcrafted hardwood furniture. Ideal for your entryway or any narrow hall, this artisanal table is an emblem of the most discerning taste.
With all the beauty and craftsmanship of traditional Mission style furniture, this attractive table features two closing drawers to help conceal the detritus of everyday modern life.

While quarters on the submersible were always rather cramped, Princess Cordelia remembered with fondness all the marvelously useless furniture that adorned the castle halls. This elegant console table is a wistful tribute to the flotsam of years past.
Even minimalists collect clutter. Fill it with what you will, then sweep it clean and start again.

The most noble of all the simple machines is obviously the humble surface. Simply by the nature of being flat it gives us so much, has allowed us to evolve from brutal cave clans into the magnificent society we enjoy today. Impossible to improve upon (except for The Ultimate). From Reclamation Homeware.

The Ultimate is another celebration of the beauty and utility of the flat surface brought to you by Reclamation Homeware. It is superior over The Penultimate nightstand in that it has an additional drawer.

A perfect companion to the Weathered Wonder Dresser, this two-drawer nightstand boasts the signature, hand-distressed accents of our most popular collection. But don’t let its stoic exterior fool you. Its discreet, yet cavernous, drawers have a secret faux-floor, designed to conceal the most intimate bedside essentials.

Salvaged from the wreckage of the Titanic’s lesser-known sister ship, Ginormous, hundreds of sea-hardened trunks were transformed into our Embark nightstands collection, with glass protection added against less-historic dents.

The perfect spot for a bedtime reading lamp, this darling nightstand also adds storage for flashlights and other secret treasures. Two sliding drawers open and close softly, so children won’t awaken their parents when setting traps for the tooth fairy.

Keeping secrets isn’t easy at sea, but Princess Cordelia loved a challenge! She fashioned this innocent-looking nightstand to conceal her naughtiest secrets, as well as several beautiful unmentionable trifles. (Despite that quality they were actually mentioned by her pirate boyfriends quite often.)
Nightstands have two functions: hold up a lamp, and store stuff. This does both.
Make every meal feel like a picnic in the park with this classic wooden table! Exposed bolts and pre-weathered wood provide character and occasional splinters.
Get all the fun of a picnic table in a design that won’t walk away. Graffiti-ready surfaces are yours to decorate, unless some teenagers get to it first.
Brew all your favorite teas at the touch of a button. Includes handy features like a programmable timer, cup and pot settings, lemon twist, and a spoonful of sugar option.
A small perennial shrub, grown in decorative pots, that produces a thick foliage to be pruned into intricate designs and shapes.

Why suffer the cold, impersonal touch of plastic when you could have wood under your rump? This good old fashioned toilet preserves the comfort and flushing power of yesteryears, before environmentalists nosed into it.

Elegant yet egalitarian, The Ambassador is there to support us all in our most vulnerable moments. It is in these moments that we find who we truly are, and return to the world stronger and wiser for our experiences. Consummate support, faultless comfort, zero judgment. The Ambassador.
Designed with a wide array of sophisticated valves, this toilet will keep your plumbing free from the sewers' more paranormal denizens.

Your toilet is where you start and end every day. And now you can enjoy every precious minute with Sweet Escapes, a stylish toilet that cradles you so gently in its embrace, you’ll never want to flush the feeling away.
You’ve got basic needs. Get a basic John to take care of them.
Bring the regal warmth of wood into your bathroom with the Throne of Thrones, a mahogany privy so striking, you’ll be tempted to leave the door open.
A high-end commode with metal and wood accents for a cohesively RAW bathroom look.
Hark back to the days of outdoor plumbing with this rustic wooden toilet. Got a clog? Just pour in a bucket of boiling water and poke until the job’s done.
Relieve yourself in style with this contemporary dual-flush toilet. Elegant, skirted design and efficient, whisper-soft flush add the utmost sophistication to your least refined moments.
This hefty monument will make saying goodbye to loved ones just a little bit easier.
This Gardening Vacuum will weed your plants for you.
Chompy the Monsta's big cousin who loves to eat toys. Chomper is happy to hold onto toys for any child that needs a space to clean up their messy room.

The Pandora is Kindermade's premier storage solution for your tot's toys. Not only will it keep the playthings from taking over your house like a horde of escaped demons, but this model is lead-free up to the specifications of our factory’s home country!
No small or loose parts means that this Chaz Doll is ideal for little ones who can’t be trusted not to eat...everything.
High quality plastic and non-toxic paint make this mass produced Clara doll an acceptable toy for the toddler who likes to chew on everything.
This knightly damsel can save herself! And look effortlessly stylish while doing it, too. Huzzah!
This pretty pink princess wants to do all the things pretty princesses do, like choose a dress for the ball and get menaced by a dragon. Dragon sold separately.
This elegant doll with her jaunty straw hat and wrap is ready to take a stroll on the streets of any Victorian city you can imagine. Filth optional.
The Chaz Doll is highly collectible.
The Clara Doll is highly collectible.
This soft, cuddly bear is perfect for toddlers and kids alike. Teaching your kids to bond with inanimate objects is the first step towards creating a materialistic teenager.
Scary, yet cuddly! Your child will love playing with their tentacle friend in the sea of imagination.
It doesn't actually fly, but if it did how majestic would that be? It's not a problem since the imagination of a child can turn any ordinary object into a mythical creature with a funny name.
While not the classic sports car look, this toy has that toddler favorite style called wood. It's durable for any crash that might happen while playing.
Rubber Ducky makes bath time fun.

This toy was granted for the New Lunar Year of the Pig, starting in February 2019. As the animals celebrated the New Lunar Year within the grand hall, the Panda sat alone outside. He did not receive an invitation, and thought it disrespectful of him to join the party. He soon left and wandered to the riverside. Among the bamboo reeds along the water's edge, he sighed so loudly, a river spirit heard his cry. “Why so forlorn?” the spirit asked. At the end of the Panda's tale, the spirit told the Panda, “I will not allow you to be forgotten…” Moonlight bathed the Panda, and the surrounding bamboo reeds sprouted buds in the shape of little pandas. Later, children plucked the panda-shaped bamboo, painted them with favorite colors at home, and shared them with other children. Somewhere else, the Panda smiled, and continued chewing a bamboo stalk.

At Kindermade, we surveyed five hundred children about the perfect name for their toy unicorn. At least 75% of them suggested some kind of dessert-related word. Next time we’ll conduct the survey after their snack time. Introducing, WaffleKone the Llamacorn!
It walks, it talks, it calculates digits of pi for fun. Bleep the Robot will be your child's best -- and smartest -- friend.
The fiercest herbivore you will ever meet. Don't cross this dino's path in a dark alley is all we're saying.
This fully-articulated replica of The Purple Pursuer is ready to fight crime, battle villains, and save the world.
This fully-articulated replica of The Purple Protector is ready to fight crime, battle villains, and save the world.
A recent arrival from the Land Past Time, Chompy is a curious but friendly monster who wants to play with your child. Constructed of nontoxic plastic, Chompy will last for generations.
Mrs. Meowness is the perfect fat cat for child toys. She may not be lucky, but she is a beautiful kitty.
This rubber ducky is always ready to play... just not in the water.
A sporty two-seater ready to zip to the beach, the club, or anywhere the cool dolls go.
Whether it's for the midnight ball, the royal wedding, or simply collecting taxes from the peasants, this stylish carriage is up for the job.
Every knight needs a dragon to test their mettle against. This specimen, built of sturdy plastic, is ready to threaten hapless villagers and sit atop a horde of treasure, too.
This chunky helicopter toy will help children fulfill all their fantasies of medical rescues, military and police operations, and traffic reporting.
This is a high-quality pony toy for serious aficionados -- the kinds of kids who know what "palomino" actually means.
A heap of organic waste and leftover plant matter.
This wastebasket with a cheerful design helps your child practice developmentally appropriate trash disposal skills.
Understated but hardly shy, this wastebasket holds your bathroom trash without complaint or compromise.
An affordable plastic wastebasket for bathroom, laundry room or anywhere you prioritize substance over style.
A rectangular wastebasket that's not too small, not too big, just right.

The next generation of trash disposal, this hands-free bin replete with smart tech and odor filters converts organic waste into fuel, rendering the entire unit self-sufficient.
A child-sized wastebasket for child-sized waste.
Constructed from recycled plastic slats, this outdoor trash can is weatherproof, eco-friendly and kinda cute, too.
Looking to store lots of garbage on a budget? This is the receptacle for you.
This hardy plastic trash bin will hold your garbage without complaint.
The handsome design and magnificent stone detailing of this outdoor trash can are unparalleled in the field of waste receptacles.
When is less more? Most of the time! But especially on a treadmill, when the equipment around you only gets in the way of visualizing a perfect jog. Get less, and get more with ZenXercise!
Unlock by reaching level 9 of the Athlete career while in the Professional Athlete branch.
Unlocked at level 9 of the Athlete career while in the Professional Athlete branch.
Install this treadmill in your home and you can toss out your sofa in favor of working out and watching TV at the same time. What could be more satisfying?
Beech trees are glorious trees with lots of leaves and shady branches. They grow well in any climate, and are sure to add an air of sophisticated grace to any garden.
This spruce tree is lush and full of life. It adds a bit of natural romance and charm to any urban environment.
This spruce tree is native to the dense forest, but it is highly adaptable and at home in any region or terrain.
Hawthorn trees are a graceful and bold choice for any yard or garden. While relatively short compared to other trees, the Hawthorn is irrefutably hardy and grows well in a variety of soil types.
Oaks are classic and classy! Liven up your back yard, or decorate your drive with these handsome oak trees.

Most pine trees are easy going, but not this one! It needs just enough (but not too much!) sunlight, they right consistency of dirt, not too much water, and an extra dose of love, or else it won’t grow.
This pine tree is practically perfect in every way! Except it still shreds needles. Painful, pointy pine needles…
A beech tree with beautiful green leaves.
A small beech tree with many leaves.
The cypress is a noble and mighty tree sure to enliven even the dullest garden.
The fan palm can grow to nearly 100 feet high and tolerates poor soil and drought. Choose full sun.
This tall, slender palm looks like nothing more than a tropical telephone pole.
Beech trees are durable landscaping trees particularly noted for their beautiful bark.
The birch tree is best-known for its striking white bark dotted with large dark "eyes." Birches are tolerant of a wide range of conditions and thrive in poor soil.
Unlike other conifers, spruces tolerate humid weather well. They are also highly resistant to deer damage, and their handsome looks last all year round.
Also known as the thornapple, whitehorn, or mayhaw, the hawthorne produces masses of small white flowers and small apple-like fruits.
For a pine-scented evergreen, this is your go-to choice.
Beech trees require a humid atmosphere and well-drained soil to thrive. They prefer slightly shady conditions and should be given plenty of space to grow.
Nature lovers are fond of beech trees, as their nuts provide an important food source for wildlife such as turkeys, porcupines, chipmunks, wood ducks, and jays.
Cypresses are traditionally planted in graveyards and are thus a symbol of mourning -- perfect for your uber-Gothic garden.
Magnolias have a wide, shallow root system and do not tolerate being crowded; make this tree a centerpiece of your landscaping instead.
Magnolias are prized for their showy, fragrant flowers. They are among the first trees to bloom in spring.
The mighty and regal oak tree is a symbol of courage and endurance; druids gathered in sacred oak groves to perform their secret rites.
Pine trees are the ultimate coniferous evergreen, known for their decorative cones and resinous sap. They smell nice, too.
Why does the willow weep? Enduring symbols of grief and lost love, weeping willows favor marshy ground and grow aggressively.
Cherry blossoms signify the ephemeral beauty of life. Cherries also symbolize innocence and love; they are a popular flower at weddings.
Observe the charming practice of "hanami," or pickinicking under a cherry tree in spring, beneath the hanging branches of this beauty.
So named because its leaves appear to tremble in the slightest of breezes, the quaking aspen provides spectacular color in the fall.
Botanically speaking, bamboo is classified as a grass rather than as a true tree. Bamboo grows quickly and can be a pest when not properly maintained.
Elms are among the most widely planted ornamental trees in the world. They make excellent shade trees.
Prune this fast-growing ornamental tree early and often for best landscaping results.
Plant a row of fast-growing cypress trees for an instant, evergreen privacy screen.
Not just a barbecue flavoring, mesquite is a drought-tolerant if rather thorny tree, making it a good landscaping choice for arid settings.
Bright green needles and a pleasantly pronounced fragrance distinguish these trees, which are particularly suitable as windbreaks and for erosion control.
Palm trees are low-maintenance ornamental trees that offer dramatic foliage and lend a tropical ambiance to any landscape.
Dramatic of profile and with over 2,500 species worldwide, the palm is a symbol of victory and abundance.
A television stand that mimics the famous boomerang that knocked a world leader temporarily unconscious, this design brings even outdated electronics back to the future.

Envelop your TV in old-fashioned country love. Crafted from poplar, painted and then attacked by feral cats, this handsomely antiqued TV stand will make you feel as if you've stepped back through time, until you watch something better.
Harking back to the days of train travel, this charming television stand is made from old leather trunks and available in a variety of colors.
Recommended by 9 out of 10 optometrists, this ultra-thin HDTV has an image so crisp, it actually improves your vision. We believe the 10th guy was paid off, but that’s a long story.
This no-nonsense television gives you a decent picture at a price you can afford. Probably.
This 3DHDTV is so brilliant, it knows what you want to watch before you do. Serving up all your favorite shows from the past, present, and future, it may hold you captive forever.
Even when it's not on, this TV set is a sight to behold! Your youngsters will enjoy watching their favorite shows broadcasted from the belly of Pengie the Penguin.

This TV only gets a few channels, but it’s a great way to learn a second language, not to mention the mating habits of leopards. We’ve heard if you stretch a bra across the antennae, you can hear aliens, too.
This boxy device isn’t too special to look at, but you’re not watching it off. Flick the switch and presto-you already forgot its looks, didn’t you?

Blow minds and boggle guests with a TV so thin, it’s like the action is happening right on your wall. Brilliant hi-def image quality actually sharpens your vision, so you can set aside your glasses and simply enjoy the show.
This 3DHDTV is so intelligent, it actually installs itself. Open the box and next thing you know, it’s there on the wall, playing your favorite show.
Mount this plasma-screen TV on your wall and you'll have better picture quality than your friends, your neighbors, even the local cinema.
