Unlocked at level 10 of the Tech Guru career while in the Start-up branch.
This might look like an urn to most, but they don’t get it, do they? The beauty of the urn is secondary; it’s what’s inside that counts.
A crudely-made doll of fabric, stitching, and stuffing, roughly resembling a person and used for mischievous purposes.
Why wait on Mother Nature when you have the power of a storm cloud right in your hand? Rusty, dented, and antique, sure, but it pours water, and that’s what counts.
Add extra cheer to your special day with this rustic wooden wedding arch. Entwined in fragrant, blushing lilies, its delicate beauty celebrates yours.

You can’t put a pricetag on love like yours, so why pinch pennies celebrating it? This exquisite latticework arch comes wrapped with ribbons and white gardenias, announcing not only your groom’s true love but the size of Daddy’s paycheck.
This large window still manages to maintain a slim frame while allowing plenty of open space for grand views. Perfect in any living room that wants to let the light in!
Voices carry, but not through this window! All sound is 100% guaranteed to be minimized as it passes effortlessly through this window. Certified silent by the Deaf Poets Society of Window Dressers.
Watch the world grow, through the As Time Goes By window.
This modern submersible window features reinforced glass and vacuum-sealed industrial-steel braces, just in case of, well, anything.
Delivers total privacy and just a smidgeon of natural light.
Ideal for a bathroom or other narrow space, this window slides open when you simply must have a breath of fresh air.
Gaze at the world outside your window, without letting it gaze in.
Sail away to happy seas with this fanciful wooden maritime window.
Simple decorative wooden shutters add a touch of charm and nothing else.
A striking addition to any home, these wood-frame windows feature subtle embellishments that are truly timeless.
Easy to clap shut when solicitors and tree huggers come by.
Bold shapes add a touch of style while framing your outlook on life.
Love natural light and unnatural darkness? Have it all with the shadowy yet striking silhouette of the FMD.
Maximize your view and add a feeling of space even to the most modest home.
A charming suburban window with a heavily emphasized “brow”-popular with Italian families.
Ideal for basements or rooms where privacy is essential, this high-set window bathes your darkest secrets with beautiful natural light.
This three-panel window gives any room a wide, bright bank of light. Perfect for indoor living that feels like it's outdoor.
Get more symmetry for your Simoleons with this ultra-chic modern window set.
A classic modern solution for households with short and tall inhabitants.
Undeniably chic in an urban sort of way.
Get the ultimate in ventilation without risking a fall!
The epitome of urban chic, this extra-tall window is ideal for lofts, warehouses and other repurposed spaces.
No proper fenestrator could go without the Glacemaster 1700C--supreme among household windows. The Combo version.

People always ask us how we are able to make such a narrow window at such high quality. The answer is simple! When we program our assembly line robots to make windows, we set both “narrow” and “high quality” to true!
Add an air of old world charm with an eye-catching, mission-style arched window.

At MegaMission Outdoor Warehouse, every one of our antique windows and doors is made by hand by assembly line robots. Now, thanks to a slight error in a recursive function in their deluxe window-crafting program, we have produced thousands of high quality double windows. Some of the greatest inventions were born from simple errors!

It turns out that robots are incredibly good at breaking glass. When we realized our assembly line robots smashed 30% of the windows they constructed, we found a simple solution: program them to feel deep shame whenever they break a window. Now we get beauties like this Grand Mega Window without so much as a chip in the glass!

We asked the AI for our assembly line robots how it could construct a window that was twice as good as the Grand Mega Window, and it produced this in reply. We’re still not sure if it was being sarcastic or not.

Robots have difficulty with the concept of human excess, but we were able to work around that by swapping their definitions for “efficient” and “inefficient.” Now our window-crafting bots have been able to manufacture our grandest window yet, the Mega Window Grand Deluxe!
This dramatic architectural feature is both arresting and appreciated.
Arch You Happy to See Me?

If you like your windows to be a piece of glass in a wooden frame, oh boy, have we got the window for you! This is the window that gets manufactured when we press the “Test” button after rebooting our assembly line robots.

For the budget-conscious consumer with a taste for antiques, we offer the Budget DeLite version of our popular Mega Window. Carved from discarded holiday trees that we buy in bulk, each window features 6 panes of Glaz, our semi-transparent glass substitute.

What’s that you say? Six panes of Glaz aren’t enough? You want even more of our proprietary glass substitute in your antique window? Well say no more. We had our assembly line robots stick two Mega Windows together using the finest wood glue on the market. Now you can show all the neighbors that you’re a twelve-paner!

This window is the result of a design challenge. We asked our assembly line robots to produce something that would let in as little light as possible but still be considered a “window” by human standards. Despite the rather subjective requirements of the test they did quite well!

99.9% of our antique windows are mass produced on our assembly line; however, as a special promotion, we had an actual human artisan come in and hand carve 100 Mega Windows. We won’t tell you which ones are his, but if you buy enough to cover your house there’s a good chance you get at least one, right?
Simple yet decorative, these hand-carved wooden windows add beauty to any Craftsman home.

We wanted a window that would practically scream “handmade antique.” That’s why we programmed our battery of assembly line robots to add a quaint wooden shutter to our popular Mega Window. You won’t believe the hands that made it were 40% tungsten!

Thanks to an error that flipped the blueprint image we scanned into the database of our assembly line robots, we have manufactured thousands of windows with the shutter attached to the wrong side. Use with our original shuttered Mega Window to create a nice symmetrical look.

We produced this window by combining the plans for all of our other Mega Windows. It’s pretty good quality, a great size, decently attractive… It’s not necessarily everything you want but it’s certainly none of the things that you don’t want! Buy dozens!
Mega Window (Double Budget Grand Deluxe DeLite)

We just did a security analysis of our company systems and let's get to the point, things are bad. How is it possible that everyone's password is ********? You have to help us!
My phone icons seem drab and dull. Could you write an application that would make all of the icons wear tuxedos? Now that would be fancy!

After seeing one at that conference, I NEED to have a mechanical mixologist. I built one from household scraps, but can't get the UI working. It's only making soda water! I'll pay you to fix it. No price is too high!
I'm having trouble with my robot army. They just want to sit around and drink coffee. Will you look into why they're so lazy?

Self-driving cars are yesterday's news. Our company is developing self-piloting hang gliders. Transportation of the future! We're just having a few fairly insignificant problems keeping them away from power lines. Would you take a look?

It's a conspiracy! There's no possible way that our town could naturally have this many blades of grass with the exact same width! Help me set up a site to expose the truth! I can pay you with grilled cheese, right? No? Well, the truth must have its voice, no matter the price.

We have the fog machines and the lasers. What we don't have is the program to make 8 bright green laser dragons fly out of the densest fog anyone has ever seen. I think that you're just the person to help us.
I'm looking for someone to make a blog about my cat and I think you're just the person for the job! Think you can get that done for me? Of course you can!
Thanks so much for a job well done. Hope this pay is sufficient.
I was a little unsure about choosing a freelancer to do such an important job, but you delivered! Thanks a bunch!
I need a mod for a first-person shooter I'm playing. I want something that will make it super easy for me to get points. I hear you're the one that can make that happen!

The Day of the Dead Challenge is here for a limited time! Other Sims are already out and about celebrating the occasion. Look around the neighborhood for Sims in vibrantly themed regalia and ask them for a sugar skull.\n\nCompleting the sugar skull collection allows your own Sims to join in the festivities! This interaction rewards your household with a tenth golden skull and enhanced interactions with the Grim Reaper.

Be Friendly towards other Sims, or perform helpful deeds for your Neighbors. Anything that spreads the positive energy! \n\nAfter completing a stage of the Aspiration, be sure to open the Box of Kindness to receive a reward.
Great Job! You are now a Kindness Ambassador, Go into the world, make friends, and spread positivity!

The PlantSim Challenge is here for a limited time! Here's what to do:
  • Look around the neighborhood for PlantSims!
  • Once you find them, ask them to give you a Magic Bean. The type of bean they give you will be based on their current emotion.
  • Once you find a bean, place it into a Magic PlantSim Stump (There's one in your inventory!)
  • Once six unique beans are placed, you will be able to water the stump, and find out what magical things may grow!

I'm here to help you eat better food, stink less, and express yourself more! Ask for a boost and I’ll happily grant it for a healthy length of time. Of course, you can change your boost at any time. Just call me and ask for another.\n\nI have three options! You can improve your gardening and cooking skill gain – yum yum! Alternatively, you can increase your handiness, painting, and photography skill gain to help you dabble in the arts. Or perhaps you simply wish to spend more time outside? No worries, I can reduce your hunger and hygiene decay. So, what’ll it be?

Hey there little one! What's that? You want to know about this Triple Boost Week you keep hearing adults whispering about? I'm not sure I should be the one to explain the birds and the bees...\n\nActually, hold on. I've got a special version of this week's boost I can offer you. Just ask me for a boost to relationship gain and you'll find that you'll gather friendship with others three times faster. Why not try it out right now? Grab my boost and scamper along to the playground; you'll have new friends to play with in a snap!

Triple boost week has arrived again, and the clock is ticking on your time to take advantage of these marvelous boosts.

I present to you an intriguing proposition... Do you rocket your Satisfaction Points upwards with a 3x boost to all points gained when completing whims? Or, do you slow down all need decay by 3x, effectively giving yourself more free time to do with as you please?

The choice is yours! Ask for a boost and I'll happily grant it. Remember, you can change your active boost at any time - I'm always just a phone call away.

Triple Boost Week is here, but it won't be available for long... Take advantage of the wondrous boost I have to offer!\n\nTruth be told, I fancy myself a bit of a matchmaker. To that end, I've brought along a boost to all of your relationship gains. No matter if your relationship is passionate or platonic, I'm here to help. Simply ask for my boost and you'll be making friends... or friends with benefits... in no time. Now get out there and turn on the charm!
Greetings, This Event period is being celebrated with Boosts! All the Boosts! Ask me for a Boost, and I shall bestow upon you the one which you desire.
Boost Handiness, Painting, & Photography Skill Gain

Take a relaxing walk through the museums garden to gather inspiration. Climb the spire to enjoy life's greatest creations, from the top artists around the city. All locally curated, and put on display for your enjoyment.

With a scruffy, “hairy guy next door” name like Patchy’s, you know you’re in for a fun when you step foot in this local neighborhood bar. Saunter up to the bar for a cold beverage then meet some cute young things on the dance floor. When you’re at Patchy’s, you’re in for a good time!

A Willow Creek classic, Creekside Smooth is the high end bar for lovers of a smooth, jazzy atmosphere and the crisp libations of veteran mixologists. Fill your glass and strike up a conversation - you’re in smooth!
Is it a mirage? No, it's an oasis of affordable entertainment! Finally bowling has come to Oasis Springs so you don't have to kick rocks in the desert to pass the time.
You will want to line up and wait many hours for a spot to try their delicious recipes. No, we don't have a clue as to what their dishes are. We are still waiting in line!

A restaurant crafted around the idea of a BBQ picnic - minus all the ants. This is the place to be on those days when we feel like we want to dine outside. Also, what better combination than Meat, Cheese and Carbs? Bring these all together and you have the ingredients for a great restaurant.
Need to go to the vet, but hate that sterile, medical feeling? Renovated from an old home in the countryside, this Vet Clinic feels warm and welcoming.
Dance the night away at this chic nightclub! If you prefer to observe, there’s a second floor balcony surrounding the dance floor. But, please come dance to avoid bothering dancing patrons.
Complementary atmospheres of dark indoors and naturally lit outdoors are what this club is all about. Yin & Yang displays a balance between two opposites with a little bit in each.
Serving the most important meals of the day any time of day.

Partake in science and taste test Chez Llama’s most experimental dishes. If it doesn't look like what you think you ordered, then it is a successful and delicious meal! What? Don't be scared, they only serve edibles.
Show off some Simoleons in this gorgeous home and its accompanying gardens. Just make sure you can pay those bills before moving in!

The place to see and be seen! Step up to the window, flex, and demonstrate those gains for passersby. Hit the treadmill, throw back a few more pounds, and pose again. The FitBox is a glamour show for peak fitness.

Just because it’s steaming hot outside doesn’t mean you can get the sweat running inside. At Burners & Builders, you will walk in a wrinkled sack of skin and leave a taut, well-oiled machine of peak fitness. Step in and get some gains.
This 24 Hour fitness establishment directly confronts the squishy, soft exterior of Willow Creek and throws some muscles on it. Enter the Movers & Shakers and build a new you.
Expertly and perfectly cooked Italian cuisine served daily! Enjoy a delicious pasta or a succulent steak. Bring your appetite, because you will need a lot of it!

This 3-story garden of knowledge boasts tons of bookshelves and a rosy red interior. There’s even a kid’s play area for those little ones so the rest of the building stays nice and quiet. Come to browse, stay to learn!
Unlike the Ancient Library of Alexandria, this desert library hasn’t been burned to the ground and lost to the ages. Check out a book now!
Halvsies is a trendy new lounge that embraces today’s multi-natured lifestyle. Even though you’re crazy busy every day, you can always come to Halvsies and embrace your other, more relaxed half.
Looking to de-stress after a long week? The Cadenza Lounge has a soothing atmosphere and live music to help you relax into the weekend.
Home to some of the most esteemed pieces of art in the world, this museum also houses a cozy café on its first floor. Come for the masterpieces, stay for the caffeine!

Hidden for nearly a century, the Lost Gardens of Healing have been lovingly restored, allowing visitors to step back in time and experience a turn of the century Victorian garden. Come and share a romantic moment within the serenity of the park’s grounds, or toss a coin into the fabled well on a wing and a wish.
It doesn’t take a psychic to know that the previous owner of this house was a feline fanatic.
Nestled between palm trees and other desert vegetation, the Oasis Springs Picnic Spot is a great spot to spend a weekend and bask in the outdoors.
Have a BBQ or simply enjoy yourself in the shade of this cozy patch of nature. The Willow Creek Picnic Spot lets you dine out…outside that is!
Perfect for a night stroll, a casual jog or a candid game of Chess. Newcrest Park is perfect to get away and indulge in much needed outside air and family quality time.
Let your hair down and go wild at the Rooftop Treble! One of the hottest spots in all of San Myshuno. Show off your singing skills and woo the crowd!

Perched up high in the quaint arts quarter, the Bachelor's Abode has everything a single bachelor could ever need. Perfect for swank rooftop parties overlooking the most creative district in all of San Myshuno.

This modern glass box has views of the entire city. Relax on the rooftop and enjoy the views, play a friendly game of hoops, or throw the house party of a lifetime. The Uptown Glass estate has everything you need to live your life like a true rockstar!
Every puppy needs a place to play! The Peppy Puppy Playpark is the perfect venue to get your little doggo outside and exercising.

This Residence has generous space for the family of your dreams! With 2 stories, 4 Bedrooms, and 3 Bath, this home has enough room for entertaining, dealing with tantrums, and enjoying quiet times as a family.

Feel the salty fresh air as if you were a pelican looking for its meal, feel the rush of the water...OK, not the rush of the water, but luckily you won't need to dive in for your meal at The Diving Pelican! Elevated above sea level seafood for the masses, we just recommend to get a bigger napkin.
An archive of some of the best sea-shanties and sailors’ tales. Take a walk up to the top-floor deck for a beautiful view!

This house once belonged to a nervous sailor’s wife, who installed a plethora of windows so she could scan the sea for signs of her husband returning home. Nowadays, it makes for a beautiful family home with pleasant views of the water.

To purchase a Styled Room, click it, select your preferred color palette, and click the Buy Room button.\n\nYou can then place it on your lot and move, resize, or edit it like any other room. You can also quickly buy the room as-is by double-clicking on the small thumbnail. To buy an individual object in the room, hover over it to select it and then click.
Become a daring Doctor, fearless Detective, mad Scientist, or create your own retail business.
Create and join unique Clubs where you set the rules and live it up in a beautiful new World.

Create a casual backyard space for your Sims to kick back and cool off with The Sims™ 4 Backyard Stuff. Attempt crazy tricks on the lawn water slide or chill out with a glass of lemonade. Decorate the backyard with colorful new objects and outfit your Sims in laid-back fashion. Stuff Pack Features:
  • All-new Lawn Water Slide
  • Personalize the Backyard
  • Lounge in New Fashion
REQUIRES THE SIMS 4 GAME (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL UPDATES TO PLAY. INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR PRODUCT ACTIVATION.

Exclusive items are available as part of special, limited-time offers. If you choose to download a Gallery creation that contains exclusive items that you do not own, the Gallery creation will be applied to your game with the exclusive items removed. Show off your fandom for The Sims 3 with unique unlockable items! You will receive a unique lamp for your copy of The Sims 3 and each of the 11 Expansion Packs you register with your EA Account through Origin or TheSims3.com. With the unique lamps it will be easy to bring some memorable lighting into your Sim's home! Plus, once you’ve unlocked all 12 lamps, you’ll gain a special Freezer Bunny statue as a thanks from us to you! For more information please see www.thesims.com/rewards.

The Sims 4 Digital Deluxe Upgrade will upgrade your copy of The Sims 4 Standard Edition or The Sims 4 Limited Edition, to include all bonus content offered with The Sims 4 Digital Deluxe version which includes 3 content packs: Up All Night, Life of the Party, and Awesome Animal Hats.

Stay up all night with 2 hot new parties, the Incognito Costume Party and the Black & White Bash! And what’s a party without some tasty tantalizing treats? You’ll also get 10 memorable food and drink recipes!

These recipes will give your Sim all the knowledge needed to whip up party favorites like: Buffalo Wing Tea, Taco Casserole, Black & White Cake, Black & White Cookies, Zebra Fizz, Salt & Pepper Shrimp Cocktail, Flaming Zesty Salt, Sea of Fire, Hot & Smokey and the curiously craveable Hamburger Cake.

Welcome to the beautiful world of Windenburg where there’s always something fun to do with other Sims! Explore scenic neighborhoods and lively hotspots, get together for exciting group activities, and join clubs to meet new Sims and live it up! In The Sims™ 4 Get Together, there’s always a great reason to get together. Expansion Pack Features:
  • Explore A Beautiful New World
  • Discover New Venues
  • Get Together for Exciting Group Activities
  • Learn New DJ & Dancing Skills
  • Join Unique Clubs
    • REQUIRES THE SIMS™ 4 GAME TO PLAY (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES TO PLAY.

Take your Sims to the city and explore everything it has to offer, from bustling action outside to unique situations that come only with apartment living. Fulfill your Sims’ dreams in the diverse city of San Myshuno, and discover new neighborhoods and festivals. Experience the charm and challenges that come with your Sims’ first apartment, then work your way up the penthouse of your Sims’ dreams. Expansion Pack Features:
  • Explore the Bustling City of San Myshuno
  • Discover Lively, Cultural Festivals
  • Live in Apartments and get Closer with Your Neighbors
  • Work Your Way Up from Starter Apartment to Penthouse
  • Embark on New, Metropolitan Careers
REQUIRES THE SIMS 4 GAME (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL UPDATES TO PLAY. INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR PRODUCT ACTIVATION.

Create a variety of cats and dogs, add them to your Sims’ homes to forever change their lives, and care for neighborhood pets as a veterinarian with The Sims™ 4 Cats & Dogs. The powerful new Create A Pet tool lets you personalize cats and dogs, each with their own unique appearances, distinct behaviors, and for the first time, expressive outfits! These wonderful, lifelong companions will change your Sims’ lives in new and special ways. Treat animal ailments as a veterinarian and run your own clinic in a beautiful coastal world where there’s so much for your Sims and their pets to discover. Expansion Pack Features:
  • Create Cats and Dogs
  • Bond with Your Pets
  • Become a Vet and Run a Clinic
REQUIRES THE SIMS 4 GAME (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL UPDATES TO PLAY. INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR PRODUCT ACTIVATION.

You rule the workplace in The Sims™ 4 Get to Work! Actively control your Sims while they’re at work and determine whether they spend their days saving lives as a daring Doctor, solving crimes as a fearless Detective, crafting inventions as a mad Scientist, or creating their own retail businesses trying to become a Simoleonaire. Expansion Pack Features:
  • Become a Doctor, Detective, or Scientist
  • Work in a Hospital, Police Station, or Science Lab
  • Create, customize, and manage unique retail businesses
  • Learn the new Photography and Baking skills
  • Discover Aliens
REQUIRES THE SIMS™ 4 GAME TO PLAY (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES TO PLAY.

Reach for the stars and rise to celebrity status with The Sims™ 4 Get Famous. Build your stardom as you pursue an acting career, become an A-lister, and guide your Sims down the unpredictable path to fame. From the studio lot to VIP parties, you choose how your Sims can gain worldwide acclaim. Customize and show off your celebrity style, and decorate your Sims’ luxury house on the hills with over-the-top accessories like a solid-gold toilet. Get ready to shine bright in the spotlight and live your best celebrity life. Expansion Pack Features:
  • Claim Your Fame
  • Act the Part
  • Run This Town
  • Live a Lavish Lifestyle
REQUIRES THE SIMS 4 GAME (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES TO PLAY. SEE MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR THIS PACK.

Develop your Sim’s parenting skills to help shape their children’s lives into adulthood with The Sims™ 4 Parenthood. Choose when to discipline or encourage child behaviors, teach life values, and leave a lasting impact on their future. Experience fun family activities and personalize your household with new home décor and family fashion. Game Pack Features:
  • Develop Parenting Skills
  • Shape Your Sim’s Childhood
  • Enjoy New Family Activities
REQUIRES THE SIMS 4 GAME (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL UPDATES TO PLAY. INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR PRODUCT ACTIVATION.

Treat your Sims to a day of pampering with The Sims™ 4 Spa Day. Your Sims can visit the all-new Perfect Balance Spa for a revitalizing massage and work on their inner wellness through the practice of yoga. After a relaxing soak in the mud bath, step into the sauna to melt away the daily stresses. With a variety of all-new objects and décor, you can bring tranquility and comfort to your Sim’s home. Game Pack Features:
  • All-new Venue: Perfect Balance Spa
  • New Skill: Wellness
  • Practice Yoga and Meditation
  • Step into a sauna or soak in a mud bath
REQUIRES THE SIMS™ 4 GAME TO PLAY (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES TO PLAY.

Take your Sims on a mysterious adventure into the wild and discover a new culture with The Sims™ 4 Jungle Adventure. Explore a unique wilderness landscape, revealing a temple, jungle obstacles, cursed relics and treasures. Experience the culture and customs of Selvadorada, from devouring local eats to learning spicy new dance moves! Game Pack Features:
  • Venture to Selvadorada
  • Explore the Jungle
  • Discover a Hidden Temple
  • Collect Ancient Artifacts
REQUIRES THE SIMS 4 GAME (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES TO PLAY. SEE MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR THIS PACK.

Take your Sims camping and explore the all-new destination of Granite Falls in The Sims™ 4 Outdoor Retreat! Venture into the deep woods to discover new surprises, including dangerous and wondrous herbs, new species of fish, creepy insects and… bears? Hang out by the campfire before trying to find the hermit rumored to live in the deepest parts of the forest. Game Pack Features:
  • Wander into an all-new destination
  • Setup camp with tents, coolers and campfires
  • Outfit your Sims in new hiking gear
  • Enjoy unique outdoor activities
  • Become a herbalist
REQUIRES THE SIMS™ 4 GAME TO PLAY (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES TO PLAY.

Escape the ordinary and embrace a laid-back lifestyle surrounded by beaches in The Sims 4 Island Living. Explore a breezy world drenched in sun, sand, and endless fun as your Sims make their own paradise. Whether they contribute to the conservation effort or prefer living off the grid, your Sims can take the plunge and enjoy what this unique culture has to offer. Embrace traditional events, wear native clothing styles, or sip on some kava. It’s all part of Sulani island life. Expansion Pack Features:
  • Sit Back and Relax
  • Pitch In or Help Out
  • Engage in Local Culture
  • Rock the Island Vibes
REQUIRES THE SIMS™ 4 GAME (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES TO PLAY. SEE MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR THIS PACK.

Surround your Sims in clean clothes while living a rustic lifestyle with The Sims™ 4 Laundry Day Stuff. Your Sims’ can now clean their clothes, from gathering laundry to washing and drying, giving their outfits a spotless look. Embrace the rustic life with new country-themed décor and clothing for your household. Stuff Pack Features:
  • Wash Your Wardrobe
  • Build a Rustic Home
  • Dress in Country Style
REQUIRES THE SIMS 4 GAME (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL UPDATES TO PLAY. INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR PRODUCT ACTIVATION.

The Life of the Party Digital Content is only available by purchasing any of the following Limited Edition, Premium Edition, Collector’s Edition, and Digital Deluxe Editions of The Sims 4 or by upgrading The Sims 4 Standard Edition with The Sims 4 Digital Deluxe Upgrade.
Features the Flaming Tiki Bar with unique and exciting drink recipes for your Sims to make and enjoy! Also includes some sleek, stylized outfits for your Sims, because who doesn’t want to look fabulous while working behind a fire breathing bar?
Life of the Party Pack Digital Content

Your Sims are getting fancy with The Sims™ 4 Luxury Party Stuff! Throw a luxurious party with a variety of extravagant décor. Upgrade your Sims’ wardrobes with dazzling gowns and chic formal wear. With the all-new buffet table, you can decide what tasty dishes to serve your Sims and put together the perfect centerpiece for any event. Stuff Pack Features:
  • Fancy furnishings and décor.
  • Dazzling gowns and chic formal wear.
  • All-new Buffet Table!
    • REQUIRES THE SIMS™ 4 GAME TO PLAY (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES TO PLAY.

Invite your friends over for a movie night and hangout in carefree style with The Sims™ 4 Movie Hangout Stuff. Pop a bowl of popcorn and entertain your Sims with a movie on the all-new projector screen. Embrace a low-key mood by dressing in boho-chic fashion and effortless hairstyles. Stuff Pack Features:
  • Gather Around the Projector Screen
  • Get Poppin’ with the Popcorn Popper
  • Boho-chic Fashion
  • Set the Mood with Decorative Accents
    • REQUIRES THE SIMS™ 4 GAME TO PLAY (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES TO PLAY.

Awesome Animal Hats Digital Content is only available by purchasing any of the following Premium Edition, Collector’s Edition, and Digital Deluxe Editions of The Sims 4 or by upgrading The Sims 4 Standard Edition or Limited Edition with The Sims 4 Digital Deluxe Upgrade.
Features a collection of fun animal hats for your Sims to wear and show off! Each hat has a unique moodlet to help your Sims through the good or the bad.

Welcome home a new small animal and show off your love for Cats and Dogs with The Sims™ 4 My First Pet Stuff. Teach your Sims how to care for smaller household pets, decorate a home with pet-inspired furniture, and dress pets in your favorite Sims outfits! Stuff Pack Features:
  • Care for a New Pet
  • Dress Your Cats and Dogs
  • Decorate with Pet Prints

Own a restaurant and take your Sims out to eat with The Sims™ 4 Dine Out. Create and manage a variety of restaurants, hire staff, and set the perfect menu to earn a profit and expand your business. Dine out with Sims to enjoy all-new experimental cuisine and spend quality time with friends and family. Game Pack Features:
  • Create Unique Restaurants
  • Become an Owner
  • Dine Out with Your Sims
  • Experiment with New Food

Add weather to your Sims’ lives to tell new stories, enjoy seasonal activities, and celebrate heartfelt holidays with The Sims™ 4 Seasons. Make the most out of the weather all year round, from crisp snowfalls to sweltering heat – every world is affected by seasons in unique ways. Create a winter story with ice skating, befriend a magical scarecrow at the fall harvest, share a spring fling during a downpour, or host a summer pool party. Gather friends and family to celebrate holidays complete with traditions, gifts, and special guests. Stay warm or keep cool with all-new outfits to brave the elements. Even begin a blossoming gardening career as a botanist or by crafting floral arrangements! Expansion Pack Features:
  • Experience Impactful Weather
  • Revel in Seasonal Activities
  • Celebrate the Holidays
REQUIRES THE SIMS™ 4 GAME (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES TO PLAY. SEE MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR THIS EXPANSION.

When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal clears a Sim's mind of Tense energies.
Alabaster is composed primarily of Selium, but has a small amount of Alcineat as well.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal boosts Logic (Mental for Children) skill gain and recharges the Hunger need.
Amethyst is composed of equal parts Oxypin and Volenton.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal clears a Sim's mind of Bored energies.
Citrine is composed mostly of Ozinate, though there is some Plathium mixed in as well.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal boosts Fame Point gain and recharges the Social need.
Diamond is composed mostly of Plathium, with a small amount of Firaxium.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal clears a Sim's mind of Embarrassed energies.
Emerald is composed of Goobleck and Sydrolin, with more Goobleck than Sydrolin.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal ensures Friendly socials never fail and recharges the Hygiene need.
Fire Opal is composed mainly of Selium, with small amounts of Plathium and Crytacoo.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal boosts career performance gain and recharges the Fun need.
Hematite is composed entirely of Wolfium.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal boosts Whim Satisfaction Point gain and recharges all needs (except energy).
Jet is composed mostly of Wolfium, with equal parts Plathium and Plumbobus in smaller amounts.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal boosts Charisma (Social for Children) skill gain and recharges all needs (except energy).
Jonquilyst is composed primarily of Crytacoo, with a large amount of Phozone as well.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal clears a Sim's mind of Sad energies.
Orange Topaz is composed primarily of Phozone, with a good bit of Selium.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal recharges the Bladder need. (Thirst for Vampires, Water for Plant Sims)
Peach is composed of Alcineat and Sydrolin, with a ratio of about 3 to 1.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal boosts Athletic (Motor for Children) skill gain and recharges all needs (except energy).
Plumbite is composed of both Phozone and Plumbobus, with there being a touch more Phozone.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal clears a Sim's mind of Uncomfortable energies.
Quartz is composed mainly of Sydrolin, with a small amount of Volenton.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal periodically makes nearby Sims happy and recharges all needs (except energy).
Rainborz is composed of a number of elements: Firaxium, Peryllium, and Melacoo, all in almost equal proportions.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal clears a Sim's mind of Anger energies.
Rose is composed primarily of Phozone, with a decent amount of Peryllium.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal recharges the Hygiene need.
Ruby is almost all Sydrolin, but has trace amounts of Peryllium in it.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal recharges the Social need.
Sapphire is made entirely out of Melacoo.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal doubles the chance of finding crystals in the world and recharges the Bladder need. (Thirst for Vampires, Water for Plant Sims)
Shinolite is half Alcineat and half Wolfium.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal periodically makes other sims like you more and recharges the Social need.
Simanite is composed of Ozinate and Volenton, with there being a touch more Ozinate than Volenton.
When slotted into the Celestial Crystal Crown, this crystal clears a Sim's mind of Uncomfortable energies.
Turquoise is composed of equal parts Oxypin and Alcineat.
An ancient deposit of sedimentary rock embedded with odd materials. Perhaps further investigation will reveal something special.
Alcron is composed of equal parts Sydrolin and Selium.
Baconite is composed of equal parts Sydrolin and Ozinate.
Crytunium is mostly composed of Volenton, but has a decent amount of Crytacoo as well.
Death Metal is made up of Plathium and Ozinate. There's more Plathium, but not by much.
Flamingonium is mainly composed of Melacoo but has a good percentage of Peryllium in it as well, giving it the pink hue it has.
Furium is primarily Firaxium but has almost as much Oxypin and Alcineat in it.
Heavy Metal is primarily comprised of Phozone, though it does have some Goobleck, which gives it that distinctive smell.
Ironyum is composed of Wolfium and Plathium, with a touch more Wolfium than Plathium.
Literalite is composed of equal parts Selium and Volenton, with a small amount of Crytacoo to boot.
Obtainium is mainly composed of Alcineat, though it also has a decent amount of Goobleck mixed in.
Ozinold is composed of both Ozinate and Alcineat, with a bit more Ozinate than Alcineat.
Phozonite is made up solely of Phozone. Go figure, huh?
Plathinum is composed primarily of Goobleck but also has some Plathium, which is what makes it so shiny.
Punium is composed entirely of Oxypin.
Pyrite is composed of Phozone and Melacoo, at a ratio of about 2 to 3.
Romantium is half Melacoo, with the rest of the composition being equal parts Peryllium and Plumbobus.
Sadnum is made mostly of Selium, with a bit of both Plumbobus and Firaxium.
Simtanium is mainly composed of Selium and Wolfium, with small amounts of Plumbobus.
Socialite has a large amount of Peryllium in it and a small amount of Volenton.
Utranium is composed solely of Selium.

To increase Mixology skill, use the Bar to Make Drinks, Tend Bar, or read a Mixology Skill Book. Skill Books can be purchased directly from a Bookshelf by using the Purchase Books interaction!

To increase Charisma skill, socialize with other Sims, use the Mirror to Practice Speaking, or read a Charisma Skill Book. Skill Books can be purchased directly from a Bookshelf by using the Purchase Books interaction!
To increase Comedy skill, use the Microphone, Write Jokes on the Computer, or read a Comedy Skill Book. Skill Books can be purchased directly from a Bookshelf by using the Purchase Books interaction!
To increase Fitness skill, work out by using the Treadmill, Workout Machine, or Punching Bag. Alternatively, you can also Go Jogging!
To increase Gardening skill, have Sims Harvest plants, tend Gardens, or read a Gardening Skill Book. Skill Books can be purchased directly from a Bookshelf by using the Purchase Books interaction!

To increase Gourmet Cooking skill, use the Refrigerator or Stove to cook Gourmet meals or read a Gourmet Cooking Skill Book. Skill Books can be purchased directly from a Bookshelf by using the Purchase Books interaction!
To increase Guitar skill, play the Guitar or read a Guitar Skill Book. Skill Books can be purchased directly from a Bookshelf by using the Purchase Books interaction!
To increase Programming skill, have them Program on the Computer or read a Programming Skill Book. Skill Books can be purchased directly from a Bookshelf by using the Purchase Books interaction!
To increase Handiness Skill, Repair or Upgrade objects. Alternatively create objects on the Woodworking Table!

To increase Cooking skill, use the Refrigerator or Stove to make food, Watch the Cooking Channel on a TV, or read a Cooking Skill Book. Skill Books can be purchased directly from a Bookshelf by using the Purchase Books interaction!
To increase Logic skill, use the Microscope, Observatory, Chess Table, or read a Logic Skill Book. Skill Books can be purchased directly from a Bookshelf by using the Purchase Books interaction!

Sims enjoy socializing with others. Click on your roommate to see a variety of interactions from an initial greeting to discussing a variety of interesting topics.
Your home has a lot of objects that you can interact with. Try watching something on TV, playing on the Computer, or listening to the Stereo for some light entertainment to pass the time.
Hunger is one the core motives for Sims and eating regularly will help keep them happy. Grab a Serving from a prepared meal, or Cook at a Fridge or Oven.
Energy is vital to Sims. It slowly drains throughout the day but can be filled by clicking on a Bed to Sleep the night away.
Go to Sleep for the Night
Improving a Sims motives is a good way to start the day. So before work, take a Shower to fix low Hygiene and Use the Toilet to solve Bladder issues.
Having a career is a regular responsibility for Sims, one that can be very rewarding. Make sure your Sims leaves for their job in the hour before its scheduled to begin.
Working all day leaves little time to socialize. Take some time to recharge your Social motive, and chat with Alex.
Few Sims enjoy a messy home. Tidy up a bit by throwing out trash, picking up dishes, cleaning surfaces or mopping puddles.
Sometimes Sims need to jump start their day. Brew Coffee on the Coffee Maker for an energy boost.
Jobs have tasks you can complete at home to earn promotions faster. Look at the career panel to see what your Sim can do to increase work performance.
Sims can learn a variety of skills, shown above their head when performing certain interactions, like Painting, Working Out, Cooking or Writing.
Promotions are rewards for doing good at your job. Keep going to work everyday and performing daily tasks until your Sim advances in their career.

There are often interesting things to do outside your home lot. Fishing is a great example and a relaxing way to waste some time. Find a park Pond or fishing Signpost near water to try and catch something.
All work and no play makes for a very dull Sim. Use the Phone to take a well-earned day of Paid Time Off from work for a little you-time.
It's time for a change of scenery. Get out and about, by traveling to a new location, like a day at the Park.
Its a big world out there, full of many interesting Sims. Branch out and meet some new people!
Click on Sims to perform acts of kindness such as the Brighten Day social, or click on objects and direct Sims to perform helpful things like Clean Up Trash.

A pool is the only place where having a trim adds and doesn’t subtract. No one would go to a barber, say “I just want a trim” and leave with more hair than they came with. They should call it a border. So get a border and go for a dip. Let no weird nomenclature get in the way of your relaxing swim.
A banister both stylish and sturdy thanks to its composite balusters of both wood and metal.
Understated colonial design brings an air of authority to your stairwell.
Add a touch of Modernist whimsy to your stairwell décor with this ornamental banister.
A basic banister to keep guests and residents from falling off the stairs.
A stair rail that resembles a picket fence.
Another stair rail that resembles a picket fence.
Tapered balusters lighten the silhouette of this stylish banister.
Ornate balusters add authority to a practical piece of interior architecture.
A closed stair railing system that provides maximum safety without sacrificing style.
Balusters of turned wood with decorative knuckles are a timeless classic.

Did you think we were just going to sell you stairs and not offer a railing to go with them? Please! We’re not jerks! Oh, did you think that the railing would just come with the stairs when you bought them? Oh. Well… we don’t do that.

We took a long, honest look at our Budget DeLite railing and realized we could do better. With very little effort. Now, we are pleased to offer the Basic model of our Mega Railing - for when you’re climbing stairs, but you’re not sure what to do with your hands.
Horizontal stair rails are an unusual design choice best suited for child-free households.
Long horizontal lines lengthen the look of your stairwell.
Hefty balusters adorned with a large turned-wood "knuckle" in the middle present an imposing barrier to careless stair-walkers.
Shoe rail designs place a small space between the stairs and their balusters, just big enough for the toe of someone's shoe to poke through. No, we don't know why.
Shoe rails are less sturdy than other railing options but add an understated, airy elegance to your stairwell interiors.
Elegant Shoe Rail with Rounded Newels
Not too utilitarian yet not overly ornate, this banister does exactly what it's intended to -- help people travel up and down the stairs.
There is no place on the table available for coloring.
The Lot of the Rising Sun
Immortalize someone you love! Or someone you hate. You're the author, after all.
Write a book about your routines. It's just like writing a comedy routine, except you have an editor.
Sim must be in a Confident mood to resume writing this book.
Help people become better versions of themselves!
A selection of drinks and instructions on how to make them.
Recipes, tips, and tricks on how to create tasty food.
The extravagant tales of Areel the Space Pirate and her spunky lover. In this volume: finding the dollhouse of their dreams.
Sim must be in a Energized mood to resume writing this book.
Like stretching before a workout, except in words instead of actual stretches.
Fire-breathing dragons or sparkly vampires. Choose wisely.
Sim must be in a Flirty mood to resume writing this book.
When a romantic mood meets an outpouring of words, the result is a book that can make anyone blush.
Chronicle your skill into a guidebook for all!
Who-done-its, relic adventures, cryptic codes, and more!
Remember, it has to be real to be non-fiction.
Capture a Sim's life in an epic poem.
Sim must be in a Playful mood to resume writing this book.
Life, but only the giddy bits.
It's alright to rhyme but not all the time. Chime. Dime. Slime.
Sim must be in a Sad mood to resume writing this book.
Misery loves company, or if not company, at least publication.
Aliens! Llamas in spacesuits! Gnomes on lunar lawns!
You could be the next Billy Shakespeare!
Keep it short. Otherwise, it's a long story.
How to Deal with Gophers and Gnomes
A mythical recipe bought off an mysterious hermit. Who knows what effects this drink may hold?
{0.SimFirstName} is not skilled enough to cook this recipe.
Your Sim needs to try this dish at a restaurant before attempting to cook it.
Ambrosia can bring a ghost back to life or reset the age of a living Sim.
Silly Gummy Bear Pancakes - Party Size (8)
Silly Gummy Bear Pancakes - Family Size (4)
Sometimes, only paint can express true fury.
A painting to stir the lions of passion.
Art that can elicit a snicker or two.
Art for the left-brained or focused is both orderly and geometric.
A barstool is one of the simpler pieces of furniture that can be handcrafted with a woodworking table.
Bathe like they did in the olden days - surrounded by wood! What better way to get closer to natural purity than to relax in a tub made from trees.
Dining chairs are like potato chips - you can never have too many! Or is it, you can never have just one? That makes more sense. You probably could have too many potato chips.
There is no finer feeling than playing a guitar that you crafted with your own hands. Make that dream a reality by crafting your own guitar today.
The roar of the majestic dragon fills the air. Take that roar and capture it in the wooden form of the winged and mythic beast.
The elephant: large, yet elegant. Gentle, yet passionate. Full of life, yet - in this instance - wooden.
If woodwork be the food of love, sculpt on!

Horses have always served a vital role in the development of society, whether they were being used for transport or companionship. Keep a wooden one by your side and feel the history emanate from it daily.
Knives: many practical applications. However, there is the possibility of injury. Prevent this by carving a block to store your knives safely.
Bears: ferocious guardians of the forest, these lumbering predators can now stand near your desktop and keep your papers safe.

Tales and legends of lumberjacks are common because there is something about chopping wood and swinging axes that appeals to even the meekest among us. Sculpt a lumberjack and make those legends come to life.
Not all art needs to be so serious.
The rabbit: cute and furry, yet surprisingly austere. Have one such wonder of nature watch over your home, in wooden form.
The centerpiece of any proper dining room is the dining room table. Make your dining room smile with a fine handcrafted table.
An end table is a bit like a barstool, except that woodworking mistakes are planer to see. (Get it?)
What's it like to use a wooden toilet? Only a select few even know the feel of lumber under their bottoms. Be one of those few. Make a wooden toilet.
Violins are tricky instruments to make, but a well-crafted violin is the difference between the smooth sounds of perfection and the screechy yowls of a tortured cat. So, be careful.

Don't let the abundance of space fool you. Take a look around, admire the wonderful scenery, and explore the endless possibilities. Do you see it? This is your whole new world! What are you waiting for?

This city is made up of four distinct districts: the Spice Market, the Fashion District, The Arts Quarter and Uptown.

In addition, Myshuno Meadows is a large city park tucked beneath the skyscrapers if your Sims need to get away for a touch of nature.

Depending on where your Sims choose to live, you’ll get a very different flavor of the city. You might find yourself in a cramped, roach-infested studio apartment in the Arts Quarter… Or you might be enjoying a breathtaking view of the city from your very own tricked-out rooftop penthouse Jacuzzi in Uptown.

The gorgeous Sulani island chain welcomes all to a life of blue oceans and friendly neighbors. The main islands show off the many walks of life from the community centered Ohan'ali Town, to the more lavish upscale Lani St. Taz, and even down to the seemingly vancant Mua Pel'am. All around is the beauty of nature no matter where you look.

A verdant, sprawling region of lush bayous and rolling plantation land that is home to aristocratic farmers, southern gentry, and swamp-dwellers. Willow Creek is a diverse blend of rich tradition, understated grandeur and true salt-of-the-earth hospitality.

An oasis nestled in the austere beauty of the western desert, this haven of eclectic culture is fringed by countless soaring palms, and lent vibrant color through impossibly lush landscaping. Oasis Springs offers relaxing retreats from the sun to any traveler who discovers it.

Take ye olde deep breath and enjoy the mountain air. This green, expansive playground has it all; lush countryside, serene and rocky island cliffs, a quaint village with remnants of the old world all nestled around the modern shore side business center.

Strong, durable, and easy to install, concrete slab roofs are making a comeback among urbanites and bumpkins alike. May be used as a flooring material.
This glass roof is paneled with square frames, making it near-optimal for sky-viewing while still preventing those scary moments where one might think the roof was absent altogether.
The most classic of glass roofs.
Few roofs scream, “Science!” quite like this one does…

Upsides: Easy Weather Viewing, Chic Style, Fair Thermal Insulation, the Hilarity of Watching Father Winter Navigate it’s Surface\nDownsides: Cleaning Smeared Glass, Hearing the “Thunk” of Birds Hitting Said Clean Glass
Most glass roofs are fairly fancy due to simply being a glass roof. Well, this one is fancier! One might say, “Ornate” even…
Quaint yet modern. Was there ever such a thing before?
Never have rainstorms made such a rousing ruckus! May be used as a flooring material.
This ultra-light gravel provides a natural barrier from the sun without over-weighting your roof. May be used as a flooring material.
Get the corrugated metal roof of your dreams with our new My Own Corrugated Castle series. May be used as a flooring material.
These quaint scalloped shingles add an air of country charm to any abode.
Nearly indistinguishable from a dilapidated old farm roof, these composite shingles combine the vintage look of weathered wood with a lifetime guarantee.
It looks so much like real wood, even our installers were fooled (but don’t worry, they know now)!
You’ll love loving the planet with this energy-certified, eco-friendly, renewable, rapidly biodegradable roof!
Cover your home in class and style with real shakes from our fake cedar forest.
They say this shape pleases the spirits. Doesn’t it please yours?
Why live in fear of the elements? Embrace the allure of time-weathered wood and live at one with nature.
Dress your home in a beautiful mélange of natural tones with striking clay tiles from our Mosaic collection.
Transform your home into a classic Mission-style abode with the distinctive allure of rippled clay tile.

Once you've placed a roof, use the horizontal and vertical arrows to resize, the round handles to adjust the curve, the curved arrows to rotate it, and the multi-arrow button to move it. Press Shift+C with a roof selected to toggle Advanced Curvature Mode on and off.

Nothing is ever black and white, except your very own Black & White Bash! Entertain your friends in high style-black tie or white tie, little black dress or lily-white gown, your guests will be dressed to the nines and ready to party.

Caterers need a refrigerator, a counter, and an oven.
When you need someone to pour and mix drinks with flair look no further than your local Mixologist.
Must have Mixology skill level 5 or higher.
You're just tending bar... maybe throw in some black and white drinks?
You're making drinks... maybe dress them up a bit.
It's all about you. Make this the best birthday yet.
Must be eligible to age up
Make all the foods happen! Those that control the quality of the food control the quality of the party.
Some birthday parties have appetizers, some have entrees. But if there's one thing that's definitely expected, it's birthday cake.
Must have Cooking skill of 5 or higher.
Time for some black and white food!
Costume-themed food is the name of the game!
Must have gourmet cooking skill level 3 or higher.
It's pretty simple; make sure your date has a good time. And if you can have fun at the same time, all the better!
Must have romantic relationship of 15 or higher.
A Sim wants to take you out! How lovely. Be on your best behavior...or not!
Must have Piano skill 5 or higher.
Some do it with a light touch, some pound on the keys with ferocity. Either way, your job is to make sure people have a good time.
Requires Piano Skills Level 3 or higher.
Maybe keep it classy this time... for a change.
Must have a Comedy skill of 5 or higher.
A little live music makes every social event go better!
Be the life of the birthday party.
Put on your best black and white duds... it's time for a party.
Ain't no party like a costume party... costumes optional.
Hosts need a refrigerator, a counter, and an oven.
You've been invited to be the life of the party... or at least to not bring everyone else down.
You will need a microphone to Lampoon the Guest of Honor.
It's your party -- make sure everyone has a good time.
Must be a household member; teen or older.
It's your Household's party -- maybe you'll decide to join in on the fun.
I should really get going now. Thanks for hanging out with me. See you later.
Nobody likes a dry wedding! Keep those drinks -- and the fun -- flowing!
Wedding betrothed needs a cake and a wedding arch.
If there's one thing that people expect from a wedding, it's... well, cake. Also, dancing. But there's gotta be food in there somewhere, right?
It's all about you. Make the most of your big day.
As a wedding guest, it's your role to properly witness the union of two people. But more importantly, you're there to have a good time.
Only Robot Vacuums can be docked here.

Don't take your staircase for granted. Respect its quiet dignity and quality of construction.
A staircase is an architectural element that allows people to move from one level of a building to another smoothly and without impediment.
Chic and contemporary in design, this set of stairs seems to float in midair.

Stairs are nice and all, but don’t you want stairs that will make people say “Ooh, fancy!” Well that is the exact exclamation people will make when they see the Ooh Fancy model of our Mega Stairs. And just wait until you tell them that each tile was meticulously painted by robots!

Look, while these charming stairs are the perfect complement to a mission-style home, you don’t literally have to live in a mission to purchase them. It just seemed like it was worth reminding people, because not a lot of people are buying these stairs.
The open riser stair design is modern and airy without being trendy.
Wood makes for a solid if unremarkable set of stairs.
These stairs are solid and uncompromising.
These stairs are solid and uncompromising.
Not too shallow, not too steep, this set of stairs is just right for any home.

Toddlers can eat on the floor, but they prefer to sit in a high chair for a proper meal.
Adult Sims can change a dirty diaper, or give a toddler a bath.
Mermaids can't stay dry for long! Going swimming, taking a bath, or even a nice drink of water will bring hydration back up.
Make sure to water your PlantSims with a swim, a shower, or just drinking a glass of water! With water filled up, go outside for some sunlight to replenish hunger.
Toddlers need more attention than older Sims and need to be constantly watched and engaged with in order to be happy.

Specially formulated with plant super food, this amazing soil gives flowers, fruits, and vegetables the power they need to conquer the world, one shoot at a time.
Some soft parts some rough parts, but overall just right. You might not want to fall on this tho.
Give your sweet little seeds the smartest start with this expertly crafted, nutrient-rich soil.
Slippy, sloppy, and damp this mud is sure to get everywhere!
Your skin needs UV protection. This sand simply glows.
It’s hot in the desert. This sand has the tan to prove it.
Let your garden grow wild with Garden Bedlam, the only soil with ingredients so surprising, you never know what will pop up next!
For gardeners who love a challenge, this ultra-rough, ultra-dry soil is your perfect proving ground.
So soft and warm, you’ll want to wiggle around in it barefoot, every time you pass by.
Textured by wind and dampened by waves-the stuff castles are made of!
Life is full of sand pits. Add one of your very own.
These pretty little ditties feel as delightful underfoot as they look to the eye.
Perfect for singing and skipping, especially when wearing curtains.
Like little bursts of sunshine, these happy blossoms thrive in heat (as long as they get water from somewhere).
As drought-resistant as they come, these remarkable flowers can actually bloom in desert sand.
For wont of dew, this grass hath died.
Designed to look mostly dead, this lawn lets you keep your grass and show off your green side too.
Almost too green to be true, this lawn is remarkably common in retirement communities and desert golf courses.
In the desert heat, even the hardiest lawns start to fade without shade.
Conjure up cooler expanses with the ever-green allure of Emerald Forever.
This remarkable grass gets greener the more that people envy it.
This is what lawns are supposed to look like when the mercury really rises.
Conserve water by embracing the beauty of sunbaked desert stone.
Plug up those burnt patches with stones for a happy, country look.
A quick and easy solution for driveways, paths or just about anywhere-you’ll have a “crush” in no time!
Let nature reclaim your lawn-or is it your lawn reclaiming nature?
Add a little “olde worlde” charm with the natural beauty of flagstone.
Rivers once rushed through the desert. Envision one rushing through your yard.
Colored by weather and massaged by time, these salvaged cobblestones lend a sense of history to your landscape like no pathetic newbies could.
Give vertical surfaces an extra-rugged look with authentic cliff stones harvested from on high.
The Cliffs of Rover will make your lot sing bright! Little patches here and there will always make things pop.
Pleasing to the eye and ear, this gravel lives for the road.
Offer a warm welcome to your guests with natural stone pavers in breathtaking desert tones.
Not yet entirely obsolete, bricks and mortar are a personable choice for patios, walkways and more.
At home anywhere, these striking tiles combine modern symmetry with the natural allure of river stone.
Not 1, not 20, but 21 rocks. Balanced as all things should be.
Spinning the hits of the 2000's all day everyday... "Blast Techno Beats"

This tool will flatten terrain to the height of the first clicked area. The tool will naturally snap to the minor topography lines, holding "Ctrl" will snap the height widget to the major topography lines. The "[ ]" keys will change the size of your brush. Holding Shift and scrolling the mouse wheel will give you more granular size control.
This button will flatten your lot immediately. This can be undone by clicking the Undo button in the top panel.

This tool will flatten terrain to a specific height. Adjust height with the height slider in the UI, or hold "Ctrl" and the "[ ]" keys. The "[ ]" keys will change the size of your brush. Holding Shift and scrolling the mouse wheel will give you more granular size control.

This tool will lower terrain. Holding "Ctrl" while clicking will reverse the effects. The "[ ]" keys will change the size of your brush. Holding Shift and scrolling the mouse wheel will give you more granular size control.

This tool will raise terrain. Holding "Ctrl" while clicking will reverse the effects. The "[ ]" keys will change the size of your brush. Holding Shift and scrolling the mouse wheel will give you more granular size control.

This tool will smooth terrain by taking the average heights of all terrain within the brush tool. The "[ ]" keys will change the size of your brush. Holding Shift and scrolling the mouse wheel will give you more granular size control.
Kindness Ambassadors have stronger friendships and fewer negative Emotions.
Over-Achiever Sims have increased job performances and gain skills faster.
These Sims tend to be Energized, can Pump Up other Sims, and may become upset if they don't exercise for a period of time.
Alluring Sims are more successful at romance than others.
Always Welcome Sims will act more at home when at others' residences, and the hosts won't mind at all!
These Sims gain powerful Moodlets from career success, gain negative Moodlets from career failure, and may become upset if not promoted.
Antiseptic Sims' Hygiene Need decays much slower.
Appraisers can sell collectibles like Metals, Crystals, Elements, and Fossils to the Simsonian Museum for extra money.
These Sims gain powerful Moodlets from Viewing works of art and can Admire Art and discuss art in unique ways.
Tormentors can sabotage almost anything, be it an object or another Sim's best efforts.

Beguiling Sims can put anyone in a Flirty mood with just one look.
These Sims gain powerful Moodlets from analyzing Books and can Discuss Books in unique ways.
Business Savvy Sims earn more than the standard rate from careers.
Carefree Sims will never get Tense.
Who doesn't dream of going to space? As an astronaut, the galaxy will be your playground.
An athlete requires physical strength, speed, endurance, and intelligence. Enthusiastic fans will shout your name, wear your jersey, and remember your feats forever!
Synergy! Efficiency! Planfulness! If the mere sound of these industry buzzwords gets you buzzing, then you know you're in the right line of work.
Not every Sim wants to play by the rules. As an outlaw, you can make tons of Simoleons and have fun too.
Anyone can make dinner or mix a drink at home. A culinary career is for those who want to take it to another level and make money doing it.

You've wanted your name in lights from the time you could spell it. Answer your calling as a professional entertainer, either making the audience laugh with you, or melting their hearts with your melodies.
• Bonus Skill: Guitar\n• Bonus Skill: Violin
Create your own world with a few strokes of a brush! Make a place for yourself in the art industry with hyperreal masterpieces or abstract works of unsettling beauty.
Live life unnoticed as a covert operative. From infiltrating enemy headquarters to the art of interrogation, the more you learn, the less you’ll be known.

By identifying the right colors, the trendy patterns, the unseen ensemble pairings, and recognizing the perfect person to act as a vehicle for such insight, the style influencer can twist the world towards a more cohesive end.
Who needs college with programming skills like yours? Opportunity is out there, ripe for the picking, and you and your big brain are ready to pluck away.
Being unemployed just means you're open to a world of possibilities! ...At least, that's one way to put a positive spin on it. You should consider going job hunting once the bills start piling up.
Get paid to express your ideas with beautiful turns of phrase, and words—wonderful words!
Living the good life! Consider pampering yourself with all your extra simoleons.
Modest living is always available until you accomplish more in life.
You've got some extra funds in your pocket; treat yourself to something nice.
When in a conversation, a bit of charisma can go a long way. Whether making friends, romancing, or calming down strangers, you'll know how to proceed.
As soon as one realizes that everything is a joke, being a comedian is the only thing that makes sense.
Anyone can cook, but Sims who are epicurious will benefit from spending a little extra time and attention in the kitchen.
Sims with this skill aren't afraid to admit that they're hooked on fishing. Those who say otherwise are just acting koi.
While all Sims want to stay healthy, fitness-minded Sims frequently go above and beyond the call of duty to keep their bodies in tip-top shape.
How does your garden grow? It can bloom with flowers and fruits galore, but such an endeavor takes time and effort... Thankfully, you've got the skill!
Ready to take your culinary creations to new heights? A gourmet cook can deliver fancy foods to your mouth, and that of your guests.
Guitar: the one instrument that defies class, genre, and boundaries. A guitar can be a good fit for a romantic evening, a casual get-together, or a sold-out performance.
Do it yourself! That's the motto of a handy Sim. You aren't afraid to repair things when they break, can upgrade regular household objects, and may even dabble with a bit of woodworking.
A practiced mind can be a wonderful thing, and Sims who focus on logic want to hone their minds until they're sharper than a llamacorn's horn.
Mischief-oriented Sims tend to be sly devils, delighting at tricking, pranking, and otherwise mocking their fellow Sims. Life's a party, and you're out to crash it.
Mixing drinks and making small talk seems easy enough, but the right proportions of juices and the right amount of chatter is a subtle skill.

The art of putting brush to canvas and creating something that can evoke an emotional response is not easy. For those Sims that choose to paint, colorful creations - and maybe some big sales - lie in their future.

With phone or fancy camera in hand, you've unleashed your inner photog! You'll view the world through a different lens by taking lots of pictures, upgrading your equipment, and experimenting with picture settings.

When ivories need tickling and aural senses need soothing, a pianist is the only Sim that can help. Practice, practice, practice your piano skill... While you may never be a rock star, you'll be played in elevators forever.
Almost like speaking a second language in today's world, programming is becoming more and more essential. You'll get ahead by learning to make machines do your bidding!

There are those who'd rather keep their feet on the ground, their eyes looking down. Not you! Throw off the shackles of what-is and take on the challenge of what-can-be. You'll build, upgrade, and fly where no Sim has gone before.
Being dominant at video games used to only be good for bragging rights against your siblings. But, in this brave new world, video game prowess can actually earn you money!
Whether a haunting dirge or a lively dance, the violin can evoke a myriad of emotions.
Putting pen to paper is no easy task. The blank page can be one of the most daunting foes, but writers take on the challenge of finding a way to put emotions into words day after day.
These Sims tend to be Happier than other Sims.

Dastardly Sims perform stronger and more successful mean interactions.

Poetic Sims can capture life itself in a book, and wield it to bring back someone they've lost.

These Sims become Happy around family members, become Sad if they don't interact with family for a period of time, and can Boast about Family.
Fertile Sims have an easier time when trying for a baby, and a higher chance of twins or triplets.
These Sims become Happy and have Fun when eating good food, become Uncomfortable when eating bad food, and can Watch Cooking Shows for ideas.
Forever Fresh Sims never need to shower or bathe!
Forever Full Sims never need to eat!

Trade: Freelance Artist Can a digital painting make you cry? Right now, no one knows. This is party because many would consider the very idea frivolous. But it's also because whoever successfully answers this question must first have answered several others. Why do we cry? Why do we laugh, or love, or smile? What are the touchstones of our emotions? Until now, the people who asked such questions tended not to be the same people who created digital art. Instead, they were writers, filmmakers, painters, musicians. They were, in the traditional sense, artists. We're about to change that tradition. The name of our agency is Electrified Artists.

Trade: Freelance Programmer\n\nWant in on a little secret? You don't have to be an expert about computers to be a great freelancer! All you need is a PC, a search engine, and the iron will to deal with "ideas people". Still, it helps to be an expert.

Trade: Freelance Writer\n\nWhen people see us in the street, they point and exclaim "Them's Fighting Words!" Okay they don't. Perhaps someday. We handle jobs ranging from proofreading to ghost writing for famous people. Grab a keyboard, boot up your favorite word processor, and join us!
All single-use service requests are free.
